font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usually after &nbsp;liposuction, the human body will usually compensate\nwith an increase in subcutaneous fat &nbsp;unless you have a diet and exercise regimen\ngoing. &nbsp;Many slothful film stars have\nfound this out the hard way .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subcutaneous fat\nlocated at the waist \u2014 the finger pinchable fat \u2014 can be frustratingly\ndifficult to budge, but in normal-weight\npeople, it\u2019s generally not considered as much of a health threat as visceral\nfat is. You should be more worried about your health that your looks .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subcutaneous abdominal fat is\nhard to burn through diet and exercise and is called \u201cstubborn\u201d abdominal fat.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subcutaneous\nabdominal fat at the belly is stubborn because &nbsp;the network of blood vessels is not as dense\nin the area where this type of fat occurs, as it is with visceral fat. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-B6CqQphQGYI/U_hC6HwurcI/AAAAAAAAu4w/Mj8ou104rE0/s1600/maxrehfcdsdefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-B6CqQphQGYI/U_hC6HwurcI/AAAAAAAAu4w/Mj8ou104rE0/s1600/maxrehfcdsdefault.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is further away from the portal vein than\nvisceral fat, and it has to travel a longer distance to reach the main\n\u201chighway\u201d that will take it to other tissues (e.g., muscle) for use as energy.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subcutaneous fat is resistant\nto elimination through \u201cburning\u201d ( thermogenesis or lipolysis ).&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lipolysis involves\nhydrolysis of triglycerides into glycerol and free fatty acids involving\nhormones like ghrelin, cortisol etc. I will talk about such hormones later .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9Bha32tlJnc/U_hGhXq_MGI/AAAAAAAAu5E/0W-qpU9SqH4/s1600/10ffr1383-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9Bha32tlJnc/U_hGhXq_MGI/AAAAAAAAu5E/0W-qpU9SqH4/s1600/10ffr1383-1.jpg\" height=\"248\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reason is because subcutaneous\nfat cells have a lower concentration of beta adrenoreceptors (which stimulate\nlipolysis) and a higher concentration of alpha adrenoreceptors (which inhibit\nlipolysis). </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subcutaneous abdominal\nfat, </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">is less responsive to exercise than\nvisceral abdominal fat.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-iR3pJLvpZUs/U_hHr8w7aSI/AAAAAAAAu5Q/BmwhwdFLXNM/s1600/imagdffe001.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-iR3pJLvpZUs/U_hHr8w7aSI/AAAAAAAAu5Q/BmwhwdFLXNM/s1600/imagdffe001.gif\" height=\"297\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beta adrenoreceptors, are responsive to dieting -- subcutaneous\nfat cells are primarily studded with alpha-2 adrenoreceptors. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; They</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;are far more resistant to\nshrinkage through ordinary dieting-induced lipolysis. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subcutaneous lower belly fat has a decreased\nblood supply and is less sensitive to the catecholamines.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CNVlhpnfgfw/U_hGI6L6v7I/AAAAAAAAu48/iwmOUnrfioI/s1600/fxdde1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CNVlhpnfgfw/U_hGI6L6v7I/AAAAAAAAu48/iwmOUnrfioI/s1600/fxdde1.jpg\" height=\"251\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cannot &nbsp;choose the location from which stored fat is\nmetabolized .&nbsp; Fat is stored in a unique\nand systematic pattern for each individual mostly based on genetics. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excess\nenergy that is stored as fat will be laid down in a specific pattern for each\nindividual. Some people will store fat beginning in the abdomen and then\nprogressing to the upper extremities, face and neck, and then lower\nextremities. &nbsp;&nbsp;Others will store fat\nbeginning in the hips and thighs, abdomen, and then upper extremities, face and\nneck. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VXEP06foAcs/U_hIa-uZZlI/AAAAAAAAu5Y/7lhVIfdmvnM/s1600/downloeertad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VXEP06foAcs/U_hIa-uZZlI/AAAAAAAAu5Y/7lhVIfdmvnM/s1600/downloeertad.jpg\" height=\"181\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subcutaneous (lower\nbelly fat) is more sensitive to insulin compared to visceral fat, </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">so it is more difficult to burn. &nbsp;Insulin works\non fat cells by increasing fat storage and decreasing fat release. &nbsp;A fat cell\nthat is more insulin sensitive only requires small amounts of insulin to shut\ndown its release of fat. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An insulin\nsensitive fat cell is a maha stingy fat cell that does not want to release its\nfat.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1Mn8ieIcWHQ/U_hIudXWBBI/AAAAAAAAu5g/Zdz1v5zUI_Q/s1600/409292adea.2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1Mn8ieIcWHQ/U_hIudXWBBI/AAAAAAAAu5g/Zdz1v5zUI_Q/s1600/409292adea.2.jpg\" height=\"442\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low carb diets reduce\nthe activity of the alpha adrenergic receptors and may speed subcutaneous fat\nloss. Exercising in a hot environment MAY increase blood flow to subcutaneous\nfat tissue and increase fat release. Avoid cool cozy AC gyms OR put on a track suit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subcutaneous stored fat\ncan be reversed and utilized as an energy source when blood sugar is low. Subcutaneous fat is reduced when the body\nneeds fuel to keep the body moving. As muscles are exercised and blood flow is\nincreased to and from the muscles, the body is better able to mobilize from the\nfat stored within the body and metabolize that fat into energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subcutaneous fat has\nmore alpha adrenergic receptors (block fat release), while visceral fat has\nmore beta adrenergic receptors (enhance fat release). &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-purrq3LOnhg/U_hJ2zBl1CI/AAAAAAAAu5s/sztQi0OB6GA/s1600/IndianJEndocrMffetab_2012_16_9_549_105571_f3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-purrq3LOnhg/U_hJ2zBl1CI/AAAAAAAAu5s/sztQi0OB6GA/s1600/IndianJEndocrMffetab_2012_16_9_549_105571_f3.jpg\" height=\"298\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hanging lower belly fat\n(subcutaneous) is more of an indication of leptin resistance while visceral fat\nis more an indication of insulin resistance.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NpZPPzC04SY/U_hKVE4EuhI/AAAAAAAAu58/Zx04xgcNS-E/s1600/figueerre3.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NpZPPzC04SY/U_hKVE4EuhI/AAAAAAAAu58/Zx04xgcNS-E/s1600/figueerre3.gif\" height=\"285\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diet and exercise will\nreduce visceral fat. &nbsp;&nbsp;Diet is more important to reduce subcutaneous\nfat. Obese men tend to lose more visceral (internal) fat while obese women lose\nmore subcutaneous fat.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lFKlMVtF0qw/U_hKFtE0GvI/AAAAAAAAu50/CQm-7H9oy-w/s1600/F3.lerarge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lFKlMVtF0qw/U_hKFtE0GvI/AAAAAAAAu50/CQm-7H9oy-w/s1600/F3.lerarge.jpg\" height=\"374\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Below: &nbsp;DUH ! &nbsp;DUH !! DUH !!! &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">WEEEP DUH ?</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e1xVR419KDM/U_hKnie7RdI/AAAAAAAAu6E/_TzLVDXNGTM/s1600/article-0-1418C8A90ertt00005DC-878_634x327.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e1xVR419KDM/U_hKnie7RdI/AAAAAAAAu6E/_TzLVDXNGTM/s1600/article-0-1418C8A90ertt00005DC-878_634x327.jpg\" height=\"330\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fat that is deeply\nembedded in your abdominal region is visceral. You cannot grasp visceral fat\nwith your hand. It is out of reach and inside your body. &nbsp;It lies deeply inside your abdomen, filling\nthe spaces between your organs. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visceral\nfat wraps around organs such as your liver and spleen. This kind of fat can\ninterrupt the regular function of your organs and produce harmful substances. Visceral\nfat is associated with heart disease, metabolic disturbances and sleep apnea.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insulin resistance and glucose intolerance, which can lead to Type 2 diabetes,\nare also associated with visceral fat. &nbsp;However the good news is that visceral fat\nyields fairly easily to exercise and diet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-U4raw7zmaxY/U_hMm22V9VI/AAAAAAAAu6Q/MHfWLW2SviM/s1600/slidffee7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-U4raw7zmaxY/U_hMm22V9VI/AAAAAAAAu6Q/MHfWLW2SviM/s1600/slidffee7.jpg\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Poor diet and lack of\nexercise leads to weight gain in the form of visceral fat, which is\nespecially a danger as you age because of its associated health risks. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visceral fat wraps\naround the inner organs . While abdominal exercises strengthen the underlying\nmuscles, they do not specifically reduce the overlying fat.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: &nbsp;DUH ? DUH !!</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-MdF9bSh_0Ig/U_hNepNF2uI/AAAAAAAAu6Y/ZcFT7P-HLmg/s1600/Imanmerrtltdown0330.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-MdF9bSh_0Ig/U_hNepNF2uI/AAAAAAAAu6Y/ZcFT7P-HLmg/s1600/Imanmerrtltdown0330.jpg\" height=\"426\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can see thin people\nwith excess visceral fat.&nbsp; Excess\nvisceral fat causes you to die early. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visceral fat has been\nlinked to a long list of adverse health conditions, including:--</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>High blood pressure,\nstroke, and heart disease<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>High cholesterol<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Diabetes<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Breast cancer<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Dementi</i>a <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the main reasons\nvisceral fat is so deadly is because of its role in inflammation, a natural\nimmune response that has lately been tied to almost every chronic disease there\nis.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-v5e10gWwKe4/U_hOlq3dPhI/AAAAAAAAu6k/kxZjUrSPQuI/s1600/Pancia-grahtrhetssa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-v5e10gWwKe4/U_hOlq3dPhI/AAAAAAAAu6k/kxZjUrSPQuI/s1600/Pancia-grahtrhetssa.jpg\" height=\"262\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Substances released by\nvisceral fat, includes free fatty acids, which enter the portal vein and travel\nto the liver, where they can influence the production of blood lipids. Visceral\nfat is directly linked with higher total cholesterol and LDL (bad) cholesterol,\nlower HDL (good) cholesterol, and insulin resistance. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-fFCKkKUGtfA/U_hPaEjrSaI/AAAAAAAAu6s/s6tIMaX4VWA/s1600/article-1258185-08bb3f910ry00005dc-221_472x239.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-fFCKkKUGtfA/U_hPaEjrSaI/AAAAAAAAu6s/s6tIMaX4VWA/s1600/article-1258185-08bb3f910ry00005dc-221_472x239.jpg\" height=\"324\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visceral fat responds\nwell to dieting and exercise, for instance, while subcutaneous fat does not.Visceral\nfat cells are predominantly studded with structures known as beta\nadrenoreceptors, which, when triggered by certain signals (prompted by reduced\ncalorie intake, for example), stimulate the cells to undergo lipolysis.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yhrPR6y23sU/U_hP-XJq4mI/AAAAAAAAu60/O-Rf1UB37kU/s1600/dowrttenload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yhrPR6y23sU/U_hP-XJq4mI/AAAAAAAAu60/O-Rf1UB37kU/s1600/dowrttenload.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During\nlipolysis, the lipids (fats in the form of triglycerides), which make up the bulk\nof the fat cell, are converted to free fatty acids, which are then oxidized as\n\u201cfuel\u201d to decrease fat stores.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ToTi_C4dOew/U_hQWgGcBXI/AAAAAAAAu7E/BcR6Q95cKuM/s1600/irrhmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ToTi_C4dOew/U_hQWgGcBXI/AAAAAAAAu7E/BcR6Q95cKuM/s1600/irrhmages.jpg\" height=\"359\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In essence, lipolysis and fatty acid oxidation\ncomprise the process commonly referred to as \u201cfat burning.\u201d As these lipids are\nmetabolized to release energy, fat stores are depleted, and adipose cells\nshrink. .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gwWXgmE2HDc/U_hQLVYplwI/AAAAAAAAu68/GlPHKRc61t8/s1600/adipose-tissue-eufggv7n3-2coljpg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gwWXgmE2HDc/U_hQLVYplwI/AAAAAAAAu68/GlPHKRc61t8/s1600/adipose-tissue-eufggv7n3-2coljpg.jpg\" height=\"444\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visceral belly fat has\na greater blood flow and is more responsive to catecholamines, your fat burning\nhormonal gas peddles. &nbsp;It is stored close\nto the liver and drains right into the portal vein giving the liver quick\naccess to fuel in times of famine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-prk7ruu75AQ/U_hQygJ9KJI/AAAAAAAAu7M/oFyVWVQKI8Y/s1600/ArchieDuhOneee425.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-prk7ruu75AQ/U_hQygJ9KJI/AAAAAAAAu7M/oFyVWVQKI8Y/s1600/ArchieDuhOneee425.jpg\" height=\"385\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visceral fat is like a\nparasite doing damage to its host with increased cortisol levels while\nperpetuating its survival. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-S2_34P2Yz9I/U_hS1H6DtPI/AAAAAAAAu7g/dWwPGsI3RvY/s1600/ncpendmeeert0023-f2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-S2_34P2Yz9I/U_hS1H6DtPI/AAAAAAAAu7g/dWwPGsI3RvY/s1600/ncpendmeeert0023-f2.jpg\" height=\"410\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deep belly\nfat has 400% more cortisol receptors compared to subcutaneous fat. &nbsp;This enzyme is called 11 beta HSD, and it is stimulated\nby insulin.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5mHT9fFeBoE/U_hSJf2U2kI/AAAAAAAAu7Y/wOM1cLGsUMA/s1600/500px-Diabeeee3sity.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5mHT9fFeBoE/U_hSJf2U2kI/AAAAAAAAu7Y/wOM1cLGsUMA/s1600/500px-Diabeeee3sity.jpg\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India we never had\nall these problems when we used fresh turmeric in our curry. Curcumin, from turmeric,\nis a belly fat reducing aid since it blocks the enzyme fatty acid synthase\n(FAS), the nuclear receptor PPAR gamma, reduces leptin, and reduces the release\nof inflammatory cytokines. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-52SNLfKrKMg/U_hUksVRVeI/AAAAAAAAu74/vjXpY-9dmCc/s1600/rrrrppargamma_pathway-2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-52SNLfKrKMg/U_hUksVRVeI/AAAAAAAAu74/vjXpY-9dmCc/s1600/rrrrppargamma_pathway-2.png\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also\nblocks 11 beta HSD, an enzyme that increases cortisol levels in deep belly fat\nperpetuating its growth. &nbsp;Decreased fat\nstorage, decrease fat cell maturation, decreased leptin resistance, and\ndecreased visceral belly fat cycle.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3z_2-DntMjE/U_hT3PCvexI/AAAAAAAAu7o/BfKqjFY4nS0/s1600/ss2008_report_mfggore-weight-loss_03_big.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3z_2-DntMjE/U_hT3PCvexI/AAAAAAAAu7o/BfKqjFY4nS0/s1600/ss2008_report_mfggore-weight-loss_03_big.jpg\" height=\"616\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In comparison to visceral cells, subcutaneous\ncells are greater in number .&nbsp; But the\nvisceral cells are actually larger in size per cell. &nbsp;And they get to be so big that they atrophy\nthemselves\u2014at which point they continuously inflammatory cytokines. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mqr0eHfZISo/U_hWMQeQT0I/AAAAAAAAu8E/xETRanRSATo/s1600/cytgtttkine.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mqr0eHfZISo/U_hWMQeQT0I/AAAAAAAAu8E/xETRanRSATo/s1600/cytgtttkine.jpg\" height=\"512\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\npromote atherosclerosis, tumor growth, aging, oxidation, hypertension, and\ncardiovascular disease. Reducing visceral belly fat takes a combination\napproach of a low-calorie diet that is high in fiber and low in carbohydrates\nand sugar along with cardiovascular and weight training .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CgeMJdg29AY/U_hWll_tuvI/AAAAAAAAu8M/7-Rw8KZP8Oo/s1600/Cytokinerr-Storm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CgeMJdg29AY/U_hWll_tuvI/AAAAAAAAu8M/7-Rw8KZP8Oo/s1600/Cytokinerr-Storm.jpg\" height=\"412\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visceral fat is just NOT an inert lump of\nlard, cushioning your internal organs ( pana kumbha \u2013 rich man\u2019s tummy ) &nbsp;but it constantly pumps poisons into your\nbloodstream.&nbsp; Visceral fat is known to\ncause inflammation in the colon and the artery walls, and is a major cause of\nheart disease, diabetes and some types of cancer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visceral fat increases\nproduction of the stress hormone, cortisol, and reduces levels of feel-good\nendorphins. &nbsp;So, along with killing you,\nvisceral fat, makes you feel like an as$hole\u2014nay-- CHOOT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But visceral fat\ndisappears fast with diet and exercise. Really we should NOT be having so many pandu\nhavaldars\u2014nay-- policemen in India with pot bellies.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QQRJv1VHrrc/U_hZXreFOxI/AAAAAAAAu8g/DePet4GX-_U/s1600/Indian-Army-Trainityyung.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QQRJv1VHrrc/U_hZXreFOxI/AAAAAAAAu8g/DePet4GX-_U/s1600/Indian-Army-Trainityyung.jpg\" height=\"344\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police DGP must read\nthis post. Army jawans eat much more rich and high calorie food , yet they do\nNOT have ugly tonds ( pot bellies ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PMyJLZz1jJo/U_hY1V2GTZI/AAAAAAAAu8Y/aO5bXHjqUks/s1600/dowhrehnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PMyJLZz1jJo/U_hY1V2GTZI/AAAAAAAAu8Y/aO5bXHjqUks/s1600/dowhrehnload.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"219\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the chemicals secreted\nfrom belly visceral fat cause inflammation, which cause causes depression--and reduces morale .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Overall, abdominal visceral\nfat seems to be the main culprit behind many of the health problems\ntraditionally pinned on obesity. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-csaNE5iw7SY/U_iBCoyTe2I/AAAAAAAAu88/cMHs5ZDtNVk/s1600/dowffhnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-csaNE5iw7SY/U_iBCoyTe2I/AAAAAAAAu88/cMHs5ZDtNVk/s1600/dowffhnload.jpg\" height=\"356\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beer contains rapidly\ndigested carbs that shut down fat burning. That\u2019s why beer is sometimes\nreferred to as \u201cliquid bread\u201d which causes \u201cbeer belly.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accumulation of visceral\nfat correlates with insulin resistance, whereas subcutaneous fat deposition\ncorrelates with circulating leptin levels&nbsp;\n.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-d3tWW_xU4SQ/U_hayA_PtcI/AAAAAAAAu8s/ticU60797gc/s1600/rysr2r0506.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-d3tWW_xU4SQ/U_hayA_PtcI/AAAAAAAAu8s/ticU60797gc/s1600/rysr2r0506.gif\" height=\"486\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, what is Leptin and\nwhat is Ghrelin? &nbsp;&nbsp;Kaun sa khet ka beetroot hai, yeh ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Leptin tells your body\nit's full and ghrelin stimulates appetite. &nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k6dNGEqSiIg/U_jT83rpncI/AAAAAAAAu98/NRrlx0f5Z24/s1600/leptin-and-ghrelig8n-action-in-hypothalamus.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
