font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you don't sleep, they get all out of\nwhack\u2014this makes your leptin levels decrease and your ghrelin levels increase.&nbsp; This is why fatsos must have good sleep.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JKMq5QjPFyw/U_jMgKTC8XI/AAAAAAAAu9U/RlxMdehr29s/s1600/dowdfnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JKMq5QjPFyw/U_jMgKTC8XI/AAAAAAAAu9U/RlxMdehr29s/s1600/dowdfnload.jpg\" height=\"298\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The result? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fatso eats &nbsp;unconsciously \u2013 he loves to raid the fridge\neven when his stomach is busting full&nbsp; . Ghrelin\nand leptin act on the brain via the hypothalamus .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leptin is secreted\nprimarily in fat cells, as well as the stomach, heart, placenta, and skeletal\nmuscle. &nbsp;Leptin decreases hunger. &nbsp;Leptin tells the hypothalamus that we have\nenough fat in the kitty , so we can eat less or stop eating. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For weight loss \u2014 the\nmore leptin the better.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You\u2019d think, then, that\nfatter folks would somehow magically stop eating or start losing weight once\ntheir leptin levels were high enough.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alas !&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fatso can become leptin\nresistant . His brain aint listening . &nbsp;There is no drop in appetite nor there is increased\nmetabolism.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VfLyG9J5C1M/VACwhNC2WhI/AAAAAAAAvVs/5LuzLAydZzA/s1600/hunger_andssw_appetite_hormone.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VfLyG9J5C1M/VACwhNC2WhI/AAAAAAAAvVs/5LuzLAydZzA/s1600/hunger_andssw_appetite_hormone.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"550\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His brain might even think he is starving, because as far as it\u2019s\nconcerned, there\u2019s not enough leptin. So it makes him even hungrier.&nbsp; It\u2019s a vicious cycle. Eat more, gain body\nfat. &nbsp;More body fat means more leptin in fat cells. Too much fat means that\nproper leptin signalling is disrupted.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xWDCdY8E1Jo/U_jTWi1GP-I/AAAAAAAAu9s/uke1VRfqtwU/s1600/Obesity%2BLeptin%2BFlowkuyb%2BChart.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xWDCdY8E1Jo/U_jTWi1GP-I/AAAAAAAAu9s/uke1VRfqtwU/s1600/Obesity%2BLeptin%2BFlowkuyb%2BChart.jpg\" height=\"360\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain thinks he is starving, which\nmakes him wanna eat more. He gets fatter. And hungrier. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He eateth &nbsp;more. Gaineth &nbsp;more fat. And so on and so forth .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leptin is known as the\nfat hormone; it is made in your white adipose tissue or stored fat. Following a\nmeal, leptin is released from your fat, enters your blood, and travels up to\nyour brain where it delivers a message that you are full and also lets your\nsubconscious brain know how much fuel you have on hand \u2013almost like the fuel\nmeter in your car. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the simple-case\nleptin problems encountered by people who are overweight is that their leptin\n\u201cgas gauge\u201d is sticky, or in more advanced cases, broken.&nbsp; This is called leptin resistance because\nleptin is either not getting into your brain correctly or not registering\nproperly in your hypothalamus gland once it does enter your brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leptin resistance is\nsimilar to insulin resistance ( they share common signalling pathways). Insulin\nresistance occurs when there\u2019s lots of insulin being produced (for example,\nwith a diet high in sugar and simple carbohydrate), but the body and brain have\nstopped \u201clistening\u201d to insulin\u2019s effects.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another leptin\nresistance fun fact is that fructose induces leptin resistance . So avoid all\nthose HFCS loaded soft drinks.&nbsp; Fructose\nhas no effect on ghrelin and interferes with your brain's communication with\nleptin, resulting in overeating.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over time, consuming\ntoo many calories from fat and simple sugars damages the nerves that conduct\nsignals through the hypothalamus, affecting the function of leptin and ghrelin,\nand thus the body\u2019s ability to regulate weight and metabolism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of this damage,\nthe signals don\u2019t get through about how much fat is stored. Fat hormone leptin\nare often the primary cause of many of the hypothyroid symptoms in overweight\nindividuals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4gLdmRzGD6E/U_jUIrpqF6I/AAAAAAAAu-E/gWbdYOkgerY/s1600/leptinpathkuygrway_a.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4gLdmRzGD6E/U_jUIrpqF6I/AAAAAAAAu-E/gWbdYOkgerY/s1600/leptinpathkuygrway_a.jpg\" height=\"378\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morbidly obese\nindividuals generally exhibit an unusually high circulating concentration of\nleptin. These people are said to be resistant to the effects of leptin, in much\nthe same way that people with type 2 diabetes are resistant to the effects of\ninsulin. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MSG (monosodium\nglutamate/ ajinomoto ) makes your appetite spiral out of control. Your body\nloses its ability to tell that it\u2019s full because MSG suppresses leptin. You end\nup eating more than you normally would and get hungrier sooner.&nbsp; &nbsp;MSG is\nloaded in ALL fast food and most processed food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leptin ( satisfaction\nhormone ) works with sensors in your brain to signal when you\u2019ve had enough to\neat.&nbsp; Leptin made by fat cells, thus\ndecreases your appetite. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In other words, your brain\nhas gone haywire and you can no longer trust the messages it\u2019s sending you\nabout appetite, hunger, and fullness. &nbsp;It\u2019s like your gas gauge points to empty\nall the time, whether or not the tank is full.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Along with being\noverweight comes insulin and leptin resistance, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Leptin Diet helps\noptimize leptin function in your body and unlock easier weight loss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1:&nbsp; Never eat after dinner\u2014no raiding the fridge .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2:&nbsp; Eat three meals a day ( do not snack ).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3:&nbsp; Do not eat large meals, that your stomach\nstretches .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4:&nbsp; Eat a breakfast containing protein.-i will tell why later&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5:&nbsp; Reduce the amount of sugar and carbohydrates\neaten.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One function of leptin\nis to set the long term energy spending policy of your body based on available\nfood supply. Your subconscious brain interprets leptin resistance to mean a\nfamine is going on, even though you are often eating too much on a regular\nbasis. This is a faulty perception of starvation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this tricky situation,\nleptin tells the TRH (thyroid releasing hormone) department in your\nhypothalamus gland to set thyroid hormone to a low level so that energy is\nconserved, otherwise your body may perish from starvation. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your hypothalamus then has a major influence\nover how much TSH (thyroid stimulating hormone) your pituitary will produce.&nbsp; Your subconscious brain intentionally turns\ndown the volume on your metabolism so that you can survive a hibernation period\n, which does not exist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Too much stress, too\nmuch inflammation, poor physical fitness, a chronic health condition,\novereating, and snacking between meals are key factors that confuse leptin and\nmake its job much more difficult.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus, when you crave for\none more chocolate &nbsp;too often, it means &nbsp;that leptin is not getting into your brain\ncorrectly and your thyroid system is not functioning up to par. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0e4St8O76MA/U_jTun9x3xI/AAAAAAAAu90/TuEejb4LO4g/s1600/IndianJEndocrMffetab_2012_16_9_549_105571_f3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0e4St8O76MA/U_jTun9x3xI/AAAAAAAAu90/TuEejb4LO4g/s1600/IndianJEndocrMffetab_2012_16_9_549_105571_f3.jpg\" height=\"298\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is subcutaneous fat\nthat is a stronger determinant than visceral fat of circulating levels of\nleptin, the key hunger-regulating hormone. &nbsp;Leptin influences you and you cheat on your\ndiet program.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leptin resistance, is\nalmost similar to insulin resistance, in which the cells no longer respond\nnormally to a hormone messenger. &nbsp;This is\ndue, in part, to the fact that in obese people, leptin interacts with\ninflammation-related proteins, such as C-reactive protein.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This interaction\nblocks leptin\u2019s ability to cross the blood-brain barrier, preventing leptin\nfrom transmitting its satiety signals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0aa-VD7MfU0/U_jSp361NyI/AAAAAAAAu9k/n2ilFXaw7FY/s1600/Leptin-Resistandewqce-xxs.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0aa-VD7MfU0/U_jSp361NyI/AAAAAAAAu9k/n2ilFXaw7FY/s1600/Leptin-Resistandewqce-xxs.png\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leptin resistance is both\na cause and a consequence of obesity. Once leptin resistance takes hold, it\naggravates diet-induced obesity and the leptin resistance and obesity compound\none another, promoting a vicious cycle of escalating weight gain.&nbsp; Leptin resistance specifically causes your\nbody to produce and accumulate visceral fat around your midline.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-F-KWa4oJ0xg/U_nWJub0KpI/AAAAAAAAu_c/fpY95QlZ-s8/s1600/fendo-02-00060-grg001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-F-KWa4oJ0xg/U_nWJub0KpI/AAAAAAAAu_c/fpY95QlZ-s8/s1600/fendo-02-00060-grg001.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"568\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excessive amounts of\nbody fat secrete more leptin than the body can handle, the leptin receptors\nbecome resistant to the effect of leptin, the \u201cI\u2019m full\u201d message cannot be\nreceived, and hunger grows unabated. &nbsp;Thus,\nmorbid obesity often perpetuates itself by blunting the appetite-suppressing\neffect of leptin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uvsyHrm1UeE/U_nWcTEYi8I/AAAAAAAAu_s/nXR7co2JrsM/s1600/imajyfges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uvsyHrm1UeE/U_nWcTEYi8I/AAAAAAAAu_s/nXR7co2JrsM/s1600/imajyfges.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"285\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sva_EVFShBc/U_nU1kKxg6I/AAAAAAAAu-U/6k36df1X3EQ/s1600/imagfeqes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sva_EVFShBc/U_nU1kKxg6I/AAAAAAAAu-U/6k36df1X3EQ/s1600/imagfeqes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Ghrelin</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> is the hormone\nwhich makes you hungry. Ghrelin was discovered 7 years after leptin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghrelin is secreted\nprimarily in the lining of the stomach.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your stomach makes\nghrelin when it\u2019s empty. Just like leptin, ghrelin goes into the blood, crosses\nthe blood-brain barrier, and ends up at your hypothalamus, where it tells you\nyou\u2019re hungry.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eIF-V6r_SEA/U_nVSji9gtI/AAAAAAAAu-0/lx5iZ3jZ1QE/s1600/ddwgownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eIF-V6r_SEA/U_nVSji9gtI/AAAAAAAAu-0/lx5iZ3jZ1QE/s1600/ddwgownload.jpg\" height=\"246\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghrelin is high before you eat and low after you eat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leptin is a hormone\nthat is a result of a buildup of fat, so it\u2019s a long term regulator of body\nweight. &nbsp;But ghrelin is the short term. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you want to lose\nweight you want less ghrelin, so you don\u2019t get hungry.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Lowering levels of\nghrelin leads to decreased body fat. &nbsp;</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JnnC5XbNhio/U_nVbPb41oI/AAAAAAAAu-8/bjY6CiLx2UY/s1600/ghroi7hrlin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JnnC5XbNhio/U_nVbPb41oI/AAAAAAAAu-8/bjY6CiLx2UY/s1600/ghroi7hrlin.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"584\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fructose prevents\nleptin and insulin from elevating to normal levels after a meal, while\nincreasing ghrelin and triglycerides. The soft drinks like Coke and Pepsi are\npacked with HFCS.&nbsp; &nbsp;This can lead to a dramatic increase in\ncalorie consumption. Fructose ends up circumventing the normal appetite\nsignaling system, so appetite-regulating hormones aren't triggered--and you're\nleft feeling unsatisfied</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-o0vEemZkrmQ/U_nVygZm4FI/AAAAAAAAu_U/OO2PjtZ0bg0/s1600/brochure1-figgure2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-o0vEemZkrmQ/U_nVygZm4FI/AAAAAAAAu_U/OO2PjtZ0bg0/s1600/brochure1-figgure2.png\" height=\"640\" width=\"442\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghrelin levels remain\nhigh until food stretches the wall of your stomach, making you feel full. High\nvolume, low calorie, nutrient dense foods reduce ghrelin and increase leptin\nlevels long before you have overeaten. &nbsp;Even drinking water stretches your stomach.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uvsyHrm1UeE/U_nWcTEYi8I/AAAAAAAAu_s/nXR7co2JrsM/s1600/imajyfges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uvsyHrm1UeE/U_nWcTEYi8I/AAAAAAAAu_s/nXR7co2JrsM/s1600/imajyfges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Less than 7 hours of\nsleep has been associated with higher ghrelin levels, decreased leptin,\nincreased hunger, and higher body weight in . You will find so many fatsos\nsleeping less.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2VzkydmtkYM/U_nW2enxp9I/AAAAAAAAu_0/_UERffLgb5s/s1600/imatbreuges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2VzkydmtkYM/U_nW2enxp9I/AAAAAAAAu_0/_UERffLgb5s/s1600/imatbreuges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Stress is associated\nwith higher body weight and ghrelin production. &nbsp;</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DuuhP6LfOzg/U_nVrxSiHTI/AAAAAAAAu_M/ZQytremIx6k/s1600/downlgdcoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DuuhP6LfOzg/U_nVrxSiHTI/AAAAAAAAu_M/ZQytremIx6k/s1600/downlgdcoad.jpg\" height=\"210\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghrelin is a\nfast-acting hormone, playing a role in meal initiation.&nbsp; Ghrelin levels increase before meals and\ndecrease after meals. &nbsp;The more you have\nin your system, the hungrier you are and the more fat your body stores. &nbsp;&nbsp;Lack of sleep increases ghrelin levels, and\nthese people raid the fridge ..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EEuf7t7k9ns/U_nWUZ7AFwI/AAAAAAAAu_k/EWKfmGbV72M/s1600/info_ghfefwrelin.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EEuf7t7k9ns/U_nWUZ7AFwI/AAAAAAAAu_k/EWKfmGbV72M/s1600/info_ghfefwrelin.gif\" height=\"640\" width=\"618\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghrelin is so efficient\nat stimulating your hunger centers, that elevated levels of ghrelin will make\nyou feel the same way as if your were in full starvation mode \u2013 desperately\ncraving the richest, highest calorie and sweetest foods.&nbsp; Ghrelin cycles in 4 hour increments, so\ntypically you would be hungriest 4 hours after your last meal.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aNyJveWig7U/U_nVGKeGAbI/AAAAAAAAu-k/Ex7HnYehuWo/s1600/downlocscbad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aNyJveWig7U/U_nVGKeGAbI/AAAAAAAAu-k/Ex7HnYehuWo/s1600/downlocscbad.jpg\" height=\"293\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8 hours of sleep per\nnight is the ideal.&nbsp; Know this very well\n- sleep deprivation causes your ghrelin levels to increase. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eHL4rnSF8Io/U_nVj-md-cI/AAAAAAAAu_E/AcYo8rG0Gkc/s1600/downltexsoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eHL4rnSF8Io/U_nVj-md-cI/AAAAAAAAu_E/AcYo8rG0Gkc/s1600/downltexsoad.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Next time you see a nutritionist or a sports\ncoach ask whim what is Ghrelin\u2014 <i>kaun sa khet\nka mooli hai</i> ?.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OGElEo0oAOg/U_nVLfVBN2I/AAAAAAAAu-s/zAOdrzA8Tqw/s1600/downloa43rd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">Protein intake also\nstaves off the release of elevated ghrelin levels, so make sure that each meal\nstarts off with high quality protein sources, especially the first one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4vkacPCBjq0/U_nU_jqTJrI/AAAAAAAAu-c/uvawtC7D2-Y/s1600/tumblr_m7dfangwrtw1jfQ1qlrpz6.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
