font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6000 year old Ayurveda\nsuggests you include all tastes \u2014 sweet, sour, salty, pungent, bitter and\nastringent \u2014 in at least one meal each day, to help balance unnatural cravings\n/midnight fridge raids .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GKScKgm2i_c/U_nYSgYl6oI/AAAAAAAAvAA/D_ZH7_EcCLA/s1600/imagI67TKUes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GKScKgm2i_c/U_nYSgYl6oI/AAAAAAAAvAA/D_ZH7_EcCLA/s1600/imagI67TKUes.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"331\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nAbove / Below: &nbsp;A perfect 6 pack has <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">INTERLOCKED</b> muscles -- they are never like chocolate bars.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BKk0UDnS_Eg/U_naEl_T9iI/AAAAAAAAvAQ/CpWLzrj_LSU/s1600/sean-lerwill-abs-6pack-sixpaIUck-6-pack-six-pack-obliques.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BKk0UDnS_Eg/U_naEl_T9iI/AAAAAAAAvAQ/CpWLzrj_LSU/s1600/sean-lerwill-abs-6pack-sixpaIUck-6-pack-six-pack-obliques.jpg\" height=\"412\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Cortisol</span></b> is a stress\nhormone. Your adrenal glands produce cortisol in response to stress, physical,\nmental or emotional.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yIA-pNSS0ak/U_o0Wpw_yVI/AAAAAAAAvBg/MTVX_a2jODA/s1600/Cortisolhd-355x448.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yIA-pNSS0ak/U_o0Wpw_yVI/AAAAAAAAvBg/MTVX_a2jODA/s1600/Cortisolhd-355x448.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"316\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This hormone is\nreleased within the body to increase blood sugar and regulate metabolism.&nbsp;&nbsp; Fluctuations of the cortisol levels within\nthe body can affect mental well-being.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DD9D76cBZj4/U_oyhOPRGgI/AAAAAAAAvAo/KIXbMjW40TE/s1600/tumblr_madp3dCnBie9T1qcj1xb.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DD9D76cBZj4/U_oyhOPRGgI/AAAAAAAAvAo/KIXbMjW40TE/s1600/tumblr_madp3dCnBie9T1qcj1xb.png\" height=\"267\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol signals fat\ncells to hold on to their fat stores\u2014 so stress can actually reduce the ability\nof the body to release fat from its fat stores to use for energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress makes a person\nfat primarily because of an excessive secretion of the key stress hormone,\ncortisol, along with a reduced secretion of key anabolic hormones, such as\nDHEA, testosterone, and growth hormone. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This combination of\nhighly catabolic cortisol and reduced anabolic hormones causes the body to\nstore fat, lose muscle, slow metabolic rate, and increase appetite\u2014all of which\nhave the ultimate effect of making a person fatter. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qOwz9fxFfdE/U_oy4hPpAQI/AAAAAAAAvAw/Cnn_Eui-2gg/s1600/skgyfrcsin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qOwz9fxFfdE/U_oy4hPpAQI/AAAAAAAAvAw/Cnn_Eui-2gg/s1600/skgyfrcsin.jpg\" height=\"343\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Overall, stress makes\nyou burn fewer calories and consume more food (especially carbohydrates), which\nincreases your stress levels even more!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol works in\ntandem with the master of your metabolism, your thyroid. &nbsp;If you\u2019re cranking out cortisol , you\u2019ll start\ngetting resistance from hormone receptors so it will require more hormones to\ncreate the same effect , creating a viscous stress cycle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our adrenal glands\ngovern our stress response, by secreting hormones relative to our stress levels.&nbsp; &nbsp;When\nthe adrenal glands are overworked, the body prepares for disaster, by storing\nfat and calories. &nbsp;We crave foods, we\nlose precious energy, and we gain weight., with increased levels of cortisol,\nour body also does not respond as well to leptin, the hormone that makes us feel\nfull, so we eat more.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kF-eFXjtn6c/U_ozEAilK2I/AAAAAAAAvA4/7MO0mLUG7oY/s1600/Fat-vs-nhgvdMuscle.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kF-eFXjtn6c/U_ozEAilK2I/AAAAAAAAvA4/7MO0mLUG7oY/s1600/Fat-vs-nhgvdMuscle.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally when we feel\nbegin to feel hungry, our blood sugar drops and the brain sends a message to\nthe adrenal glands to release cortisol. &nbsp;Cortisol activates glucose, fats, and amino\nacids to keep our body fueled with energy until we eat. &nbsp;Cortisol maintains blood sugar levels, and\ninsulin helps our cells absorb glucose. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nwe have long term stress, both insulin and cortisol remain elevated in the\nblood, and the extra glucose is stored as fat\u2013mostly in the abdomen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fat cells have special\nreceptors for the stress hormone cortisol, and there are more of these\nreceptors in our abdominal fat cells than anywhere else in our bodies! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eat well for healthy\nadrenal glands.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Since cortisol helps\nregulate blood sugar, keeping glucose levels balanced will take some of the\nstress off the adrenal glands. &nbsp;Three\nnutritious meals will keep our adrenal glands steady.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dlhRwQ-445Q/U_ozWqSsUuI/AAAAAAAAvBA/tyjbIhpn8Zg/s1600/muscular-anadftgtomy-front.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dlhRwQ-445Q/U_ozWqSsUuI/AAAAAAAAvBA/tyjbIhpn8Zg/s1600/muscular-anadftgtomy-front.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"360\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Restricting your carbohydrate\n&nbsp;intake too drastically can lead to:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>decreased thyroid\noutput<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>increased cortisol\noutput<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>decreased testosterone<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>muscle catabolism</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our hypothalamus and\npituitary glands, inside the brain, are sensitive to things like energy\navailability and stress.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;A flabby stomach can be a sign of\nover-production of the stress hormone cortisol.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BoH2o2Zvg_Y/U_ozkkWJLTI/AAAAAAAAvBI/eM00oyYefUU/s1600/InternalMusclesBack.JPGf9fb9af2-9e3fthjjuy-46ef-a043-82f16c2d0f20Large.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BoH2o2Zvg_Y/U_ozkkWJLTI/AAAAAAAAvBI/eM00oyYefUU/s1600/InternalMusclesBack.JPGf9fb9af2-9e3fthjjuy-46ef-a043-82f16c2d0f20Large.jpg\" height=\"602\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol increases\nlevels of fat and sugar in the bloodstream to prepare you for fight or flight. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But unless you do\nsomething physical - as your body is expecting you to - all that extra energy,\nin the form of fat and glucose, has nowhere to go. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, it must be re-deposited as fat.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That's why people under\nconstant stress quite often feel hungry all the time. Abdominal fat has more\ncortisol receptors than fat elsewhere in your body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t talk business\nover meals . Concentrating on food without distractions is linked to reduced cortisol\nlevels and a decrease in belly fat.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5ZUmiTsw4_8/U_o0EvBpG-I/AAAAAAAAvBQ/Fj6M31b8YSI/s1600/jun2012_New-Reahtbjson-Avoid-Stress_05.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5ZUmiTsw4_8/U_o0EvBpG-I/AAAAAAAAvBQ/Fj6M31b8YSI/s1600/jun2012_New-Reahtbjson-Avoid-Stress_05.jpg\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol can cause\ncravings for junk foods \u2013 simultaneously shutting off the goal oriented centers\nof the brain and ramping up the reward centers of the brain. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IHg5FuG5cKg/VAC2ovHN6mI/AAAAAAAAvW0/SVXcG-HHpBE/s1600/Funny-newff-years-resolutions-fat-cat.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IHg5FuG5cKg/VAC2ovHN6mI/AAAAAAAAvW0/SVXcG-HHpBE/s1600/Funny-newff-years-resolutions-fat-cat.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hormones act as\ncellular messengers. They deliver information about what's happening outside\nthe body to cells inside the body. &nbsp;Cortisol\nplays both a protective role and adaptation role. It works against inflammation\nand also releases the body's sugar and fat stores to meet the demands of\nstress. &nbsp;Anything that poses a potential\nthreat to the body will result in cortisol being requisitioned for &nbsp;help.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LXLHGIB6R3Q/U_o0FNG7pBI/AAAAAAAAvBY/xW0HtrK_f9M/s1600/3693---cortih65sol.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LXLHGIB6R3Q/U_o0FNG7pBI/AAAAAAAAvBY/xW0HtrK_f9M/s1600/3693---cortih65sol.png\" height=\"391\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol works as good\nguy and bad guy . It is required for optimal health and actually burns fat,\nunder the right circumstances. &nbsp;However\nit can &nbsp;become destructive in certain\nsituations, like when it's chronically elevated or continuously suppressed. &nbsp;When cortisol is too high or too low, it aint\nno good.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MppmnVE5LCc/U_o54gyzjvI/AAAAAAAAvDw/jXVsx5Vp2eg/s1600/blood-sugar-out-ofhhi-balance.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MppmnVE5LCc/U_o54gyzjvI/AAAAAAAAvDw/jXVsx5Vp2eg/s1600/blood-sugar-out-ofhhi-balance.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hormones are like\npeople \u2013 they behave differently depending on the environment they find\nthemselves in and the people they're surrounded by. &nbsp;&nbsp;For example, high cortisol in a low-calorie\nstate will produce a different outcome compared to high cortisol in a\nhigh-calorie state. &nbsp;&nbsp;Same thing with\nexercise \u2013 you want &nbsp;cortisol high while\nyou're exercising; you want it low when you're not.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--ejlRAzddV8/U_o5SBpYBqI/AAAAAAAAvDg/voBQNoeHUFk/s1600/adrenal_strghess.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--ejlRAzddV8/U_o5SBpYBqI/AAAAAAAAvDg/voBQNoeHUFk/s1600/adrenal_strghess.png\" height=\"290\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During exercise,\ncortisol works with your other fat burning hormones, the catecholamines\n(adrenaline and noradrenaline) and growth hormone, to increase fat release. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When cortisol is\n\"socializing\" with insulin instead, it has the exact opposite effect.&nbsp; Cortisol is actually NOT a fat-storing\nbelly-fat hormone. &nbsp;Insulin and cortisol\ntogether, with a high-calorie diet, &nbsp;are\nthe real cause of belly fat.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/--oVQbmeXyBY/U_o4xIIWhCI/AAAAAAAAvDY/Y5lHUMn_UvE/s1600/anabolic-vjyvds-catabolic.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/--oVQbmeXyBY/U_o4xIIWhCI/AAAAAAAAvDY/Y5lHUMn_UvE/s1600/anabolic-vjyvds-catabolic.jpg\" height=\"195\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another dual action of\ncortisol is how it interacts with the body's main metabolic fat burning engine,\nthe thyroid gland. Cortisol and the catecholamines sensitize thyroid receptors.\nSo low cortisol can also lead to low thyroid activity. High cortisol blocks the\nnormal conversion of inactive thyroid (T4) into active thyroid (T3). &nbsp;You need cortisol just right \u2013neither too low,\nnor too high..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The command and control\ncenter of your metabolism is the hypothalamus. This is the center of your\nmetabolic sensor/thermostat.&nbsp; &nbsp;This area needs to \"hear\" the\nsignals being sent by peripheral hormones like leptin and insulin, both of\nwhich shut down hunger in normal circumstances. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chronically elevated\ncortisol levels cause irritation in the hypothalamus leading to down regulation\nof hormone receptors inducing hormone resistance.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-C_jhEfqpgXg/U_o4rC5WAEI/AAAAAAAAvDQ/yB0pg6_ZFaU/s1600/HPAThyrgtoid.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-C_jhEfqpgXg/U_o4rC5WAEI/AAAAAAAAvDQ/yB0pg6_ZFaU/s1600/HPAThyrgtoid.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"500\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Imagine walking into a\nroom with a strong hydrogen sulphide odor and covering your nose and mouth,\nonly to realize later you can no longer smell the odor. This is what cortisol\ndoes to the brain. It muffles its satiety sensing mechanism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol is also\ninvolved in cravings. Cortisol along with other stress hormones (i.e. the\ncatecholamines), increases desire for more palatable, calorie dense foods. It\ndoes this while simultaneously shutting off the goal oriented centers of the\nbrain and ramping up the reward centers of the brain. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GQSlCUprHz8/U_o4Y3R9L9I/AAAAAAAAvDI/4Pq9s16HRw0/s1600/13G-caktktabolism%26anabolism2.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GQSlCUprHz8/U_o4Y3R9L9I/AAAAAAAAvDI/4Pq9s16HRw0/s1600/13G-caktktabolism%26anabolism2.gif\" height=\"278\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol is made in the\nadrenal glands mostly, but it can be made in the belly visceral fat too.. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which contains an enzyme called 11-beta\nhydroxysteroid dehydrogenase (11-HSD). &nbsp;This is an enzyme that converts inactive\ncortisone into active cortisol. &nbsp;This\nmeans belly fat can produce its own cortisol!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And in another twist in\nthe complicated relationship between insulin and cortisol, insulin increases\n11-HSD activity, which increases cortisol levels which then causes increased\ninsulin resistance. &nbsp;In this way, belly\nfat acts like a parasite ensuring its growth at the detriment of the host.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes an extra hour in bed, to lower\ncortisol, may be a better strategy than an extra hour on the treadmill. &nbsp;Fatsos must sleep well . During your sleep,\nyour body utilizes fat as it\u2019s primary source of fuel.&nbsp; So getting enough sleep is key to making sure\nthat your body burns off more fat!&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-m8BhhBNe3nY/U_o30grxFpI/AAAAAAAAvC4/7pukV4L1pPU/s1600/downlohyuuad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-m8BhhBNe3nY/U_o30grxFpI/AAAAAAAAvC4/7pukV4L1pPU/s1600/downlohyuuad.jpg\" height=\"212\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three best ways to\ncontrol cortisol are diet, exercise, and lifestyle. &nbsp;Cortisol is an alarm hormone.&nbsp;&nbsp; Skipping meals can raise cortisol because\nthe brain requires a constant supply of glucose. For some, skipping meals will\ncause blood sugar changes that create a cortisol response. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b3KDi0eAg3Q/U_o4Si1XnJI/AAAAAAAAvDA/XfkPSG1DS50/s1600/20120730-09huu2014.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b3KDi0eAg3Q/U_o4Si1XnJI/AAAAAAAAvDA/XfkPSG1DS50/s1600/20120730-09huu2014.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"498\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another great way to\nlower cortisol is finishing workouts with slow relaxing movements like leisure\nwalking. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As cortisol levels\nrise, a protein (HES1) in your liver elevates, which turns off your liver\u2019s\nability to break down fat. &nbsp;This also\ncontributes to fatty liver and abdominal weight gain. We are designed for fight\nor flight.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3q1mESBimoU/U_o1d6cOy1I/AAAAAAAAvCA/fp7DkDRg2B4/s1600/imageh4ul001.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3q1mESBimoU/U_o1d6cOy1I/AAAAAAAAvCA/fp7DkDRg2B4/s1600/imageh4ul001.png\" height=\"266\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol is produced as a\nresponse to stress ,and we are all stresses nowadays . Even people who go on holidays\nare overly stressed , and they find out the hard way, that home is a less\nstressing place.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_Tj_MJy93M0/U_o3cy1eyLI/AAAAAAAAvCw/rEznc_N4kH8/s1600/streddss.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_Tj_MJy93M0/U_o3cy1eyLI/AAAAAAAAvCw/rEznc_N4kH8/s1600/streddss.gif\" height=\"640\" width=\"334\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress increases your\ncravings for sweets and carbohydrates, it increases&nbsp; muscle breakdown for energy production, it\nincreases the percentage of fat that is stored in your abdominal area, and it\nincreases your levels of depression and anxiety \u2013 which make you eat more,\nwhich further increases your cortisol levels, creating a vicious cycle,&nbsp; resulting in you feeling tired and burnt out\nall of the time.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qvbYS1c23co/U_o1qHabGmI/AAAAAAAAvCI/mjTxtDPRa20/s1600/cortisol-sleep-heuhack.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qvbYS1c23co/U_o1qHabGmI/AAAAAAAAvCI/mjTxtDPRa20/s1600/cortisol-sleep-heuhack.jpg\" height=\"368\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol depletes lean\nmuscle and makes your body hold on to fat in the abdominal region. &nbsp;It also enlarges your fat cells, allowing them\nto store more fat. &nbsp;Cortisol is catabolic\nand elevated cortisol levels can cause the loss of muscle tissue by facilitating\nthe process of converting lean tissue into glucose. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pXk_PqSHwjQ/U_o3Gr4JVHI/AAAAAAAAvCo/uaTNkAqjaKI/s1600/normal-sleep-wake-cy57ycle.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pXk_PqSHwjQ/U_o3Gr4JVHI/AAAAAAAAvCo/uaTNkAqjaKI/s1600/normal-sleep-wake-cy57ycle.jpg\" height=\"230\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An excess of cortisol\ncan also lead to a decrease in insulin sensitivity, increased insulin\nresistance, reduced kidney function, hypertension, suppressed immune function,\nreduced growth hormone levels, and reduced connective tissue strength. &nbsp;Chronically elevated levels of cortisol can\nalso decrease strength and performance in athletes.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Get more spinach in\nyour diet.&nbsp; Spinach has magnesium which\nhelp balance your body\u2019s production of cortisol.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XreCXQ227eo/U_o17hxYIhI/AAAAAAAAvCQ/TmPuj2B4EHU/s1600/sleep-strekiuss.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XreCXQ227eo/U_o17hxYIhI/AAAAAAAAvCQ/TmPuj2B4EHU/s1600/sleep-strekiuss.jpg\" height=\"360\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc help inhibit the\nproduction of cortisol.&nbsp; &nbsp;If you don\u2019t eat meat, you can also get zinc\nfrom cashews, pumpkin seeds, spinach and beans. &nbsp;Cortisol inhibits the growth of beneficial\nmicroflora in the intestines. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These\nessential bacteria support the immune system, create B vitamins, and increase\nthe absorption of minerals like calcium, iron, and magnesium. &nbsp;A decrease in their population results in more\ncolds, sore throats, headaches, diarrhea, upset stomachs and the overgrowth of\nharmful bacteria and fungus like candida.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qJ-ZzxTP9Ws/U_o0qRlnb4I/AAAAAAAAvBo/serXFIAx6kg/s1600/dowgwgwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qJ-ZzxTP9Ws/U_o0qRlnb4I/AAAAAAAAvBo/serXFIAx6kg/s1600/dowgwgwnload.jpg\" height=\"316\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eliminate caffeine from\nyour diet. It\u2019s the quickest way to reduce cortisol production and elevate the\nproduction of DHEA, the leading anabolic youth hormone. &nbsp;Cortisol levels are very high when we wake up\nin the morning and falls as we go through the day. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we are stressed, our body releases extra\ncortisol to help the body respond to stress; as a result, our heart rate,\nbreathing, perspiration, and adrenaline levels all go up, muscles gets tensed,\nand&nbsp; metabolism goes down. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AycK1PEACfg/U_o05KGBVcI/AAAAAAAAvBw/59a1D4WBcAo/s1600/cortisol_stress1335htrh849873182.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AycK1PEACfg/U_o05KGBVcI/AAAAAAAAvBw/59a1D4WBcAo/s1600/cortisol_stress1335htrh849873182.jpg\" height=\"520\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A cortisol blood test\ncan measure the amount of cortisol in the body and determine if there are\nproblems with the adrenal gland. &nbsp;Thin\narms and legs, along with excessive weight carried around the midsection are\ntypically symptoms of a high cortisol level. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Qvb1a7whJ3M/U_o1MArNcsI/AAAAAAAAvB4/y3AWH5uZl7Y/s1600/image0beh02.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Qvb1a7whJ3M/U_o1MArNcsI/AAAAAAAAvB4/y3AWH5uZl7Y/s1600/image0beh02.jpg\" height=\"380\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low cortisol levels can\nproduce low blood pressure, as well as low blood sugar. Both of these\nconditions can suppress the immune system and cause weakness and changes in\nskin pigmentation. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1Cq6II-uHso/U_o2W3G2uJI/AAAAAAAAvCY/6tOgKCOuOh8/s1600/5862292382_3et2tb3cd8561122.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1Cq6II-uHso/U_o2W3G2uJI/AAAAAAAAvCY/6tOgKCOuOh8/s1600/5862292382_3et2tb3cd8561122.jpg\" height=\"265\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eliminate Mumbai Irani restaurant\ntype bright fluorescent white tube lights and go for golden lights in your\nhome.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-V_Ih-dQwUow/U_oyA3jkv0I/AAAAAAAAvAg/_TPuJmO4Lv0/s1600/20Creh131129.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-V_Ih-dQwUow/U_oyA3jkv0I/AAAAAAAAvAg/_TPuJmO4Lv0/s1600/20Creh131129.jpg\" height=\"252\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">DIGRESSION:&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">It is amusing read what\nnutritionists, media journalists and sport trainers write on the internet about\nobesity and fat loss.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Of course these jokers\nwill jump up like orangutans and cry \u201c You are a ship captain\u2014what do you know\nof all this !\u201c<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Fair point ?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">You don\u2019t need to be a\nhen to judge an omelet .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I remember I was\nworking in a shore office abroad for a couple of months. &nbsp;Those days my company had the largest number\nof Chemical tankers on this planet.&nbsp; &nbsp;Due to sudden expansion, we had to take in lot\nof Europeans.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Now in India our marine\nengineers are BE or Btech or even Mtech. &nbsp;They have a 4 year degree . &nbsp;&nbsp;But for the white man they join as ordinary\nsailor crew \u2013 &nbsp;wipers, motormen etc&nbsp; \u2014and they work their way up .&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Their\nengineering basics are PATHETIC .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">So the big boss asked\nme to create an Engineering question bank , to vet these wannabe joiner\nengineers .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Now I am a Captain &nbsp;( navigator/ executive side )\u2013 NOT an\nengineer. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">And at that instant\nthere were 16 qualified Engineers in the office \u2013 all experienced \u2013manning different\ngroups\u2014 bulk carriers, tankers, VLCC, &nbsp;product\ntankers, fully refrigerated gas ships, chemical tankers etc.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">These engineers had pride\nof their professions \u2013and all of them felt all balls , that this job was given\nto yours truly, totally unqualified for the job\u2014and they voices it too, in my\npresence. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We used to be one happy\nbunch when we go for lunch outside the office .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">But now--<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">SULK &nbsp;SULK !<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">So I went back to my cabin\nand send a general email to all engineers in the office , copied to the big\nboss.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I will create question\nbanks on every branch of Engineering\u2014 If any of you can PASS\u2014not max\u2014this test \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I will give you guys\nthe puraskar ( gift hamper ) you want. &nbsp;They\ncould take as much time as they want and consult any book or the internet.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MARINE ENGINEERING SELF\nEXAMINER &nbsp;REFRIGERATION &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
