font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hJIB_FfrjJA/U_xNAdmcRwI/AAAAAAAAvIU/JCO5J2Tbl70/s1600/obesity-wott43tmen.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hJIB_FfrjJA/U_xNAdmcRwI/AAAAAAAAvIU/JCO5J2Tbl70/s1600/obesity-wott43tmen.jpg\" height=\"482\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you are dehydrated, your body temperature\ndrops slightly, and causes your body to store fat as a way to help raise or\nmaintain the temperature. &nbsp;Chilled water\nhelp cool your core temperature -- which rises during physical activity -- but\nyour stomach absorbs cold water faster than warm water . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-owjWMtPuXAo/U_xIa61WnEI/AAAAAAAAvHI/hmlpUJwBZnY/s1600/WebSiteCuu8ell.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-owjWMtPuXAo/U_xIa61WnEI/AAAAAAAAvHI/hmlpUJwBZnY/s1600/WebSiteCuu8ell.jpg\" height=\"253\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fresh lemon infused water\ngreatly increases enzymes that detoxify your liver so that it may carry out its\nbasic functions efficiently.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-r8l6xG7zAhk/U_xJbFMuWKI/AAAAAAAAvHc/yC1Qgyl33z8/s1600/3d28594996e35bd4cb15f4ca2a8itf7eb8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-r8l6xG7zAhk/U_xJbFMuWKI/AAAAAAAAvHc/yC1Qgyl33z8/s1600/3d28594996e35bd4cb15f4ca2a8itf7eb8.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drink this lemon water sweetened with honey on an\nempty stomach first thing in the morning.&nbsp;\nDo not eat or drink anything else for 20 minutes . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-G5Yni7L5_VM/U_xJM8CE_pI/AAAAAAAAvHU/OR8JaPltyS0/s1600/downlgyoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-G5Yni7L5_VM/U_xJM8CE_pI/AAAAAAAAvHU/OR8JaPltyS0/s1600/downlgyoad.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In case of dehydration,\nyour kidneys can take help from your liver and reduce the liver\u2019s speed to burn\nfat. &nbsp;So drink enough water to lose belly\nfat faster. &nbsp;&nbsp;Keep well hydrated \u2013 as dehydration puts the\nbody in stress and raises cortisol levels. &nbsp;Keep pure water by your bed and drink it &nbsp;before you go to sleep. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XI97eM4OK9s/U_xJ-EYp2hI/AAAAAAAAvHk/q2mMGtkWBTA/s1600/ba693f2f043e926f3dtrh670531bc182c55.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XI97eM4OK9s/U_xJ-EYp2hI/AAAAAAAAvHk/q2mMGtkWBTA/s1600/ba693f2f043e926f3dtrh670531bc182c55.jpg\" height=\"274\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water drinking helps you to boost your\nmetabolic rate - the rate at which calories are burned.&nbsp; They note that up to 40% of the increase in\ncalorie burning is caused by the body's attempt to heat the ingested COLD\nwater.&nbsp;&nbsp; Water-drinking induces increase\nof energy expenditure by stimulation of osmosensitive structures.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dMR7MLU3Tts/U_xLzJGgHNI/AAAAAAAAvIE/0Xsfn88etCg/s1600/alkaline-food-crtj5rancer.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dMR7MLU3Tts/U_xLzJGgHNI/AAAAAAAAvIE/0Xsfn88etCg/s1600/alkaline-food-crtj5rancer.jpg\" height=\"440\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thermogenesis kaun sa\nkhet ka aaloo hai ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thermogenesis is the\nprocess by which warm-blooded animals produce heat. It is directly connected to\nmetabolic rate. &nbsp;When thermogenesis is\nincreased in the body metabolism speeds up and fat cells are used as energy to\nsupport the change in metabolism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thermogenesis, is the\nproduction of heat, in the body.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">High-protein diets are\nmore thermogenic compared to high-carb or high-fat diets.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HXM2fxEe-I4/U_zmHtgU6OI/AAAAAAAAvIk/o9btBgbM5Xo/s1600/imagd2d2es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HXM2fxEe-I4/U_zmHtgU6OI/AAAAAAAAvIk/o9btBgbM5Xo/s1600/imagd2d2es.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thermogenic foods help\nincrease metabolism and calorie burning by enhancing thermogenesis, a process\nin which the body burns calories to utilize the foods you have just eaten,\nconverting those calories to heat. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your body mainly burns\ncalories consumed through maintaining its regular metabolic functions and\nthrough physical activity; however, a small percentage, about 10%, of\ncalories are burned through diet-induced thermogenesis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Foods that have\nthermogenic properties burn your calories as you eat them. &nbsp;Protein is highly thermogenic. &nbsp;Animal proteins are more thermogenic than\nvegetable proteins. &nbsp;Thus, lean meats are\nthe best calorie burning food. &nbsp;When you\neat lean meat, you burn about 30 percent of the calories it contains within it\njust by digesting the food. &nbsp;So, if you\neat a 300 calorie chicken breast, you will use about 90 calories to digest it.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RnDeoApwB2U/U_zm9c7HtfI/AAAAAAAAvJc/0ZJLFskJiKQ/s1600/imagjtuvdes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RnDeoApwB2U/U_zm9c7HtfI/AAAAAAAAvJc/0ZJLFskJiKQ/s1600/imagjtuvdes.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"356\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s wise to include some protein in each of\nyour meal. &nbsp;Hot chillies have capsaicin,\na compound that gives a thermogenic effect and thus makes the body to burn more\ncalories after you have had the meal. &nbsp;Chillies\nhave the ability to lower blood pressure and induce blood vessels to relax.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: &nbsp;Mulagitta tanni (chillie infused water )</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hE00Wv5zJv8/U_znoIp9ZhI/AAAAAAAAvJs/vs4LxGXQtrg/s1600/mtr_mulligatawnyrthy_soup.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hE00Wv5zJv8/U_znoIp9ZhI/AAAAAAAAvJs/vs4LxGXQtrg/s1600/mtr_mulligatawnyrthy_soup.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"315\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consuming foods with\nspices such as hot chillies or black pepper increases thermogenesis ,and this\nhas a significant effect on feelings of satiety and fat oxidation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ysZntXT6MD4/U_znDU_99GI/AAAAAAAAvJk/JYNEw09WNDY/s1600/imaj7erges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ysZntXT6MD4/U_znDU_99GI/AAAAAAAAvJk/JYNEw09WNDY/s1600/imaj7erges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin;\">Cinnamon is a thermogenic. &nbsp;It &nbsp;produces heat through metabolic stimulation\nand burns &nbsp;your fat.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-96g0RkVJC1A/U_3_p0E65pI/AAAAAAAAvOk/uiEejt4yTB4/s1600/honey-cinnfghamon-weight-loss-300x182.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-96g0RkVJC1A/U_3_p0E65pI/AAAAAAAAvOk/uiEejt4yTB4/s1600/honey-cinnfghamon-weight-loss-300x182.jpg\" height=\"242\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Decreasing food intake\nis much more effective than increasing physical activity to achieve weight\nloss. &nbsp;&nbsp;If you want to achieve a 300 kcal\nenergy deficit you can jog for 4 kilometers and avoid that packets of chips.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin;\">Diet induced thermogenesis is the process by\nwhich the body produces energy by metabolizing what we eat.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Three factors that have\nan impact on your energy expenditure are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Basal metabolic rate </i>- &nbsp; the number of calories the body needs to maintain body functions while at rest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Thermic effect of food</i>\n- &nbsp; the number of calories required to digest, absorb, transport, and store food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Physical activity </i>- &nbsp; the\nnumber of calories expended during daily activity, lifestyle and exercise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vG5qON4Pc20/U_zmgJcg_4I/AAAAAAAAvI8/QjRcUMP8eLM/s1600/imhturages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vG5qON4Pc20/U_zmgJcg_4I/AAAAAAAAvI8/QjRcUMP8eLM/s1600/imhturages.jpg\" height=\"133\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Basal Metabolic Rate\n(or resting metabolic rate) is the amount of energy your body would burn if you slept all day (24 hours). &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muscle burns more\ncalories than fat does - even while at rest. Muscle tissue is about 8 times\nmore metabolically demanding than fat.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-owB4Jmh3IXg/U_zmkXpUHTI/AAAAAAAAvJE/zFw4K3g5q10/s1600/imagerges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-owB4Jmh3IXg/U_zmkXpUHTI/AAAAAAAAvJE/zFw4K3g5q10/s1600/imagerges.jpg\" height=\"339\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fatso will burn\nalmost the same amount of calories during exercise but the leaner person burns\nmore calories at rest. Then, when you lose significant amounts of body fat and\nmuscle, your body needs fewer calories to sustain itself. &nbsp;This is why it is so easy to regain weight\nafter you have worked your as$ off to lose it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you restrict\ncalories too low your metabolism slows down. &nbsp;Your body slows down in order to adapt to the\nlower calorie intake so it can function with less fuel. &nbsp;And, it actually begins holding on to every\ncalorie you eat and storing it as fat. &nbsp;This\nis why people who diet, usually gain back their weight once they start eating\nnormally again.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Mysgqy81z7M/U_zmx2Q4u6I/AAAAAAAAvJU/L0B6fgnYDFU/s1600/20-dw6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Mysgqy81z7M/U_zmx2Q4u6I/AAAAAAAAvJU/L0B6fgnYDFU/s1600/20-dw6.jpg\" height=\"452\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thermic effect of food\n(TEF) is the energy you use to eat, digest and metabolize food.&nbsp; &nbsp;Diet\ninduced thermogenesis is different for each nutrient and represents about 10%\nof the total amount of energy ingested over 24 hours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fats have thermic\neffect approximately 3%. &nbsp;Dietary fat is\nvery easy to process. Carbohydrates induced thermogenic response is about 7%.&nbsp; Proteins are hard to process and is the most\nthermogenic nutrient, with the thermic effect around 30%.&nbsp;&nbsp; Thermogenic herbs and spices include hot chilli\n, pepper, cinnamon, garlic, ginger, turmeric etc</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ApmtoMbFzxo/U_zoCLxsZ_I/AAAAAAAAvJ0/QTc0VUwIU6o/s1600/total-energhl%2Cy-expenditure.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ApmtoMbFzxo/U_zoCLxsZ_I/AAAAAAAAvJ0/QTc0VUwIU6o/s1600/total-energhl%2Cy-expenditure.jpg\" height=\"301\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protein exerts an\nincreased thermic effect when compared to fat and carbohydrate. A main reason\nfor the difference is because the body has no storage capacity for protein. Higher\nprotein diets increase satiety when compared to lower protein diets.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We burn more energy\nthrough the process of sweating. It is good to sweat it out during a workout. &nbsp;Energy used during exercise is the only form\nof energy expenditure that you have any control over.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1PEhdMqMA-A/U_zoH7nkzYI/AAAAAAAAvJ8/iWhI4U0EnOU/s1600/thermogenesis_in_brown_adipose_tihuussue_tees-r400bf906a1b84231b4337ab7b09b4f70_wio57_512.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1PEhdMqMA-A/U_zoH7nkzYI/AAAAAAAAvJ8/iWhI4U0EnOU/s1600/thermogenesis_in_brown_adipose_tihuussue_tees-r400bf906a1b84231b4337ab7b09b4f70_wio57_512.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Slow down when eating. &nbsp;It takes 15 minutes for your brain to get the message from your stomach that\nyou've had enough to eat. If you eat too fast, you'll exceed your calorie needs\nbefore you even realize you're full ! So chew well.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never consume fructose Coke\nbefore workouts because it blunts fat burning and lowers metabolic rate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Curcumin in turmeric inhibits\nthe growth of fat tissue and stimulates fat burning in the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeinated coffee\nimproves adipocyte and liver function. It can support fat burning and optimal\nbody composition . &nbsp;As a young boy, before\nour early morning Kalari workouts all we were allowed were black coffee made\nwith palm sugar and a tablespoon of humped cow\u2019s desi ghee in it.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeine causes the\nbody to rely more on fat for fuel during a workout, rather than glucose. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghee is a healthy\nfat.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fats take longer to break down in\nyour stomach and help control blood-sugar levels, leaving you more satisfied\nand reducing your cravings.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5o5fdJzNnfk/U_zma5kZQQI/AAAAAAAAvI0/dBJWnoA0ihM/s1600/imhtruages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5o5fdJzNnfk/U_zma5kZQQI/AAAAAAAAvI0/dBJWnoA0ihM/s1600/imhtruages.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Your body will not\ndigest food -- and burn fat -- as efficiently if you eat a huge meal just\nbefore bedtime, especially because your metabolism is slower while you sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A normal person can\nhave as low as 10% of their daily caloric intake from protein, but if you want\nto blast fat, you're better off at around 25%.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you eat small\nmeals all the time, your body is constantly producing insulin and never getting\nto a burn stage. &nbsp;You never really feel\n100% satisfied. &nbsp;So instead of eating 5-6\nsmall meals a day, as sport coaches advise you, better eat three decent ones\nand maybe two wee snacks.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbohydrate cycling. ---The\nscience behind it is that you have a couple low-carbohydrate days &nbsp;that get your body into a catabolic fat\nburning state. &nbsp;But then you have a day\nof high-carbohydrate intake, that gets your metabolism running. &nbsp;Without that high-carb day, your metabolism\nstarts shutting down.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-u92AnVStTqc/U_zmrINlVuI/AAAAAAAAvJM/O9QsfRPqOwY/s1600/imagr4t5yes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-u92AnVStTqc/U_zmrINlVuI/AAAAAAAAvJM/O9QsfRPqOwY/s1600/imagr4t5yes.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calorie cycling---- The\nscience behind it is, if you don't eat enough calories, your body starts eating\naway your muscles. Therefore, when you're on a low-calorie diet, you have to\nhave days of higher caloric intake to keep it going and your metabolism up .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dyE2SrVJ5pA/U_zmRLsmRzI/AAAAAAAAvIs/sgnBr97PW3s/s1600/imamhgdmges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can eat as\nhealthily as can be,&nbsp; and you can jog your\nas$ off. &nbsp; But you can't control your hormones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Ly7ubjtRDuE/U_1v5tXSZHI/AAAAAAAAvKU/rx-7ffGDu3M/s1600/imagyioes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">Insulin resistance is\nsimilar to leptin resistance and they share common signalling pathways. &nbsp;&nbsp;Insulin resistance occurs when there\u2019s lots\nof insulin being produced (for example, with a diet high in sugar and simple\ncarbohydrate), but the body and brain have stopped \u201clistening\u201d to insulin\u2019s\neffects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Fructose in soft drinks\ninduce leptin resistance<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under stress, the first\ndesire is to gorge on something sweet like chocolate, to help cool off your\nsystem. If stress is really intense and your adrenals are crashing, you will\ncrave a lot of fat and salt to feel better. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insulin also signals\nthe body to produce fat.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">High levels\nof insulin found in those who develop insulin resistance and type 2 diabetes\nare a contributor to obesity .</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consuming excessive amounts\nof fructose ( HFCS in soft drinks ) can lead to insulin resistance and\nchronically elevated insulin levels, as well as problems with cholesterol,\ntriglycerides and blood sugars .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insulin resistance is a\nkey feature of the metabolic syndrome, which causes type II diabetes, and obesity\n.&nbsp; Fructose, &nbsp;is THE leading cause of some of the biggest\nhealth problems on this planet.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Elevated triglycerides\nin the blood can block leptin from getting into the brain. Fructose is one of\nthe key drivers of elevated triglycerides.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High insulin levels can\nblock the action of leptin in the brain . Which translates to insulin in brain\n, shuts off hunger .&nbsp; Insulin resistance in\nbrain causes increased hunger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>THIRUVATHIRA , KARVA\nCHAUTH OF KERALA VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you consume too much\nsugar, the body starts producing extra insulin to compensate for the excess\nsugar and, over a prolonged period, the body's own sensitivity to the hormone\nis reduced. The condition is a precursor to type 2 diabetes and is related to obesity..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/OlHez8gwMgw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/OlHez8gwMgw&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/OlHez8gwMgw&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insulin, a hormone\nproduced by the pancreas, is important for the regulation of carbohydrates and\nthe metabolism of fat. &nbsp;&nbsp;Insulin\nstimulates glucose (sugar) uptake from the blood in tissues such as muscles,\nthe liver and fat. &nbsp;This is an important\nprocess to make sure that energy is available for everyday functioning and to\nmaintain normal levels of circulating glucose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a person who is\nobese, insulin signals are sometimes lost and tissues are no longer able to\ncontrol glucose levels. This can lead to the development of type II diabetes\nand metabolic syndrome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weight gain is a common\nside effect for diabetics who take insulin \u2014 a hormone that regulates the\nabsorption of sugar (glucose) by cells. &nbsp;When\nyou take insulin, glucose is able to enter your cells, and glucose levels in\nyour blood drop. This is the desired therapeutic goal. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nm1jiIm3Oag/U_2JUVf9mII/AAAAAAAAvL4/ZW30YDWGjdc/s1600/dy6ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nm1jiIm3Oag/U_2JUVf9mII/AAAAAAAAvL4/ZW30YDWGjdc/s1600/dy6ownload.jpg\" height=\"292\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But if you take in more\ncalories than you need to maintain a healthy weight \u2014 given your level of\nactivity \u2014 your cells will get more glucose than they need. Glucose that your\ncells don't use accumulates as fat. &nbsp;Eating\nhealthy foods and being physically active most days can help such people prevent\nunwanted weight gain.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mqS8DFcNq_4/U_2KFi7gCxI/AAAAAAAAvMA/v5DQCYfMwX4/s1600/obesitycbbnhhart23.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mqS8DFcNq_4/U_2KFi7gCxI/AAAAAAAAvMA/v5DQCYfMwX4/s1600/obesitycbbnhhart23.png\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When insulin fails to\nunlock our cells, the appetite is increased while the body\u2019s ability to burn\nfat is decreased. This syndrome is part of the modern problem of rising rates\nof obesity and diabetes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insulin resistance in\nthe liver, meaning that the liver stops \u201cseeing\u201d the insulin in the blood. When\nthat happens, the body starts producing even more insulin.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZNrkH0XwXhk/U_2TdfM0XhI/AAAAAAAAvMs/-cJ3z8vN_6I/s1600/if%2Bxdnsulin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZNrkH0XwXhk/U_2TdfM0XhI/AAAAAAAAvMs/-cJ3z8vN_6I/s1600/if%2Bxdnsulin.jpg\" height=\"459\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insulin resistance\nmeans that your body\u2019s muscle and liver cells don\u2019t respond adequately to\nnormal levels of insulin, the pancreatic hormone that carries glucose into the\nbody\u2019s cells. Glucose levels in the blood rise, heightening the risk for\ndiabetes.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0I3dP1DCeuA/U_2SE6LSyMI/AAAAAAAAvMY/QDsXBqXJqAA/s1600/diabetes-pump-resejbgarch-7010.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0I3dP1DCeuA/U_2SE6LSyMI/AAAAAAAAvMY/QDsXBqXJqAA/s1600/diabetes-pump-resejbgarch-7010.jpg\" height=\"305\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chronic stress can lead\nthe body to ignore the function of insulin. &nbsp;&nbsp;Insulin resistance develops when the cells\nfail to respond to insulin\u2019s message to take in glucose from the blood stream. Elevated\nblood sugar due to stress and diet contributes to the development of insulin\nresistance.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_eO8P9Y08Y0/U_2Sa50vNmI/AAAAAAAAvMg/ejjHeK4srfA/s1600/imakhbges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_eO8P9Y08Y0/U_2Sa50vNmI/AAAAAAAAvMg/ejjHeK4srfA/s1600/imakhbges.jpg\" height=\"262\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketosis is a state at\nwhich the body has an extremely high fat-burning rate. To encourage ketone\nproduction, the amount of insulin in your bloodstream must be low. &nbsp;The lower your insulin, the higher your ketone\nproduction. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HYhfdcTozdU/U_2RzWbXnaI/AAAAAAAAvMQ/emjZCNKX1zY/s1600/ibcmage008.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HYhfdcTozdU/U_2RzWbXnaI/AAAAAAAAvMQ/emjZCNKX1zY/s1600/ibcmage008.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"313\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And when you have a\nwell-controlled, sufficiently large amount of ketones in your blood, it\u2019s\nbasically proof that your insulin is very low \u2013 and therefore, that you\u2019re\nenjoying the maximum effect of your low-carbohydrate diet. &nbsp;That\u2019s what\u2019s called optimal ketosis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-io4aGO_rYZQ/U_2YgyxSBpI/AAAAAAAAvM8/qySQuQSS4Cc/s1600/Fibre_Benefits_Flow_chde3art.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-io4aGO_rYZQ/U_2YgyxSBpI/AAAAAAAAvM8/qySQuQSS4Cc/s1600/Fibre_Benefits_Flow_chde3art.jpg\" height=\"554\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the exception of\nthe brain, the highest concentration of nerve cells is found in the intestinal\nmucosa. This enables the intestine to communicate effectively with the brain\nabout what it needs and does not need.</span> <br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Z1rkd2jeR8o/U_2cXEYALBI/AAAAAAAAvNg/xLk-VlkW2zs/s1600/imkuttages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Z1rkd2jeR8o/U_2cXEYALBI/AAAAAAAAvNg/xLk-VlkW2zs/s1600/imkuttages.jpg\" height=\"146\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The intestine is our largest\nhormone-producing organ, affecting the health, metabolism and the functionality\nof the entire body.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kBDIvfHtheA/VACxTlT1i1I/AAAAAAAAvV0/m7pYbNwb1mg/s1600/gutcutarryway.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kBDIvfHtheA/VACxTlT1i1I/AAAAAAAAvV0/m7pYbNwb1mg/s1600/gutcutarryway.jpeg\" height=\"508\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gel-like substance that soluble fibers form when they\ndissolve in water causes things to swell . It hunger feelings and overall food\nintake. It decreases the number of calories that are actually absorbed from the\ningested food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wC8peQR7c7s/U_2a8ySTpxI/AAAAAAAAvNI/v-UJSeGVOko/s1600/Summary%2B-dietary%2Bfibfferes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wC8peQR7c7s/U_2a8ySTpxI/AAAAAAAAvNI/v-UJSeGVOko/s1600/Summary%2B-dietary%2Bfibfferes.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"351\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vegetables are\nnutrient-dense, meaning they pack maximum nutrition value with minimal\ncalories, leaving you more full on fewer calories. Fiber absorbs water and\ntakes up more space in your stomach, fighting off hunger pangs, too. &nbsp;&nbsp;Junk food is food that offers almost nothing\nbut calories\u2014like french fries, potato chips and sweets .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-13v-VwK8rz4/U_2bqbM3wZI/AAAAAAAAvNQ/ypVbUTv6v7M/s1600/aju8ms41.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-13v-VwK8rz4/U_2bqbM3wZI/AAAAAAAAvNQ/ypVbUTv6v7M/s1600/aju8ms41.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"183\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eating healthy fats\nlike ghee and coconut oil is good.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To get rid of that stubborn fat and start\nbuilding muscle, you need protein.&nbsp; The\nbody can burn protein to survive, but it prefers carbohydrates and fats; so\nwhen you feed it mainly protein, it will go for the carbohydrates and fats you\nalready have stored.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MoY8lA2-usw/U_2b95ZD6WI/AAAAAAAAvNY/_Dwk6QntjoY/s1600/obeity-health-frrisk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MoY8lA2-usw/U_2b95ZD6WI/AAAAAAAAvNY/_Dwk6QntjoY/s1600/obeity-health-frrisk.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/W-u7Ex9Tytw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/W-u7Ex9Tytw&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/W-u7Ex9Tytw&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The thyroid hormone\nthyroxine regulates the basal metabolic rate. People with an under-active\nthyroid gland tend to be sluggish and overweight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The thyroid\u2019s job is to\nmake thyroid hormones, which are secreted into the blood and then carried to\nevery tissue in the body.&nbsp; Thyroid\nhormone helps the body use energy, stay warm and keep the brain, heart,\nmuscles, and other organs working as they should.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cause of the weight\ngain in hypothyroid individuals is complex, and not always related to excess\nfat accumulation.&nbsp; Most of the extra\nweight gained in hypothyroid individuals is due to excess accumulation of salt\nand water.&nbsp; Massive weight gain is rarely\nassociated with hypothyroidism.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lacking a good night\u2019s\nsleep can, in fact, cause you to gain weight because it makes you feel hungry\nall the time. It\u2019s not your stomach that\u2019s asking for food but it\u2019s your mind\nthat needs feeding. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;One way to lower\nstress is to get enough sleep, ideally eight hours each night. &nbsp;REM sleep helps you to perform better at your\njob.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress eating is even\nworse when it is accompanied by insomnia, anxiety, excessive agitation, and an\ninternal \u201cwound up\u201d feeling.&nbsp;&nbsp; This means\nthe arousal thermostat is now set too high in your hypothalamus, a problem\ndriven by a certain type of nerves called hypocretins.&nbsp; These signals are core to pleasure seeking,\nwhich directly leads to excess food consumption or some other addictive\n\u201csolution\u201d in order to feel better.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iron is essential for\nproper metabolism, including normal thyroid activation and cellular function. Rather\niron is &nbsp;indispensable to your survival.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obesity-induced\ninflammation elevates a hormone called hepcidin, which has the unfortunate side\neffect of disrupting iron metabolism in your body. Inflammation associated with\nexcess body weight elevates the hormone in your liver- hepcidin, which has the\nnet effect of reducing iron absorption into your body from your digestive\ntract. The result is a metabolic nightmare of weight gain, fatigue, and poor\nthyroid function.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EwhkDKcxBaQ/U_33eq8LfsI/AAAAAAAAvN4/zXBhYlEVr9U/s1600/F1.larfjrge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EwhkDKcxBaQ/U_33eq8LfsI/AAAAAAAAvN4/zXBhYlEVr9U/s1600/F1.larfjrge.jpg\" height=\"420\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hepcidin levels\nelevate in response to inflammation. This could be from inflammation of any\ntype: infection, toxin exposure, excess alcohol, medications, injury, excess\nexercise, lack of sleep, too much stress, etc. &nbsp;&nbsp;If your body is in a state of inflammatory\nwear and tear it may be difficult to use iron in a healthy way.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rampant overuse\nof antibiotics and high-sugar diets have created an epidemic of candida\nalbicans overgrowth in overweight people. This is especially common in\noverweight people with thyroid problems.. This means that your body may raise\nhepcidin levels as part of its natural defense against candida overgrowth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ai6WP9Kdz6Y/U_33HjixsCI/AAAAAAAAvNw/WRnM5IGZVjA/s1600/F5dfg.large.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ai6WP9Kdz6Y/U_33HjixsCI/AAAAAAAAvNw/WRnM5IGZVjA/s1600/F5dfg.large.jpg\" height=\"272\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low iron turns on genes\nin your liver and muscles that promote fat storage and cause abnormal blood\nsugar elevation \u2013 precisely what goes wrong with metabolism that leads to the\nmetabolic syndrome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As you begin to lose\nweight, you reduce inflammation, hepcidin levels should come down, and the iron\nin your diet will work better.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UiCzF1CsKnI/U_339y9EWEI/AAAAAAAAvOA/VdMwjGu_uvc/s1600/adiponectecwin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UiCzF1CsKnI/U_339y9EWEI/AAAAAAAAvOA/VdMwjGu_uvc/s1600/adiponectecwin.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Body fat secretes\nadiponectin, an anti-inflammatory hormone involved in glucose regulation, fatty\nacid oxidation, triglyceride clearance, and insulin sensitivity.&nbsp; More adiponectin means better fat burning,\nfavorable blood lipids, improved glucose tolerance, and lower insulin levels.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Baby, have one more Coke-- and then Shaggy will sing !!</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Mv5d-Y85_94/U_8l27UGf9I/AAAAAAAAvT8/gaW1-6pCBII/s1600/hqdevefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Mv5d-Y85_94/U_8l27UGf9I/AAAAAAAAvT8/gaW1-6pCBII/s1600/hqdevefault.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unfortunately, the relationship between body fat and adiponectin secretion\nisn\u2019t like the one between body fat and leptin. The more body fat you have, the\nless adiponectin you secrete. That\u2019s why the obese and overweight tend to have\nlower levels of the beneficial hormone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-80yKX7Qu-hI/U_34NHwUHfI/AAAAAAAAvOI/nQgHEY651Do/s1600/db557976.yiofig1.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-80yKX7Qu-hI/U_34NHwUHfI/AAAAAAAAvOI/nQgHEY651Do/s1600/db557976.yiofig1.gif\" height=\"562\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adiponectin tells your\nbody to burn fat for fuel, but the more fat on your body, the lower your\nadiponectin levels. &nbsp;To break the cycle and kick start your adiponectin, take a\nhigh-quality magnesium supplement or eat lots of seeds and green, leafy\nvegetables.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6W3K3F0YW9o/U_60cujch6I/AAAAAAAAvR8/Kxxqj6zST70/s1600/fatpeoplvge.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6W3K3F0YW9o/U_60cujch6I/AAAAAAAAvR8/Kxxqj6zST70/s1600/fatpeoplvge.png\" height=\"640\" width=\"512\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Garlic has excellent\nanti-obesity properties. Every minute our body cells die and our body makes new\ncells to replace them. Adipocytes (also called lipocytes and fat cells) are the\ncells in our body which primarily compose adipose tissue (body fat). In the\nadipose tissue, there undergoes a process wherein pre-adipocytes are converted\ninto full-fledged adipose tissue or fat. This process is known as adipogenesis.\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\">Garlic inhibits this\nprocess of adipogenisis or the process of making fat. &nbsp;Garlic stops your pre fat cells from\nconverting into fat cells.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperuricemia is an\nexcess of uric acid in the blood. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Uric\nacid passes through the liver, and enters the bloodstream. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purines are\nnitrogen-containing compounds, which are made inside the cells of your body\n(endogenous).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or it comes from\noutside of your body, from intake of foods containing purine (exogenous).&nbsp; Purines are components of nucleosides, the\nbuilding blocks of DNA and RNA.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why fermented beer is very bad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purine breaks down into\nuric acid. &nbsp;Increased levels of uric acid\nfrom excess purines may accumulate in your tissues, and form crystals. This may\ncause high uric acid levels in the blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purines are abundant in\nmeats.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excess purine\nnucleosides are removed from the body by breakdown in the liver and excretion\nfrom the kidneys.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When uric acid levels\nbuild up and become high, there is an increased risk of developing kidney\nproblems and arthritis .&nbsp; Some of the\nmost common forms of arthritis are osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, and\ngout.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Osteoarthritis is the\nmost common.. It is a degenerative joint disease that frequently develops\nfollowing trauma or infection of a joint, and it can also occur as a result of\naging.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rheumatoid arthritis is\nan autoimmune disease in which the body\u2019s immune system starts attacking its\nown tissues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gout &nbsp;is the most painful form of arthritis. &nbsp;Deposits of uric acid crystals in the joints\ncause redness, inflammation, and intense pain. &nbsp;&nbsp;Most&nbsp; experience\ntheir first gout attack in the big toe, or the metatarsophalangeal joint of the\nbig toe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Henry of England\nhad terrible Gout.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have heard a Olympic\nchampion &nbsp;say on TV, 25 years ago, &nbsp;that they usually piss into the swimming pool\nwhile training. &nbsp;Piss combined with\nchlorine in water aint no good. &nbsp;Chlorination\nis used primarily to prevent pathogenic microorganisms from growing. The\ndisinfection byproducts include cyanogen chloride (CNCl) and trichloramine\n(NCl3). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cyanogen chloride is a toxic\ncompound that affects many organs, including the lungs, heart and central\nnervous system by inhalation. &nbsp;Uric acid\nfrom piss is \"an efficient precursor to the formation of CNCl and NCl3. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Mind it !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CJl8T0G7edY/U-tJK0HtlPI/AAAAAAAAuhQ/PxXF0c9-_IM/s1600/imadfqges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other joints such as\nthe ankles, wrists, fingers, or elbows may be affected. &nbsp;The pain can be so intense that even the\npressure of a light bed sheets cover may be unbearable. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Often, the attack wakes\na person from sleep. The toe is very sore, red, warm, and swollen. Attacks\noften begin in the early morning reach a peak within 6 to 24 hours. Even\nwithout treatment, the attacks typically subside spontaneously within several\ndays to two weeks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xWApMcaczzc/U-tKOHxSOCI/AAAAAAAAuhk/Xnbw7beczl4/s1600/gout-and-uric-acDE2RQid-medicine-500x500.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
