font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acute gout attacks can\nalso be accompanied by high fever and leukocytosis (elevated white blood cell\ncount.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deposits of uric acid\n(called tophi) &nbsp;look like lumps under the\nskin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Uric acid levels can be\nmeasured by a blood test. &nbsp;Uric acid\nformation may occur when the blood uric acid level rises above 7 mg/dL. &nbsp;High uric acid levels can be caused by medical\ndisorders like diabetes, kidney stones, kidney disease, and certain blood\ndisorders. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you have a kidney\ndisease, it is not be able to clear the uric acid out of your system, thus\ncausing hyperuricemia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are some medications\nthat can cause increased levels of uric acid. These include aspirin, diuretics,\nvitamin C,&nbsp; caffeine etc . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Uric acid levels are\ncontrolled by the rate of uric acid production ( synthesis in the liver ) and the\nrate of uric acid excretion via kidneys .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excretion has the\ngreatest effect on blood uric acid levels, with about 90% of hyperuricemia\ncases attributed to impaired renal excretion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though it is termed as\na &nbsp;\"waste product\" of purine\nmetabolism, only about 10% of the uric acid that enters a normal human kidney\nis excreted from the body. &nbsp;&nbsp;A &nbsp;healthy kidney returns up to 90% of it to the\nblood stream. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Uric acid as one of the\nmost important antioxidants in body fluids, responsible for the neutralization\nof over 50% of the free radicals in the blood stream.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Uric acid is responsible for maintaining the health of our blood\nvessel linings.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperuricemia and gout\nare both risk factors for kidney or bladder stones (urolithiasis). Both\nconditions increase the risk of forming not only uric acid stones, but also the\nmore common calcium oxalate stones. &nbsp;The\npresence of calcium oxalate stones is 10-30 times higher in gout patients than\nthose without gout. &nbsp;Prior to the\ndevelopment of uric acid lowering treatments, kidney disease occurred in up to\n40% of gout patients; renal failure was the usual cause of death in 25% of\nthese patients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Levels of uric acid may\nincrease in the blood if a patient has kidney damage leading to poor excretion\nof uric acid, or if there is an over production of uric acid in the blood due\nto ingestion of excessive purine-rich foods. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatinine level will\nnot increase until about 45-50% of kidney function is lost as our kidneys have\nvery strong compensatory ability. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The urine carries\nsalts, including calcium oxalate, uric acid, cystine, or xanthine.&nbsp;&nbsp; These salts can become extremely\nconcentrated if there is not enough urine, or if unusually high amounts of\ncrystal-forming salts are present.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enzymes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">These substances allow\nsalt in the urine to be at higher-than-normal concentrations without forming\ncrystals . They prevent crystal formation - coat the crystals and prevent them\nfrom sticking to the surface of kidney tubes&nbsp;\nNot having enough of these protective substances can cause stones. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changes in the acid balance of the urine can affect stone formation. Uric acid\nand cystine stones mainly form in acidic urine. Calcium phosphate and struvite\nstones increase in alkaline urine.&nbsp; This\nis why things have to be in balance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Primary hyperoxaluria\nis an inherited disorder in which too much oxalate in the urine is the main\nproblem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secondary hyperoxaluria\nis usually caused by too much dietary oxalates (found in a number of common\nvegetables, fruits, and grains) or by problems in the body's breakdown of\noxalates. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Too much uric acid\nproduction can be taxing on the kidneys. &nbsp;The human kidney is a master Tamas Sattwa Rajas\n( Brahma/ Vishnu/ Shiva ) balancer as it ensures the right balance between uric\nacid that is needed for different bodily processes and left over uric acid that\nneeds to dealt with.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When too much uric acid\nis taken in, the kidneys process what is needed and then use the excess uric\nacid to form crystals. These crystals are then deposited into natural storage\nareas in our bodies.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vlynReh7WIk/U-teknK3tjI/AAAAAAAAujA/yzlmnvbNjJw/s1600/sliF2FWde006.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vlynReh7WIk/U-teknK3tjI/AAAAAAAAujA/yzlmnvbNjJw/s1600/sliF2FWde006.gif\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unfortunately for\nhumans, these storage areas are in various joints like elbows and knees, or far\noff appendages like toes. &nbsp;When too many\nof these crystals build up in these areas they cause inflammation , unbearable\npain and swelling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keep your body well\nhydrated, drinking upto 3 liters of water per day, unless you were told\notherwise. &nbsp;Do NOT hydrate with beer as despite\nhaving less alcohol per serving than the other beverages, is more hyperuricemic\ndue to its high purine content .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7PS7RdS4mEU/U-ted2urxII/AAAAAAAAui4/UpeOEwQnsGM/s1600/imaFE32Wges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7PS7RdS4mEU/U-ted2urxII/AAAAAAAAui4/UpeOEwQnsGM/s1600/imaFE32Wges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Treatments for gout are\nnot very effective and have undesirable side effects.&nbsp;&nbsp; The most common treatments include the\nadministration of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) such as\nibuprofen.&nbsp; Aspirin is not used because\nit aggravates hyperuricemia by increasing uric acid retention. Side effects\nof&nbsp; medications can cause stomach pain,\nbleeding and ulcers, and beyond a certain dosage, they do not provide\nadditional relief.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Corticosteroids, such\nas prednisone, are prescribed for severe cases of gout. Although these steroids\ncan provide relief, they also have serious side effects, including thinning\nbones, poor wound healing, and a weakened immune system. Cortisone injections\ninto an affected joint are generally limited to no more than three per year\nbecause of the side effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X-trtK5cR1c/U-teYnYu2yI/AAAAAAAAuiw/ci1jXdJJu6g/s1600/imagHTRes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X-trtK5cR1c/U-teYnYu2yI/AAAAAAAAuiw/ci1jXdJJu6g/s1600/imagHTRes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Allopurinol,\nprobenecid, and colchicine are sometimes prescribed in daily doses to reduce\nthe risk or lessen the severity of future episodes. Allopurinol blocks the\nformation of uric acid, probenecid decreases the frequency of attacks of gout\nby increasing the kidney\u2019s excretion of uric acid, and colchicine may relieve\nswelling and help prevent the frequency of gout attacks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The above para is just\nfor information and NOT to do self medication. &nbsp;Rely only on doctor\u2019s advise.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These drugs speed the elimination of uric\nacid from the body, and they also slow down the rate at which it is produced,\nbut they may cause nausea or skin rashes as side effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gout patients had\nincreased incidence of all types of cancer, including cancers of the oral\ncavity, pharynx, colon, liver and biliary tract, pancreas, lung, skin (melanoma\nand nonmelanoma), endometrium and kidney, as well as of malignant melanoma.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LBqWAc10WaY/U-teTjafO2I/AAAAAAAAuio/o1tAgxCstRc/s1600/lithotripsy%2BD33rocedure.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LBqWAc10WaY/U-teTjafO2I/AAAAAAAAuio/o1tAgxCstRc/s1600/lithotripsy%2BD33rocedure.jpg\" height=\"488\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DNA and RNA are called\nnucleic acids because they reside in the nucleus of the cells. Uric acid is\nproduced from the oxidation of adenine and guanine in these nucleic acids. &nbsp;Milk contains no purines because it consists\nof fats, casein and whey proteins, but no cell nuclei. Fermented milk products,\nsuch as yogurt and aged cheeses, have purines from the nucleic acids of the\nbacterial cells that proliferate during fermentation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in Kerala never had&nbsp; gout. &nbsp;Now,\nour hospitals are full of gout party ,mostly Muslims and Christians who eat\nbeef and offal . Of course all drink soft drinks like Coke with HFCS. Any young\nman who drinks two cans of Coke a day are 97 percent more likely to develop the\ndisease, as per US surveys.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu method of\nfasting and breaking fast with foods of low purine content , meals loaded with\nTurmeric/ Garlic / Spices &nbsp;kept them away\nfrom gout.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A gout attack can be\nbrought on by stressful events\u2014so be a cool cat !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Annalen der Physik , <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">USING THE SAME EQUATION&nbsp;E=MC^2&nbsp;</span></i></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For his brilliant work in this area, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hasen\u00f6hrl had received in 1904 a prize from\nthe prestigious Vienna Academy of Sciences.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The math equation and\nrelationship of mass / energy was a simple deduction from the already\nwell-known equations of Scottish physicist <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>James Clerk Maxwell</b></span>. &nbsp;&nbsp;Scientists\nlong understood that the mathematical relationship is expressed by the equation\nE=MC^2.&nbsp; &nbsp;Maxwell died in 1879 AD. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lorentz, <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Michelson, and\nMorley</span></b> reached the conclusion that the velocity of light was independent of the\nvelocity of the observer.. &nbsp;I</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">n 1880, the Irish\nphysicist <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">George FitzGerald</span></b>, who had also first proposed a mechanism for\nproducing radio waves, wrote a paper which stated that the results of the Michelson-Morley experiment could be explained if, \u201d\u2026the length of material\nbodies changes, according as they are moving through the either or across it by\nan amount depending on the square of the ratio of their velocities to that of\nlight.\u201d</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idea that speed of\nlight is a constant and is independent of the motion of its source was proposed\nfirst by James Maxwell in 1878 AD. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">James Maxwell wrote an article to this effect\nfor the 1878 edition of the Encyclopedia Britannica.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Albert Einstein is credited with this by R monopolized\npeer reviewed media..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Italian <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Olinto De\nPretto</b></span> from Venice had published the equation E=mc^2 in a scientific magazine,\nAtte, in 1903.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Henri Poincar\u00e9</span>&nbsp;</b> had developed the theory of relativity&nbsp; earlier than &nbsp;Einstein's 1905 paper on relativity. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Einstein was asked\nabout Poincare , he asked \u201cPoincare who ?\u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He pretended he never heard of this famous genius. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then how did Poincar\u00e9's\nideas \u2013 say- the speed of light is a limit and that mass increases with speed \u2013\nland up in Einstein's paper, \"On the Electrodynamics of Moving\nBodies\" ? Nobody dared to ask.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Einstein had read\nPoincare's work on relativity up to 1902. &nbsp; It is on record that Einstein said\nthat it kept him and his friend&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Maurice Solovine&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"breathless with excitement for weeks\". &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While Poincar\u00e9 was busy\nbringing the rest of the academic world up to speed regarding relativity, Jew Einstein\nwas still working in the patent &nbsp;office\nin Bern and no one in the academic community thought it necessary to give much\ncredence or mention to Einstein\u2019splaigiarised &nbsp;work. Most of these early physicists knew that\nhe was a moron and a &nbsp;fraud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The equations of\ngeneral relativity were by<span style=\"color: blue;\"> <b>David Hilbert</b></span> . Hilbert made the critical mistake of\nsending the equations in a letter to Einstein. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For a long time, it was\nbelieved that Einstein and Hilbert found the field equations of gravity\nindependently. &nbsp;While Hilbert's paper was submitted earlier than Einstein's, it\nonly appeared in 1916, well after after Einstein's field equations paper had\nappeared in print ,thanks to R.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At that time Einstein was lecturing merrily and\nusing the wrong equations. &nbsp;&nbsp;Immediately after\nreceiving Hilbert's letter, Einstein claimed to have \"independently\nrediscovered\" the very same equations of general relativity!<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Einstein did not solve\nthe equations either. The three famous tests of relativity used the solution\nobtained by<span style=\"color: blue;\"> <b>Karl Schwarzschild</b></span>, with no credits .</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 7000 year old Vedic\ntheory that \u201cenergy and matter are inter convertible \u201c was known to <span style=\"color: blue;\">Newton </span>(\"Gross\nbodies and light are convertible into one another...\", 1704). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The equation E=MC^2 was also known by &nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Samuel Tolver Preston</b></span> .</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nhis book Physics of the Ether (1875) he claimed that if matter is subdivided\ninto ether particles, they would travel at the speed of light and represent an\nenormous amount of energy. In this way, one grain of matter would contain\nenergy equal to 1000 millions of foot-tons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Einstein did not cite Dutchman\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hendrik Antoon Lorentz</span></b> in his &nbsp;paper\n\"On the Electrodynamics of Moving Bodies\"(1905). &nbsp;Einstein feigned complete &nbsp;ignorance of Lorentz's work which derived the\ntransformation equations subsequently used by Albert Einstein to describe space\nand time. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">All throughout the 1890\u2019s, both Lorentz and FitzGerald worked on these ideas and wrote articles strangely similar to Einstein\u2019s Special Theory detailing what is now known as the Lorentz-Fitz Gerald Contraction.</span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Einstein did NOT give\nany credit to his Math teacher <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hermann Minkowski</span></b>. Einstein ran away from Minkowski\u2019s\nadvanced courses on mathematics, as he could NOT grasp it. </span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Minkowski had reformulated special\ntheory of relativity (STR) in terms of a four-dimensional space-time manifold. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Einstein smirked to R media &nbsp;\u201c I consider Minkowski\u2019s\nreformulation of my theory to be no more than \u201csuperfluous erudition and since\nhe pounced on my relativity theory I no longer understand myself.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That there was an\nequivalence between mass and energy had been shown in the laboratory in the\n1890s by both <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Joseph JohnThomsom</b></span>&nbsp;and by <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Walter Kaufmann.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are many other scientists\nwhose works were usurped Einstein failed to mention -- <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Woldemar Voigt, &nbsp;August F\u00f6ppl, Joseph Larmor, Emil Cohn, Max von Laue, Gilbert Newton Lewis , &nbsp;Richard Chase Tolman ,&nbsp;</span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Gauss, &nbsp;</span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Riemann, William Kingdon Clifford, Ricci, Levi-Civita,\nPaul Gerbe </span></b>&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">etc.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the components\nof Einstein's paper appeared in others' anterior works on the electrodynamics\nof moving bodies. Poincar\u00e9 and <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Alfred Bucherer</b></span> had the relativity principle.\nLorentz and Larmor had most of the Lorentz transformations, Poincar\u00e9 had them\nall. Larmor and Cohn alluded to the dilation of time. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The truth of space time\ndilation is mentioned our Vedas 700 years before .&nbsp; That a twin launched into space on a ship\ntraveling near the speed of light would find on his return that he had aged\nmore slowly than his brother left at the surface.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact the Vedas story goes faster than light and the story is more lucid &nbsp;. How has\nEinstein found this out , with his poor abilities in Math ? He does NOT have a\nfractal math brain !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today the west have\nacknowledged the brilliance of the Vedic Maharishis.&nbsp; In 1976, the Smithsonian Astrophysical\nObservatory launched a rocket that carried a clock 6,000 miles away from the\nground, where the pull of gravity is weaker. &nbsp;When the clock returned to the surface, it had\nsped up -- compared to clocks on the ground -- by about one second every 70\nyears. &nbsp;Time dilation over great\ndistances has also been measured in clocks flown around the world on airplanes\nand sent to Mars on spacecraft.&nbsp;&nbsp; Satellites\nin orbit must compensate for it to keep GPS networks functioning properly.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me just quote one\nof them from Srimad-Bhagavatam 9.3.28-32<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a story of a\nking named Kakudmi, who was able to travel to the world of Brahma and experience\nBrahma\u2019s scale of time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taking his own\ndaughter, Revati, Kakudmi went to Lord Brahma in Brahmaloka, which is\ntranscendental to the three modes of material nature, and inquired about a\nhusband for her. When Kakudmi arrived there, Lord Brahma was engaged in hearing\nmusical performances by the Gandharvas and had not a moment to talk with him.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore Kakudmi waited, and at the end of the musical performances he offered\nhis obeisances to Lord Brahma and thus submitted his long-standing desire.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WKLLgewpRjs/U-xoARbFZnI/AAAAAAAAul8/SV17elIdqgI/s1600/images.jpgcffer4h6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"379\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WKLLgewpRjs/U-xoARbFZnI/AAAAAAAAul8/SV17elIdqgI/s1600/images.jpgcffer4h6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After hearing his\nwords, Lord Brahma, who is most powerful, laughed loudly and said to Kakudmi,--\u201c<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">O King, all those whom you may have decided within the core of your heart to\naccept as your son-in-law have passed away in the course of time. Twenty-seven\ncatur-yugas have already passed. Those upon whom you may have decided are now\ngone, and so are their sons, grandsons, and other descendants. You cannot even\nhear about their names</span></i>.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: &nbsp;Lord Brahma enjoying a dance performance , with king Revata ( Kakudmi) and daughter ( Revati ) waiting&nbsp;</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GnmLksU2MBI/U-xnnLg97uI/AAAAAAAAul0/95RNrIq9OIw/s1600/imagedfgs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"211\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GnmLksU2MBI/U-xnnLg97uI/AAAAAAAAul0/95RNrIq9OIw/s1600/imagedfgs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Kakudmi\u2019s visit to\nBrahmaloka took 27 times 4,320,000 earth years.&nbsp;\nBrahma\u2019s time King Kakudmi\u2019s visit lasted 3,456 seconds, or just under\nan hour.&nbsp; The king had had to wait for a\nmusical performance to finish before having a brief conversation with Lord\nBrahma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Below : King Kakudmi and daughter Revati doing faster than light vimana travel to meet Lord Brahma -- </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">blatantly lifted by the white physicist .</span></b></span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"On the\nElectrodynamics of Moving Bodies\", was published on June 30, 1905. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"295\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1mSRJbykOVk/U-9EC5y-ITI/AAAAAAAAurg/OnT7Irp6J58/s1600/dowbfxnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">See, &nbsp;E=MC^2 formula belong\nto Einstein\u2014 it is etched on the cosmos by R media\u2014 if you contest it you will\nbe sued for being anti-Semitic - it is a crime to tell the truth about the\nhistory of the special theory of relativity?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-88eHVX6v9rI/U-9CxKUYkdI/AAAAAAAAurQ/q4QsOFbosAU/s1600/imagesCAKTA09D.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"152\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-88eHVX6v9rI/U-9CxKUYkdI/AAAAAAAAurQ/q4QsOFbosAU/s1600/imagesCAKTA09D.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Einstein\u2019s paper on\nBrownian motion explained the random movement of very small objects as direct\nevidence of molecular action, thus supporting the atomic theory. &nbsp;The movement had first been observed by the\nScottish botanist Robert Brown in 1827</span> .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brown did not provide a theory to\nexplain the motion, as&nbsp;&nbsp;Dutchman<span style=\"color: red;\"> Jan\nIngenhousz</span> already had reported a similar effect using charcoal particles, in\nGerman and French publications of 1784 and 1785, the phenomenon is now known as\nBrownian motion.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\n1785, Ingenhousz described the irregular movement of coal dust on the surface\nof alcohol and therefore has a claim as discoverer of what came to be known as\nBrownian motion. Ingenhousz was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society of London\nin 1779.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">American <span style=\"color: red;\">Josiah Gibbs</span>\nand the Austrian L<span style=\"color: red;\">udwig Boltzmann </span>who first explained this occurrence, not\nAlbert Einstein. In fact, the mathematical equation describing the motion\ncontains the famous Boltzmann constant, k. Between these two men, they had\nexplained by the 1890s everything in Einstein\u2019s 1905 paper regarding Brownian\nmotion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/wDfQqbWTP58/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/wDfQqbWTP58&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/wDfQqbWTP58&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1921 Einstein was\nawarded the Nobel Prize in Physics, \"for his services to Theoretical\nPhysics, and especially for his discovery of the law of the photoelectric\neffect\". This refers to his 1905 paper on the photoelectric effect. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He just lifted from <span style=\"color: red;\">Philipp Eduard Anton von\nLenard</span> a German who was a supporter of Hitler. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A paper by Phillip\nLenard in said that the energy of the electrons emitted would not change as a\nfunction of the intensity of the light that was directed at an object, but it\nwould increase in response to light of shorter wavelengths.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Max Planck </span>&nbsp;in a paper written in 1900 and published in\n1901 said that &nbsp;the wave length (or\nenergy) spectrum of the emitted electrons was not continuous. Rather the\nemitted electrons were to be found only at certain wavelengths.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To describe\nthis phenomenon and make the equations work, Planck introduced a constant, h,\neventually known as Planck's constant. Planck believed that the constant\nrepresented only a mathematical manipulation or perhaps a quality of the\nelectrons in a peculiar state in heated bodies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Albert Einstein's paper\non the photoelectric effect was called \"On a heuristic point of view\nconcerning the production and transformation of light.\" A heuristic\nexplanation is one which is adopted because it is useful, though it is not\nnecessarily a description of \"reality.\" Einstein was unable &nbsp;to carry the implications of his theory to\ntheir logical conclusions.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main point of\nEinstein's paper for which he is given credit, is that light is\nemitted and absorbed in finite packets called quanta. &nbsp;This was the explanation\nfor the photoelectric effect. The photoelectric effect had already been explained by Heinrich\nHertz in 1888. &nbsp;Hertz and Philipp Lenard, worked on understanding this\nphenomenon. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Wilhelm Wien </span>and Planck were\ncolleagues and they were the fathers of modern day quantum theory. By 1900, Max\nPlanck, based upon his and Wien's work, had shown that radiated energy was\nabsorbed and emitted in finite units called quanta. The only difference in his\nwork of 1900 and Einstein's work of 1905 was that Einstein limited himself to\ntalking about one particular type of energy\u2014light energy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the principles\nand equations governing the process in general had been deduced by Planck in\n1900. Einstein himself admitted that the obvious conclusion of Planck's work\nwas that light also existed in discrete packets of energy. Thus, nothing in\nthis paper of Einstein's was original.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you ask anybody, who\nis the MOST EVIL MAN on this planet\u201499.99% people will say Hitler.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wanna know who Hitler\nwas ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Under the pretentious\nname \u201cArbeitsgemeinschaft deutscher Naturforscher\u201d [\u201cWorking Society of German\nScientists\u201d], a variegated society has assembled whose provisional purpose of\nexistence seems to be to degrade, in the eyes of nonscientists, the theory of\nrelativity, as well as me as its originator.... I have good reason to believe\nthat motives other than the striving for truth are at the bottom of this\nbusiness. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many a time when caught\nwith his pants down cheating , he would strike back with sarcasm. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, in 1931 a\nbook was published entitled \"100 Authors against Einstein\" in which\nEinstein's theories were refuted. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAll perceptible matter\ncomes from a primary substance, or tenuity beyond conception, filling all\nspace, the akasha or luminiferous ether, which is acted upon by the life giving\nPrana or creative force, calling into existence, in never-ending cycles all\nthings and phenomena.\u201d- &nbsp;Nikola Tesla,\nMan\u2019s Greatest Achievement, 1907 (1)(2)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nikola Tesla was introduced\nby Swami Vivekananda to &nbsp;ancient concepts\n.This is why he used&nbsp; Sanskrit worlds\nlike \u201cakasha,\u201d and \u201cprana\u201d to describe the force and matter that exists all\naround us. &nbsp;These words come from the\nUpanishads&nbsp; and Vedas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vivekananda wrote a\nlater to Tesla in the late 1800\u2019s :-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cMr. Tesla thinks he\ncan demonstrate mathematically that force and matter are reducible to potential\nenergy. I am to go and see him next week to get this new mathematical\ndemonstration. In that case the Vedantic cosmology will be placed on the surest\nof foundations. I am working a good deal now upon the cosmology and eschatology\nof the Vedanta. I clearly see their perfect union with modern science, and the\nelucidation of the one will be followed by that of the other.\u201d - Swami\nVivekananda (Complete Works, VOL. V, Fifth Edition, 1347, p. 77). (1)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSwami Vivekananda was\nhopeful that Tesla would be able to show that what we call matter is simply\npotential energy because that would reconcile the teachings of the Vedas with\nmodern science. The Swami realized that in that case, the Vedantic cosmology\n(would) be placed on the surest of foundations. Tesla understood the Sanskrit\nterminology and philosophy and found that it was a good means to describe the\nphysical mechanisms of the universe as seen through his eyes. It would behoove\nthose who would attempt to understand the science behind the inventions of\nNikola Tesla to study Sanskrit and Vedic philosophy.\u201d&nbsp; \u2013 Toby Grotz, President, Wireless Engineering<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cEre many generations pass,\nour machinery will be driven by a power obtainable at any point in the\nuniverse. This idea is not novel\u2026We find it in the delightful myth of Antheus,\nwho derives power from the earth; we find it among subtle speculations of one\nof your splendid mathematicians\u2026.Throughout space there is energy. Is this\nenergy static, or kinetic? If static our hopes are in vain; if kinetic \u2013 and\nthis we know it is, for certain \u2013 then it is a mere question of time when men\nwill succeed in attaching their machinery to the very wheel work of nature.\u201d \u2013\nNikola Tesla<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">He was in London when JC Bose lost his research\npapers from his hotel room, including the circuit diagrams.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Later it was found that\nMarconi used exactly the same circuit diagram ( Coherer with telephone detector\n) invented by Bose. Thief Marconi could NOT explain how this circuit works. </b></span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">He then gave the lame\nexcuse that a Italian Naval Engineer Solari developed it. Solari when asked to\nexplain , refused point blank and said that he has nothing to do with it.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Marconi then insisted that Italian professor\nTimasina drew the circuits, which Timasina again could NOT explain properly.\nThe next man liar Marconi had in line in line was Paolo Castellini , who could\nalso not explain how the circuit works.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">JC Bose did NOT want to\nvisit USA and he never did so. Vivekananda tried to set matters straight by\ntaking a copy of JC Bose's work and giving it to his disciple in USA , Sara\nChapman Bull, to file for a Patent in USA. Though she filed the application in\n1901, the racists at the Patent Office granted it only on 29th March 1904 (\nPatent number US 755840 ).<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The Marconi scandal was\na hushed up scandal that broke in the summer of 1912. It centred on allegations\nthat highly-placed Zionist members of the corrupt Liberal Govt , under Prime\nMinister HH. Asquith, (who was a Rothschild stooge) were heavily bribed by\nRothschild for improper use of information about the Government's intentions\nwith respect to the Marconi Company--<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">-- knowing that the\ngovernment was about to issue a lucrative contract to the British Marconi\ncompany for the Imperial Wireless Chain, they had bought shares in the\nRothschild American subsidiary.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Marconi operating from\nChelsmford was synonymous with World Communications in the Morse age\u2014every\ncommunications would be eaves-dropped by R agents.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">JC Bose should have\nreceived Nobel prize twice as a brown Indian. One for radio and the other for P\nand N type Semiconductors. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">If he was a White\nEuropean Jew sponsored by R , he would have got several Nobel prizes.</span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &nbsp; </b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Athletes cannot be\nworld champions unless their coaches have an elementary knowledge about ATP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why I had penned a post more than 4 years ago .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowing how people took\nadvantage of Subbharow and leeched off him all his life, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">a concerned colleague Nobel laureate in\nMedicine, George Hitchings said, <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cSome of the nucleotides isolated by Subbarao\nhad to be rediscovered years later by other workers because Fiske, apparently\nout of jealousy, did not let Subbarao\u2019s contributions see the light of the\nday!</span></i>\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who is Fiske?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everybody knew that\nFiske rode on Subbarow\u2019s shoulders and used reflected glory to personal fame.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet, they wanted humble\nand modest Subbrow to say it himself and point the \u201cyou stole from me \u201c finger\nat his boss.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>So when Fiske was being\nconsidered for promotion as Chairman of Biochemistry at the Harvard Medical\nSchool, &nbsp;Subbarao testified &nbsp;that all the discoveries they had jointly made\nwere due to the ideas of Fiske and he was only a pair of hands . </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This is the difference between German Jew Albert Einstein and Indian Niyogi Brahmin Hindu Yellapragada Subbarow.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subbarow was denied\ntenure at Harvard and remained without a green card throughout his life, though\nhe would lead some of America's most important medical research during World\nWar II.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were no other\nhuman being in the documented history of biology and medicine ( since Charaka )\nwho made such a large number of basic discoveries that are&nbsp; applied so widely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a great indicator\n, that the Nobel &nbsp;Committee though they never\nconsidered him for an award ( as there we NO patents in his name ) hung\nYellapragada Subbarow\u2019s &nbsp;portrait in\ntheir office.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A fungus was named\nSubbaromyces splendens in his honor by American Cyanamid. &nbsp;Writing in the April\n1950 issue of Argosy, Doron K. Antrim observed, \"You've probably never\nheard of Dr. Yellapragada Subbarow. Yet because he lived you may be alive and\nare well today. Because he lived you may live longer.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yellapragada Subbarow\nNEVER granted interviews to the press. &nbsp;He\nNEVER made the rounds of the academies which apportion accolades among the\nachievers. &nbsp;He NEVER &nbsp;went on self marketing lecture tours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since Subbarow failed\nto say \u201c I invented so and so \u201c\u2014 others who were hanging around with him,\nhaving zilch brains , went to town claiming his work using their media agents. &nbsp;And he did nothing to fight the.&nbsp; Probably this is the reason why he died at a\nyoung age of 53.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">You must know that the RAMANUJANs\nLOST NOTEBOOK &nbsp;is a separate post in\nWikipedia by itself \u2013 like the prick of Rasputin.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Because all know that people\nused his work and claimed world fame.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">All in Cambridge were\nin awe of super genius Srinivasa Ramanujan .&nbsp;\nHe was the second Indian to become a Fellow of the Royal Society in 1918\n( the first went to Adershir Cursetjee whose father was a Mumbai partner\nof&nbsp; opium drug runners Rothschild , and\nwho built the Cutty Sark with teak ). &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">However Ramanujan became the youngest Fellows\nin the entire history of the Royal Society.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Many bad things happened to\nRamanujan in Cambridge, including his work getting stolen. Being a simpleton\nand a gentleman he kept quiet.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Just like Nikola Tesla he would keep the proofs\nin his head. He did NOT make any notebook jottings while he was in England.\nWhatever he work was published , that was it.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">He published 21 papers there,\nfive of which had Hardy\u2019s name ( who did nothing ) as partner . It took a while\nfor him to catch on.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">His British\nsponsors would take a solved theorem from him, and pass it on to some Jew in\nPoland. Then it would be quickly translated to Polish, and the next week,\nRamanujam would be asked \" Have you heard of a Polish Mathematician by the\nname of so and so-- because he has done the same work, last year!\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The whole world knows\nabout the LOST NOTE BOOK OF RAMANUJAN .&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">This lost work included detailed work\non Vedic sciences of&nbsp; Fractals,\npredictive modelling of String Theory, worm holes, Golden ratios, faster than light\ninterstellar travel, Mandalas of microcosm and macrocosm like the Fractal Sri\nYantra.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Ramanujan\u2019s deep\nunderstanding of Cosmic Consciousness, Fractal connectivity of the Cosmos ,\nfractal collective sub conscious , Akashic memories, Portals, Fractal effect on\nGravity for the Theory of everything -TOE, ,&nbsp;\nwere reflected in his lost work.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">He could pour his heart out only to his\nwife and they were honourable and dignified people , NOT prone to making\nallegations.&nbsp; Even if he felt aggrieved\nwhom was he gonna complain to. Even a letter took 2 months to reach.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Even honourable Nikola\nTesla did not make allegations , though he knew the role of Rothschild agent JP\nMorgan and those who burned down his lab and how Edison and Marconi stole his\nwork.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">It is rumoured that the\nmilitary was behind this lost book, and that Ramanujan was poisoned. All peer\nreviewed magazines did propaganda that Ramanujan was made of weak stock, and\nthat he had lost couple of brothers and sisters at childbirth.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
