, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">By 2.5 years\nin England Ramanujan started having strange illnesses which affected his\nthinking process Ramanujan died of a strange disease&nbsp; in Kumbakonam India on April 26, 1920\u2014which\nthe British said was Tuberculosis..<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramanujan\u2019s</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; young&nbsp;</span></span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">widow, S. Janaki Ammal, lived in Chennai\n(formerly Madras) until her death in 1994.</span></i>&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>During his funeral this shy and\nsimple woman who got married to him at the age of 9, broke down in sheer grief\nand told some of Ramanujan\u2019s well wishers that her husband has told her in sadness , that\nseveral of his critical papers were stolen in England.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The lost notebook (\njust some 87 loose paper sheets , rest about Fractals were stolen) of valuable\nwork done in India in his final year of his life, was finally found by George\nAndrews in 1976 in England at Wren Library of Trinity college .&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 115%;\">MARK MY WORDS \u2014 WITH RISE OF BRICS,&nbsp; NARENDRA MODI WILL BE CONVERTED TO ANOTHER\nHITLER--</span></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 115%;\">YOU ALL HAVE A GENERAL IDEA WHO THESE &nbsp;R CONTROLLED TV ANCHORS, PRIME TIME MOTH EATEN FACED DEBATERS &nbsp;AND PRINT MEDIA JOURNALISTS ARE .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , sans-serif; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Some of Subbarow's &nbsp;major\ndiscoveries were:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">1) FOLIC ACID:(1945):&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">An <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>essential vitamin</b></span>\nfor the development of growing cells, Blood and Brain. Folic acid cures\ntropical sprue, which killed his brother. Folic acid is used for preventing and\ntreating low blood levels of folic acid (folic acid deficiency), as well as its\ncomplications, including \u201ctired blood\u201d (anemia) and the inability of the bowel\nto absorb nutrients properly. Folic acid is also used for other conditions\ncommonly associated with folic acid deficiency, including ulcerative colitis,\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">liver disease</span>, alcoholism, and <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">kidney dialysis</span>.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-p3Vu0cFWTPs/U_F9A4qfc-I/AAAAAAAAuwU/Pcce2yvE2qc/s1600/ffffdownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"203\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-p3Vu0cFWTPs/U_F9A4qfc-I/AAAAAAAAuwU/Pcce2yvE2qc/s1600/ffffdownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Women who are pregnant or might become pregnant take folic acid to\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">prevent miscarriage</span> and \u201cneural tube defects,\u201d birth defects such as spina\nbifida that occur when the fetus\u2019s spine and back don\u2019t close during\ndevelopment. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">The US government has\nsince January 1, 1988 required that all flour, pasta and other grain products\nbe enriched with folic acid to stave off <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">spinal-cord defects</span> in newborns.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">2)METHOTREXATE:(1948) -</span></span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">It is the underlying\ndrug in many <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Cancer </b>treatments, is a derivative of Aminopterin which was\nisolated by Subbarow as anti folic acid substance.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-F0nmmPITkiQ/U_F8zoQJZKI/AAAAAAAAuwM/5cEPSVl2v4Y/s1600/imarjrt5ge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"217\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-F0nmmPITkiQ/U_F8zoQJZKI/AAAAAAAAuwM/5cEPSVl2v4Y/s1600/imarjrt5ge.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Methotrexate can </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">treat cancer that are very severe and that\ncannot be treated with other medications. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Low dose methotrexate\nis used to treat a wide variety of non-cancerous diseases such as rheumatoid\narthritis, lupus, psoriasis, asthma and inflammatory bowel disease.</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">3) HETRAZAN:(1947)&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">The medicine for\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Filariasis</b>, or elephant legs.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Diethyl carbazamin an anthelmintic drug used\nin the treatment of filariasis in humans.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5pMnYAOA_hI/U_F8VR0czPI/AAAAAAAAuwE/TuAOM8w6VLs/s1600/downlccdoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"160\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5pMnYAOA_hI/U_F8VR0czPI/AAAAAAAAuwE/TuAOM8w6VLs/s1600/downlccdoad.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Hetrazan, an anthelmintic agent does\nnot resemble other antiparasitic compounds. It is a synthetic organic compound\nwhich is highly specific for several common parasites.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0-FLl476Wys/U_Dnm21IUoI/AAAAAAAAuvE/GyqZSYatGQg/s1600/imadfgges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0-FLl476Wys/U_Dnm21IUoI/AAAAAAAAuvE/GyqZSYatGQg/s1600/imadfgges.jpg\" width=\"270\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;THIS IS REAL TANGIBLE STUFF-- NOT SOME BULLSH#T THEORY ! &nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6bKCF8mVufw/U_F8BieLxRI/AAAAAAAAuv8/RLL-qbbEaJ4/s1600/filarrrriasis.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"506\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6bKCF8mVufw/U_F8BieLxRI/AAAAAAAAuv8/RLL-qbbEaJ4/s1600/filarrrriasis.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">India was afflicted &nbsp;by this painful disease . &nbsp;AAILLAA cricketeer who got Bharat Ratna will NOT even know what this is !</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Jpj05wvXfcI/U_DnzfVr4TI/AAAAAAAAuvM/iOmmF0gOzn4/s1600/Elephantiderasis-3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Jpj05wvXfcI/U_DnzfVr4TI/AAAAAAAAuvM/iOmmF0gOzn4/s1600/Elephantiderasis-3.jpg\" width=\"432\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">4) TETRACYCLINES:(1945)\nthese are <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">broad spectrum antibiotics</b> effective against most pathogens. Subbarow isolated Aureomycin, the first ever tetracycline molecule and paved the way\nfor modern tetracyclines.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kraAOEadZlE/U_F7rExQe8I/AAAAAAAAuv0/Peebe8M-hBM/s1600/dowffenload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"183\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kraAOEadZlE/U_F7rExQe8I/AAAAAAAAuv0/Peebe8M-hBM/s1600/dowffenload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">These helped to contain and eradicate the<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> Plaque\nepidemic</span> in India (1994). &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Chlortetracycline\n(trade name Aureomycin, Lederle) is a tetracycline antibiotic, the first\ntetracycline to be identified.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">1945\n\u2013credit shared with Benjamin Minge Duggar. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Tetracycline played a\nhistorical role in reducing the incidence of mortality because of cholera. It\nis sold under the brand names Sumycin, Terramycin, Tetracyn, and Panmycin,\namong others.</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">5) ATP:(1929)&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Dicovery of\nphosphocreatine and <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">adenosine triphosphate (ATP)</b> in muscular activity, earned Subbarow an entry into biochemistry textbooks in the 1930s. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gKrprixgVc4/U_DxMgpJXxI/AAAAAAAAuvc/M14J_rPC6VE/s1600/downlor432ad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gKrprixgVc4/U_DxMgpJXxI/AAAAAAAAuvc/M14J_rPC6VE/s1600/downlor432ad.jpg\" width=\"387\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">It is the high-energy\nmolecule that stores the energy we need to do just about everything we do. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">It is present in the\ncytoplasm and nucleoplasm of every cell, and essentially <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">all the physiological\nmechanisms</span> that require energy for operation obtain it directly from the stored\nATP.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">As food in the cells is gradually oxidized,\nthe released energy is used to re-form the ATP so that the cell always\nmaintains a supply of this essential molecule. When</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">the body needs energy, ATP is converted into\nADP(adenosine diphosphate) and ATP is replenishedby phosphocreatine while the\nbody rests. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Fiske would not have\ngot the position he did atHarvard but for SubbaRow sharing with him the credit\nfor the method of estimating phosphorus in biological fluids the isolation and\ncharacterisation of adenosine triphosphate (ATP) . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Carbohydrates, fats,\nand proteins can all be used by cells to synthesize large quantities of\nadenosine triphosphate (ATP), which can be used as an energy source for almost\nall other cellular functions. For this reason, ATP has been called an energy\n\u201ccurrency\u201d in cell metabolism. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-opdXzaA0sQs/U_DxUEXS6QI/AAAAAAAAuvk/o0BpY-cHd5g/s1600/imafewsvges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-opdXzaA0sQs/U_DxUEXS6QI/AAAAAAAAuvk/o0BpY-cHd5g/s1600/imafewsvges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">In addition, ATP\nenergy is used for the synthesis of cholesterol, phospholipids, the hormones,\nand almost all other substances of the body. Even the urea excreted by the\nkidneys requires ATP for its formation from ammonia. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">ATP Energizes Glandular\nSecretion and </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">energizes nerve conduction.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Skeletal muscles can perform extreme feats of strength for a few seconds but\nare much less capable during prolonged activity. Most of the extra energy\nrequired during these bursts of activity cannot come from the oxidative\nprocesses because they are too slow to respond.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Instead, the extra energy comes\nfrom anaerobic sources: (1) ATP already present in the muscle cells, (2)\nphosphocreatine in the cells, and (3) anaerobic energy released by glycolytic\nbreakdown of glycogen to lactic acid.</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Since Subbarow was denied a regular faculty\nposition at Harvard, he joined Lederle Laboratories.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">6) With Szent-Gyorgy , Subbarow isolated Pyridoxine (vitamin B6) which is used to prevent or treat low levels\nof vitamin B6 .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-n96LfNNSqGM/U_F9a9SkOII/AAAAAAAAuwc/OvSlHtu95-I/s1600/dowfghgnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-n96LfNNSqGM/U_F9a9SkOII/AAAAAAAAuwc/OvSlHtu95-I/s1600/dowfghgnload.jpg\" width=\"278\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Some people who do not get enough of the vitamin from their diets.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ajNKgD0vQuI/U_F9jd1xrDI/AAAAAAAAuwk/Db1VoEF4y0Q/s1600/dofggwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ajNKgD0vQuI/U_F9jd1xrDI/AAAAAAAAuwk/Db1VoEF4y0Q/s1600/dofggwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">7) Isonicotinic Acid\nHydrazide against all forms of <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">tuberculosis</b>- this was a disease ravaging USA and this planet .<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CdU5GJg_-qM/U_F92LiHhFI/AAAAAAAAuws/5a-syF7y-2c/s1600/isoniazid---barrertyyu-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CdU5GJg_-qM/U_F92LiHhFI/AAAAAAAAuws/5a-syF7y-2c/s1600/isoniazid---barrertyyu-1.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">8) Polymyxin used in\ncattle feed.</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-P7nQDTaJiwY/U_F-4-iOBfI/AAAAAAAAuw0/Ebns1YQuMAc/s1600/220px-Polymyxin_dgyyB.svg.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"172\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-P7nQDTaJiwY/U_F-4-iOBfI/AAAAAAAAuw0/Ebns1YQuMAc/s1600/220px-Polymyxin_dgyyB.svg.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Polymyxin is used for the\ntreatment of Gram-negative<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> bacterial infections</b>. The global problem of\nadvancing antimicrobial resistance has led to a renewed interest in their use\nrecently.&nbsp; This combination product is\nused to treat minor wounds (e.g., cuts, scrapes, burns) and to help prevent or\ntreat mild skin infections. This antibiotic\nworks by slowing or stopping the growth of bacteria.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">None of our ancient\nIndian works of great value had the names of authors affixed. &nbsp;Patenting own work to personally shine was an\nunknown concept in India. &nbsp;Stealing\nothers work and patenting in own name was unthinkable in Hindu dharma . This is\nwhat the white invader like Newton did\u2014patented our ancient works and destroyed\nthe originals . Indians of high caliber and moral fibre of the of a bygone remained\nhidden from the public eye, &nbsp;untouched by\nany fanfare.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yellapragada Subbarao\nwas born in an impoverished Telugu family in Bhimavaram district in Old Madras\nPresidency, now in West Godavari district, &nbsp;Andhra Pradesh. &nbsp;He was born as the fourth child amongst seven\nchildren to Y. Jagganatham and Y. Venkamma.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subbarow\u2019s father\nJagannatham worked as Revenue Inspector.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subbarow got himself a seat\nat Madras Medical College.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the\nfreedom movement, Subbarow came under the spell of Gandhi . </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He started wearing cotton khadi gowns to the\nsurgical theatre, pissing off his white professor of surgery M.C. Bradfield\n.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result this\nvindictive man punished Subbarow with a lesser LMS degree instead of a full\nMBBS degree, although he fared very well in all other subjects in the written\nexaminations. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He tried to get through\nMadras Medical service but failed.&nbsp; &nbsp;Due to grinding poverty he took up a job of\nanatomy lecturer in Dr. Lakshmipathi's &nbsp;Ayurvedic\nCollege at Madras.&nbsp; By chance an American\ndoctor who was touring India for Rockefeller Scholarship noticed him .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1923, he got a terse cable\nfrom School of Tropical Medicine at Harvard University<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"> \"You will be\nadmitted in September. No Scholarship.\"</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was at a loss what\nto do. &nbsp;But family and friends supported\nhim..&nbsp; His family had NO money for his\njourney and expenses. His mother sold her meager gold jewellery and his wife\u2019s\nfamily too contributed .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subba Row left for\nAmerica on the ship S. S. Khagar. &nbsp;&nbsp;Subbarow arrived Boston and walked down the ship's gangway on the cold night of October 26, 1923 , with very little money .\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr. Strong ( dean) offered Subbarow some\nmoney so that he could register , meet other immediate expenses and settle down\n. Even with Dr. Strong's support Subbarow could not secure a fellowship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His LMS medical degree\nwas not enough for getting internship appointment in any of Boston\u2019s Hospitals.\n&nbsp;To survive he took up a part time &nbsp;job of night porter in the Peter Bent Brigham\nHospital at a low monthly salary was US $ 50. &nbsp;He jobs included washing bedpans of patients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subba Row was awarded\nthe Diploma of the Harvard University School of Tropical Medicine on June1,1924.\n. After completing the Diploma Subba Row became interested in biochemistry and\nstarted working with Cyrus Hartwell Fiske.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He got his Ph.D. degree\nin 1930 and a junior faculty position.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After getting his Ph.D\nin biochemistry, he was not offered a position at Harvard and hence &nbsp;joined Lederle Laboratories, as director of\nresearch in 1940. &nbsp;Lederle was a division\nof American Cyanamid in Pearl River. He worked for Ledrle till he died on 9th\nAug 1948. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At Lederle Laboratories\n&nbsp;he directed the research that led to the\nsynthesis of folic acid, discovery of tetracycline the first broad-spectrum\nantibiotic, methotrexate the anticancer drug and diethylcarbamazine the\nanti-filarial drug.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr. Yella pragada Subba\nRao's name first came to lime light in 1924. &nbsp;He developed the \u201cFiske-Subba Row calorimetric\nmethod\u201d to estimate phosphorus in tissues and body fluids .&nbsp; This easy and accurate &nbsp;method , debunked the 1922 Nobel prize\nawardees. The world now noticed this Indian.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1930 he got his\ndoctorate (PhD) from Harvard University, U S A for Biochemistry. &nbsp;Subbarow was helped logistically by Prof. Otto\nFolin, the head of the Biochemistry Department, who noticed his brilliance .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the anti biotic\nmedicines he developed have his name as a pre-fix ,like \"Subbo\nMycin\", \"Subburo Mycin\" &nbsp;etc. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr. Subbarao remained\nan resident alien in the US and even though he led some of our World War II\nmedical research. His status and loyalty was often challenged by the racist\nwhites as he was an immigrant from India.. . &nbsp;Despite his isolation of ATP, &nbsp;Subbarao was denied tenure at Harvard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subba Row who laid the\nfoundation for the identification of vitamin B12.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tetracycline was the\nfirst broad-spectrum antibiotic, that is, one effective agains tboth\ngram-positive and gram-negative germs. &nbsp;It was more powerful than either Fleming\u2019s penicillin\nor Waksman\u2019s streptomycin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>EDWARD JENNER , THE\nLEECH VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With so many path\nbreaking discoveries to his credit, &nbsp;Yellapragada Subbarao never marketed his work .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This modest man always sat in the middle rows\nof the audience and had to be literally pushed to the stage by a colleague to\ntake a bow as each of his researches was revealed to the public. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">White Jews have stolen\nand won Nobel prizes for just some bullsh#t theory. &nbsp;&nbsp;All of Subbarows work was tangible and\npractical. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He quietly came on to the world stage , transformed\nscience and human lives by making a large number of path breaking &nbsp;major discoveries. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forget about Nobel\nprizes ( he should have got 3 of them ) nobody knows about him even in\nIndia.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IS YELLAPRAGADA WORTH A\nBHARAT RATNA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have given &nbsp;CIA spooks and desh drohis Bharat Ratna !!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-o6jStt7Yt5g/U_GQLdphgzI/AAAAAAAAuxE/DVCzXLiUaY4/s1600/imaffeges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-o6jStt7Yt5g/U_GQLdphgzI/AAAAAAAAuxE/DVCzXLiUaY4/s1600/imaffeges.jpg\" width=\"300\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhagwan Das&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chitpavan Jew Dhondo\nKeshav Karve&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bidhan Chandra Roy&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; A tiny wobble in the signal, picked up by Ligo\u2019s twin\ninstruments and the Virgo detector on 14 August, could be traced back to the\nfinal moments of the merger of two black holes about 1.8bn years ago (\nCALCULATED AT SPEED OF LIGHT--WHICH IS BULL ) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The black holes, with masses about 31 and 25 times the mass\nof the sun, combined to produce a newly spinning black hole with about 53 times\nthe mass of the sun.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The parallel orientation of the two Ligo detectors, one in\nHanford, Washington state, the other in Livingston, Louisiana, has meant that\nscientists are effectively observing one flat plane through space, rather than\ngetting a 3D picture. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">WE ARE ALL ENJOYING A CAKE MADE OF SHIT !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">KYA CAKE HAI ! Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/higgs-boson-god-particle-nonsense-some.html?showComment=1511764863023#c8655547423705214099\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 27, 2017 at 12:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_19MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ALqPQSrSVks<br />\n<br />\nThis separation left behind an imprint\u2014called the cosmic microwave background\u2014that can still be detected today. It includes sound waves (\u201cacoustic oscillations\u201d) that coursed through the infant universe.<br />\n<br />\nThe peaks of those oscillations represent regions that were slightly denser than the rest of the universe. And because matter attracts matter through gravity, those regions grew even denser as the universe aged, coalescing first into galaxies and then into clusters of galaxies.<br />\n<br />\nIf astronomers compare the original cosmic microwave background oscillations with the distribution of galaxies at different stages of the universe\u2019s history, they can measure the rate of the universe\u2019s expansion.<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF and IDIOT Albert Einstein was only able to derive E = mc^2 for a particle completely at rest. Einstein's formulation couldn't account for how energy worked for a particle in motion. In other words, E = mc^2 as derived by CUNT Einstein was frame-dependent! Einstein could not figure out that the universe is expanding ( found out by Hubble ) and hence his CON job of inventing the \u201c positive cosmological constant\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nEinstein rejected the indeterminate, quantum nature of the Universe as written in Vedanta. The better you measure and know the position of a particle, the less well-known its momentum is. The shorter a particle's lifetime, the more inherently uncertain its rest energy (i.e., its mass) is. And if you measure its spin in one direction (x, y, or z), you inherently destroy information about it in the other two.<br />\n<br />\nBut rather than accept these self-evident facts and try and reinterpret how we fundamentally view the quanta making up our Universe, ASSHOLE Einstein insisted on viewing them in a deterministic sense.<br />\n<br />\nCHOOT Einstein really wanted to add TOE ( theory of everything ) represented by Sri Yantra before he died. Einstein wanted to unify gravitation and electromagnetism. The weak and strong nuclear forces obeyed similar quantum rules to electromagnetism, and the application of group theory to these quantum forces led to the unification we know in the Standard Model.<br />\n<br />\nYet Einstein never pursued these paths or even attempted to incorporate the nuclear forces; he remained stuck on gravity and electromagnetism, even as clear relationships were emerging between the others.<br />\n<br />\nOppenheimer said of Einstein, \u201cDuring all the end of his life, Einstein did no good. He turned his back on experiments... to realise the unity of knowledge\u201d<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lb13ynu3Iac<br />\n<br />\nOppenheimer converted to Hinduism and got himself cremated .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_20b+seedFY4ZD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_20b+seedFY4ZD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1952862490152312536\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_77M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. JEWS OR EVALUATED BY JEWS-- THE WHITE JEW IS NOWHERE<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html<br />\n<br CLASSMATE OF THEIF JEW MARK ZUKERBERG WHO FOUNDED FACEBOOK.<br />\n<br />\nTHE IDEA OF FACEBOOK SPROUTED FROM DIVYA NARENDRAs BRAIN<br />\n<br />\nDivya Narenda is portrayed by Max Minghella in The Social Network (2010), a film directed by David Fincher about the founding of Facebook<br />\n<br />\nIn the movie the bastards show him as a WHITE MAN<br />\n<br />\nIn the movie they show the Winklevoss twins who were part of the Divya Narendra team.<br />\n<br />\nIn November 2003, Divya Narendra and the Winklevoss twins approached Mark Zuckerberg about writing code for the idea of Facebook.<br />\n<br />\nDivya Narendra emailed Zuckerberg saying, \u201cWe\u2019re very deep into developing a site which we would like you to be a part of and ... which we know will make some waves on campus.\u201d Within a couple of days, Mark Zuckerberg was talking to the HarvardConnection team<br />\n<br />\nOn the evening of November 25, 2003, the Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses met with Zuckerberg in the dining hall of Harvard's Kirkland House, where they explained to an enthusiastic Zuckerberg, the HarvardConnection website, the plan to expand to other schools after launch, the confidential nature of the project<br />\n<br />\nDuring the meeting, Mark Zuckerberg allegedly entered into an ORAL contract ( NEVER TRUST A WHITE JEW WITH ORAL CONTRACTS ) with Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses and became a WORKING partner in HarvardConnection.<br />\n<br />\nHe was given the private server location and password for the unfinished HarvardConnection website and code, with the understanding that he would finish the programming necessary for launch.<br />\n<br />\nMark Zuckerberg allegedly chose to be compensated in the form of sweat equity.( remember Shashi Tharoor and Sunanda Pushkar ? )<br />\n<br />\nOn December 17, 2003, JEW THIEF Mark Zuckerberg met with Divya Narendra and the Winklevosses in his dorm room, allegedly confirming his interest and assuring them that the site was almost complete.<br />\n<br />\nOn the whiteboard in his room, Zuckerberg allegedly had scrawled multiple lines of code under the heading \u201cHarvard Connection.\u201d However, this would be the only time they saw any of his work.<br />\n<br />\nOn January 11, 2004, Mark Zuckerberg HIJACKED the ship and registered the domain name thefacebook.com.<br />\n<br />\nJEW THIEF Zuckerberg met again with the HarvardConnection team. However, he allegedly never mentioned registering the domain name thefacebook.com nor a competing social networking website, rather he reported progress on HarvardConnection, told them he would continue to work on it, and would email the group later in the week.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_77BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; />\n<br />\nTHIEF Pacioli says he\u2019s included in his book all the material forms of geometric bodies which have \u2018hitherto been unknown to the living\u2019.<br />\n<br />\n\"The geometric expression of divine proportion involves three lengths and God also contains three (the Holy Trinity of Father, Son and Holy Ghost)\"--LIFTED FROM INDIAN TRINITY.<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF Pacioli proposes a fifth, esoteric, quality shared by the divine proportion and the Christian God, which he derives from Plato: \u2018As God has conferred being to heavenly virtue as a fifth substance, and by means of this fifth substance has extended being to the other four simple bodies or four elements (earth, water, air and fire) and through these to every other thing in nature, so in our divine proportion, following the ancient Plato in his Timaeus, we give formal being to Heaven itself by creating for it the body called the dodecahedron or the body of twelve pentagons.\u2019<br />\n<br />\nBRAAAAYYYY VIA ARABS ) LIKE FIBONACCI -- HE JUST INNOVATED A BIT.<br />\n<br />\nThief Leonardo da Vinci is the most overrated man on this planet\u2014so says Capt Ajit Vadakayil.<br />\n<br />\nLeonardo Da Kerala elephant and Vishnu's Garuda in top. There were no elephants in Al Jazari baby\u2019s country.<br />\n<br />\nIbn Batuta had describes this clock in the Calicut Kings bedroom. font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_28T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-arrow\" id=\"bc_0_28TA\" style=\"background: url(&quot;data:image/png; display: inline-block; height: 6px; margin: 0.3em; overflow: visible; padding-right: 4px; width: 7px;\"></span><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_28TN\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" style=\"color: #888888;\" target=\"_self\">Replies</a></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_28TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_28TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_28B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7672584269921191275\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_28M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_13.html?showComment=1521004208510#c7672584269921191275\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 14, 2018 at 10:40 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nAnd it's important to know the Sun's position, because it's used for normal time-keeping (solar time, rather than sidereal time). By Kepler's Second Law, the Earth orbits faster at perihelion and slower at aphelion. ..<br />\n<br />\nSo the Sun appears to move fastest along ecliptic in January and slowest in July. ..<br />\n<br />\nWe can invent an imaginary Sun (the dynamical mean Sun) which coincides with the true Sun when the Earth is at perihelion, but moves along the ecliptic at a constant speed. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe true Sun appears to move faster than the dynamical mean Sun when the Earth is around perihelion, and slower when the Earth is near aphelion: one cycle per year. However, an object moving at a constant speed along the ecliptic is still moving at a varying speed with respect to the equator, since the ecliptic is tilted to the equator. ..<br />\n<br />\nWe invent another imaginary Sun, called simply the mean Sun, which moves along the equator at constant speed; the dynamical mean Sun appears to lag behind this where the ecliptic is steeply tilted to the equator (around the equinoxes) and catch up where it's nearly parallel (around the solstices): two cycles per year\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCombining these two effects gives the total difference in time between the true Sun and the mean Sun, which is called the equation of time.. The true Sun is about 14 minutes late, compared to the mean Sun, around 10th February, about 4 minutes early around May 15th, about 6 minutes late around July 25th, and about 16 minutes early around November 5th\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe interval between two meridian transits of the mean Sun is the mean solar day. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe upper transit of the mean Sun across the local meridian marks midday, local mean time. Greenwich Mean Time (GMT) is defined as midday when the mean Sun crosses the meridian of Greenwich..<br />\n<br />\nApparent solar time, as measured by the the true Sun (e.g. on a sundial), may differ from GMT for three reasons. ..<br />\n<br />\nFirstly, because of the equation of time, Secondly, because of the longitude of the observer (the further west, the later the Sun will cross the meridian)\u2026.Thirdly, because of \"Summer Time\"\u2026<br />\n<br />\nBritain uses GMT as standard time in winter, adding one hour in summer. Most other countries adopt their own standard time, suitable for their own longitude (large countries may have several time-zones), differing from GMT by a set amount. In practice, the Earth's rotation is not quite constant. ..<br />\n<br />\nTime is now regulated by atomic clocks, and called Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), but this is artificially kept within 1 second of GMT by adding a \"leap second\" when necessary..<br />\n<br />\nKERALA ASTROMOMERS KNEW THIS WHEN THE WHITE MAN WAS USING GRUNT GRUNT FOR LANGUAGE ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"><img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c56934804452688012\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_34M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1521555019282#c56934804452688012\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 20, 2018 at 7:40 PM</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\">SOMEBODY ASKED ME\u2014HOW DID ISAAC NEWTON STEAL HIS CALCULUS FROM THE KERALA SCHOOL OF MATH.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\">French Rothschild\u2019s agent JEW Jean-Paul Bignon librarian to Louis XIV of France sent travellers to Kerala to bribe and purchase at any cost every book of note\u2014with special emphasis on books on Math and Astronomy.. His grandfather JEW Jerome Bignon ( died 1656 ) was tutor to King Louis XIII..</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\">JEW Jean-Paul Bignon was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society in 1734.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\">Royal Society was founded in 1660. THIEF Isaac Newton was a PRESIDENT of Royal Society and found his Calculus from the Kerala School of Math from the library of the Royal Society.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedIY6D\" kind=\"d\">Nobody knows that an Indian SIR Venkatraman Ramakrishnan is the current President of the Royal society.. He is the recipient of the 2009 Nobel Prize in Chemistry and a Padma Vibhushan in 2010. font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">AL fuckin\u2019 BIRUNI STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY AND TOOK ELABORATE NOTES WITH HIM -WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING, AS HE WAS NOT VERY BRIGHT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Biruni was a Sanskrit scholar who learnt Math and astronomy in from Namboodiri professors adept in Sanskrit and Arabic .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote Wikipedia -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE: Al-Biruni wrote an encyclopedic work on India called \u201cTarikh Al-Hind\u201d (History of India) in which he explored nearly every aspect of Indian life, including religion, history, geography, geology, science, and mathematics. My book is nothing but a simple historic record of facts. I shall place before the reader the theories of the Hindus exactly as they are, and I shall mention in connection with them similar theories of the Greeks in order to show the relationship existing between them.(1910, Vol. 1, p. 7;1958, p. 5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Hindus considered Muslims violent and impure, and did not want to share anything with him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Over time, Al-Biruni won the welcome of Hindu scholars. Al-Biruni collected books and studied with these Hindu scholars to become fluent in Sanskrit, discover and translate into Arabic the mathematics, science, medicine, astronomy and other fields of arts as practiced in 11th century India. He was inspired by the arguments offered by Indian scholars who believed earth must be ellipsoid shape, with yet to be discovered continent at earth's south pole, and earth's rotation around the sun is the only way to fully explain the difference in daylight hours by latitude, seasons and earth's relative positions with moon and stars.[36] Al-Biruni was also critical of Indian scribes who he believed carelessly corrupted Indian documents while making copies of older documents.[37] Al-Biruni's translations as well as his own original contributions reached Europe in 12th and 13th century, where they were actively sought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">While others were killing each other over religious differences, Al-Biruni had a remarkable ability to engage Hindus in peaceful dialogue. Mohammad Yasin puts this dramatically when he says, \u201cThe Indica is like a magic island of quiet, impartial research in the midst of a world of clashing swords, burning towns, and burned temples.\u201d (Indica is another name for Al-Biruni\u2019s history of India). (Yasin, 1975, p. 212). :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Biruni</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Ibn al-haytham<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn fuckin\u2019 al-Haytham or Alhazen has been made out to be the first theoretical physicists, -- a system where a hypothesis must be proved by mathematical evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Alhazen\u2019s ( Ibn al-Haytham) science of optics is not his own.
