He bought ready made translated to Arabic texts on surgery from the Cordoba library for gold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">NOW I HAVE BAD NEWS FOR JEW , MUSLIMS AND CHRISTIANS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">IT IS ABOUT A KERALA MERCHANT IN THE CALICUT KINGs EMPLOYMENT \u2013 A THIYYA NAMED MAIMONIDES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">THERE IS A STATUE OF HIM IN CORDOBA MADE BY THE JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Jews call him Moshe ben Maimon. ( statue below in Cordoba )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Muslims call him Abu Imran Musa bin Maimun .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Christians call him Maimonides.</span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">THE LIBRARY OF CORDOBA IN SPAIN WAS RUN BY THE CALICUT KING. WESTERN UNIVERSITIES WERE STARTED BY LIFTING KNOWLEDGE FROM HERE . AND OF COURSE THEY HAD THE LIFTED AND PATENTED GREEK KNOWLEDGE TOO .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED TO 3--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">THE HUGE SPICE BAZAAR OUTSIDE CORDOBA LIBRARY WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">##########################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Ab\u016b K\u0101mil Shuj\u0101\u02bf ibn Aslam</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ab\u016b K\u0101mil Shuj\u0101\u02bf ibn fuckin\u2019 Aslam studied in Kodungallur University in 889 AD. He was given ready made translated to Arabic knowledge of Math in exchange for vast amount of gold.. Fibonacci stumbled on his work in Bejaya and patented it in his own name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Mathematician Muhammad ibn fuckin\u2019 Musa al-Khwarizmi studied in Kodungallur University in Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Fibonacci took his Arabic works to Italy from Bejaya , Algeria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">ALGEBRA is derived from Al-Jabr, one of the two operations he used to solve quadratic equations. Algorism and algorithm stem from Algoritmi, the Latin form of his name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote wikipedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE- Ibn al-Nad\u012bm's Kit\u0101b al-Fihrist includes a short biography on al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b together with a list of the books he wrote. Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b accomplished most of his work in the period between 813 and 833. After the Muslim conquest of Persia, Baghdad became the centre of scientific studies and trade, and many merchants and scientists from as far as China and India traveled to this city, as did al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b. He worked in Baghdad as a scholar at the House of Wisdom established by Caliph al-Ma\u2019m\u016bn, where he studied the sciences and mathematics, which included the translation of Greek and Sanskrit scientific manuscripts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b's Z\u012bj al-Sindhind[11] (Arabic: \u0632\u064a\u062c \u0627\u0644\u0633\u0646\u062f \u0647\u0646\u062f\u200e, \"astronomical tables of Sindh and Hind\") is a work consisting of approximately 37 chapters on calendrical and astronomical calculations and 116 tables with calendrical, astronomical and astrological data, as well as a table of sine values. This is the first of many Arabic Zijes based on the Indian astronomical methods known as the sindhind.[22] The work contains tables for the movements of the sun, the moon and the five planets known at the time. This work marked the turning point in Islamic astronomy. Hitherto, Muslim astronomers had adopted a primarily research approach to the field, translating works of others and learning already discovered knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">-UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_ibn_Musa_al-Khwarizmi</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">LIES WONT WORK ANYMORE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">I ASK MY READERS TO SPREAD THIS KNOWLEDGE ON SOCIAL MEDIA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; Ajit Vadakayil&nbsp; January 4, 2018 at 11:38 AM<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nostradamus-predicted-in-21st-century-worlds-best-actor-will-be-from-india-jignesh-mevani-mocks-pm-narendra-modi/articleshow/62361212.cms</span><br />\n<br />\nJIGNESH MEVANI MUST BE JAILED IMMEDIATELY--HE IS NOT A PATRIOT ..<br />\n<br />\nTIME TO BREAK THE BIGGEST BOMBSHELL OF 2018..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LEGEND OF CHRISTIAN NOSTRADAMUS WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ( FRENCH BRANCH )..<br />\n<br />\nNOSTRADAMUS WAS A JEW\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE READ HIS BOOK OF PREDICTIONS AT THE AGE OF 11.. THE BOOKS IS STILL IN MY HOME LIBRARY..<br />\n<br />\nHIS QUATRAINS ARE VAGUE\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE LIKE HITLERs NAME WAS CONVERTED TO HISTER TO ACCOMODATE THE PREDICTIONS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW HITLER WAS USED BY ROTHSCHILD TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL -- HIS ORIGINAL NAME WAS NOT HILTER ( BUT HEIDLER AS PER SCHOOL RECORDS )-- IT WAS GRANTED TO HIM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS A PERFECT CASE OF CREATING TRUTHS VIA THE BACK DOOR..<br />\n<br />\nDURING WW1 AND WW2 --ROTHSCHILD DROPPED LEAFLETS ALL OVER EUROPE QUOTING NOSTRADAMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe book of predictions is Les Propheties, a collection of 942 poetic quatrains allegedly predicting future events. The book was first published in 1555 and has rarely been out of print since his death. ..WHY ?..<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS SO KEEN ON PROPAGATING THE FAME AND POWERS ( SIC) OF NOSTRADAMUS ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW NOSTRADAMUS WAS MADE POPULAR BY HIS ALMANAC WHICH WAS LIFTED FROM KERALA ..<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil declares today at 1105 AM, on 4th Jan 2018-- SATYA VACHAN that Nostradamus's predictions have been DELIBERATELY kept vague-- they could be applied to virtually anything, and are 100% useless for determining whether Nostradamus had any real prophetic powers. ..<br />\n<br />\nMost of the quatrains deal with disasters, such as plagues, earthquakes, wars, floods, invasions, murders, droughts, and battles\u2014all undated-..<br />\n<br />\nANY CHARLATAN CAN WRITE SUCH QUATRAINS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nOUR OWN VEDAS HAS SUCH COOKED UP VERSES INJECTED --BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FRENCH REVOLUTION WAS WORKED VIA BACKDOOR BY FRENCH ROTHSCHILDs FREEMASONS --THIS WAS THE FIRST REAL VICTORY OF FAKE NOSTRADAMUS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS THE FRENCH REVOLUTION PREDICTION..( BULLSHIT )..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH IS ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA LIE THAT THEY HEARD THE QUEEN SAYING \"IF PEOPLE DONT HAVE BREAD LET THEM EAT CAKE \"..<br />\n<br />\nCentury VI.--Quatrain 74.<br />\n<br />\nLa. dechass\u00e9e 1 an regne tournera,<br />\nSes ennemies trouv\u00e9s des conjur\u00e9s:<br />\nPlus que jamais son temps triomphera,<br />\nTrois et septante \u00e0 mort trop asseur\u00e9s.<br />\n<br />\nTranslation.<br />\n<br />\nShe who was proscribed will return to the kingdom,<br />\nHer enemies will be treated as conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.sacred-texts.com/nos/oon/oon15.htm</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHis astrologies were disastrously wrong, containing flagrant astronomical errors\u2014we in Kerala know astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nNobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true.<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus' writings are exploited in a number of fallacious ways. Ambiguous and wrong translations, \"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and the breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a vast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ONLY USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD FOR FAKE PROPAGANDA \u2013WITH THE SINGLE MINDED AIM OF CARVING OUT ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\nSO HOW DOES CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL KNOW ?..<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus wrote in 16th century French, which was significantly different from modern French\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS LIKE OUR JESUS WHEN THE LETTER J NEVER EXISTED TILL THE 17TH CENTURY !..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s histrorians gave bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled Nostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for this\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSome books and websites even go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern English translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within French translations\u2026<br />\n<br />\nErika Cheetham\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild was involed in MODERN bull..<br />\n<br />\nCheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".<br />\n<br />\nOccasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..<br />\n<br />\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. IT IS NOT THERE IN THE BOOK I READ IN MY CHILDHOOD\u2014WHICH IS IN MY LIBRARY ( BROUGH FROM AN OLD CALICUT BOOK STORE \u2013PROPERTY OF AN ENGLISHMAN IN CALICUT WHO DIED 150 YEARS AGO ) ..<br />\n<br />\nIn the city of York there will be a great collapse,<br />\n2 twin brothers torn apart by chaos<br />\nWhile the fortress falls; the great leader will succumb;<br />\nThird big war will begin when the big city is burning.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nOn the 11th day of the 9 month,<br />\nTwo metal birds will crash into two tall statues<br />\nIn the new city,<br />\nAnd the world will end soon after.<br />\n<br />\nWITH EVERY NEW EDITION JEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AND INSERTED MERRILY-- TO MAKE THE BOOK HOLD WATER..<br />\n<br />\nIT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO EXPOSE JEW NOSTRODAMUS ( A MERE FRONT OF ROTHSCHILD ) LIKE JEW HITLER ..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 52.95%..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2TCQNY-bwLw/U-eyY30STkI/AAAAAAAAub4/TmDK-op81U4/s1600/1zwlqhff2.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The Mecca/Vatican of\nthe Yazidis is the PAZHANI temple at Dindigul district Tamil Nadu. The deity\nhere is Lord Murugan ( Kartkeya / Subramanya ).&nbsp;\n</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bb3Pyhb8NU8/U-cMNlwWJ0I/AAAAAAAAuXA/uJ3-907Xnko/s1600/Palani_HEE3ill.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bb3Pyhb8NU8/U-cMNlwWJ0I/AAAAAAAAuXA/uJ3-907Xnko/s1600/Palani_HEE3ill.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>The ignorant Yazidis\ncall it PERANI--as they cannot pronounce the letters ZH .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yazidis were the\nHindu brahmin priests at Gobleki Tepi -- one of the ancient stonehenges .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All Stonehenges on this\nplanet are Hindu in origin-- used for Agnihotra Havanams.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The stone bust of a\nHindu brahmin priest was unearthed at Gobekli Tepi stonehenge in Turkey--the\nfirst stonehenge of this planet.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0hLm2XZwKk8/U-fGKQG_g0I/AAAAAAAAucY/feRBq6ZomFc/s1600/isis-slaughter-deir-essorGGY.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"410\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0hLm2XZwKk8/U-fGKQG_g0I/AAAAAAAAucY/feRBq6ZomFc/s1600/isis-slaughter-deir-essorGGY.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As late as 7000 BC,\nIndia ruled Israel, Syria, Iraq , Turkey --to Urals --to Vietnam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yazidis still do sunrise and sunset (\nsurya vandhanam ) prayers to the sun god and agnihotra rituals .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They beat the dholak , blow the shank , take\nholy river baths and revere the peacock ( Malek Tavous ) \u2014 a bird NOT found in\nthat neck of the woods.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8VyAhDHjs00/U-cWxzBnJ3I/AAAAAAAAuaQ/_H1L0Lp97Xg/s1600/HUKTRF0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8VyAhDHjs00/U-cWxzBnJ3I/AAAAAAAAuaQ/_H1L0Lp97Xg/s1600/HUKTRF0.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yazidis do not\ncircumcise , as is done by everybody else in those areas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have strict Gotra\nrules. See how much a social custom can reveal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Below: &nbsp;Pa<b><span style=\"color: red;\">ZH</span></b>ani temple--Tamil Nadu. &nbsp;It is called pa<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>L</b></span>ani temple by the Tamils as they do NOT have the letter ZH in their alphabets -like Sanskrit and Malayalam. &nbsp;The Yezidis called it PE<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">R</span></b>ANI</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5zgzNMz6Mhk/U-ccYEBqcfI/AAAAAAAAubI/bgKy9YRmCPA/s1600/Murugan-Temdderple-Palani.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5zgzNMz6Mhk/U-ccYEBqcfI/AAAAAAAAubI/bgKy9YRmCPA/s1600/Murugan-Temdderple-Palani.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as Islam was\nfounded by prophet Mohammed they Muslims started killing the Yazidis .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ISIS has declared the\nYazidi are SHAITAN ( pagan ) worshippers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">25 million Yezidis have\nbeen killed by Muslims over the past 800 years\u2014nobody cares, as they are NOT\nJews !<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bZH7JgibqZk/U-cXYI9XlTI/AAAAAAAAuac/auErLHl9jAo/s1600/05094d1f-e996-4cca-b15f-gghfd100f462eb1-460x276.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"384\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bZH7JgibqZk/U-cXYI9XlTI/AAAAAAAAuac/auErLHl9jAo/s1600/05094d1f-e996-4cca-b15f-gghfd100f462eb1-460x276.jpeg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today their dwindling\npopulation all over the planet is less than 9 lakhs.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first stonehenge on\nthis planet was found at Gobekli Tepi , Turkey.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-An3e-gmz-F8/U-cMf1DowDI/AAAAAAAAuXI/8w4pxQl745E/s1600/imEWG45ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-An3e-gmz-F8/U-cMf1DowDI/AAAAAAAAuXI/8w4pxQl745E/s1600/imEWG45ages.jpg\" width=\"359\" /></a></div>\n<o:p></o:p><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This ancient Palani\ntemple at Dindigul district TamilNadu , was renovated by Cheraman Perumal the\nking of Calicut ( my hometown ) 1300 years ago, as Lord Subramanya appeared to\nhim in a dream.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He renovated the ruined\ntemple and installed the misplaced Murugan idol made of nine poisonous minerals\nor Navapaashaanam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theertham ( holy\nwater ) abtained after bathing this idol has medicinal value, as water holds\nmemory. Old and disabled people climb 670 steps, to reach the temple-shows that\nfaith can give instant energy.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2NBusTY4zOA/U-cYF_cHLoI/AAAAAAAAuas/g2wudJWJR9M/s1600/0hjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2NBusTY4zOA/U-cYF_cHLoI/AAAAAAAAuas/g2wudJWJR9M/s1600/0hjk.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>After that , the Calicut king Cheraman Perumal , went to Mecca to see Muhammed the prophet by ship. &nbsp; His body is at Salalah Oman\nas he died on the way back before he could board his ship waiting at Salalah..</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IGoxMUBsZaE/U-cYUaVXvDI/AAAAAAAAua0/zANs0g_6pzQ/s1600/Yezidi_Tartrtus-80093.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"308\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IGoxMUBsZaE/U-cYUaVXvDI/AAAAAAAAua0/zANs0g_6pzQ/s1600/Yezidi_Tartrtus-80093.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The king\u2019s figure on\nhorseback is inscribed in stone near the Vairava sub-shrine in the exterior of\nthe northern wall of the sanctum sanctorum.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Yazidis applying holy Tilak</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mCnPPUO1gFY/U-cOT9CaKBI/AAAAAAAAuXw/yTqWiaKowAE/s1600/598jgf18.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"230\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mCnPPUO1gFY/U-cOT9CaKBI/AAAAAAAAuXw/yTqWiaKowAE/s1600/598jgf18.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idol\u2019s legs were\nscraped off during British rule \u2014 as they wanted to analyse the wonder alchemy\nof the idol\u2019s alloy metal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Siddha Bhoghar who\nmade the idol was a metallurgist who would make Shiva Lingams with Palladium group\nmetals infused in mercury.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One such Mercury Shiva\nLingam was found by the Templar Knights in Jerusalem under the Solomon Temple,\nafter which they left Christianity and started worshipping Narasimhan \u2014 the\nHindu half man Half lion God, an avatar of Lord Vishnu..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-flY69BXazX4/U-gxPtpwbjI/AAAAAAAAuc4/TQVrWB6GBow/s1600/Yehdezidis-Celebrate-07.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-flY69BXazX4/U-gxPtpwbjI/AAAAAAAAuc4/TQVrWB6GBow/s1600/Yehdezidis-Celebrate-07.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharshi Agasta was the\nfirst to solidify mercury through the use of Kerala herbs. The Siddhas also\nconsumed purified mercury, Iridium , Rhodium and gold in order to achieve\nphysical immortality.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Below : The multi-armed Yazidi god. &nbsp; Multi armed god idols exist only in Hindusim.The snake is Kundalini , a concept which exists only in Hindusim. &nbsp;Peacocks exist only in India .</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7iya3Tiprns/U-cQixPRZ_I/AAAAAAAAuYQ/GEmDAcA4bKY/s1600/it3mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7iya3Tiprns/U-cQixPRZ_I/AAAAAAAAuYQ/GEmDAcA4bKY/s1600/it3mages.jpg\" width=\"301\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ascended masters\npopularized by Madame Blavatsky of the Theosophical society are the ancient\nSiddhars. One Siddha Guru was Maharishi Patanjali, who gifted the world the\nScience of Yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Below : Yazidis honour Shukracharya . Shukracharya was advisor to King Mahabali of Kerala when Lord Vishnu came as Vamana avatar . Parsis ( Zoroastrians ) also worship Shukracharya as god AHURA MAZDA&nbsp;</b></span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nGykLOF8IwI/U-cRSS0njII/AAAAAAAAuYY/pi4lZ4OIqfM/s1600/sukracaryadd-yayati-217x300.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nGykLOF8IwI/U-cRSS0njII/AAAAAAAAuYY/pi4lZ4OIqfM/s1600/sukracaryadd-yayati-217x300.jpg\" width=\"289\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BRne6oarU5k/U-cSHAOlzoI/AAAAAAAAuYg/hlZSAIKFANw/s1600/downlfereoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BRne6oarU5k/U-cSHAOlzoI/AAAAAAAAuYg/hlZSAIKFANw/s1600/downlfereoad.jpg\" width=\"425\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pJMRFuTXuPc/U-cSZilPMhI/AAAAAAAAuYo/02TbnUIu-iY/s1600/imfrrages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pJMRFuTXuPc/U-cSZilPMhI/AAAAAAAAuYo/02TbnUIu-iY/s1600/imfrrages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soma mentioned in the\nRig Veda , is found in the Himalayas ( not seen any more ) have potent\nanti-aging properties, as they contain mercury, iridium and rhodium. The major\ningredient of Soma elexir is juice extracted from a creeper which was picked on\nspecial days of the dark lunar fortnight. It was placed in an earthen pitcher\nand buried underground until the full moon. Then it was removed and the juice\nwas extracted and taken.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jrm4y4Z3xlI/VrnfrvHl6NI/AAAAAAABD3U/07KCn7iGQwU/s1600/TurkeyGobekyyliTotemBirth1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FR_-UXPSMm8/U-cUKdwcqnI/AAAAAAAAuZM/w65VzjUEDPk/s1600/SinjarMap.7AuguGGRst2014.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"366\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FR_-UXPSMm8/U-cUKdwcqnI/AAAAAAAAuZM/w65VzjUEDPk/s1600/SinjarMap.7AuguGGRst2014.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-631sLw2M8Pk/U-cXx3VRx0I/AAAAAAAAuak/vZx2LZSbe_I/s1600/imjygrages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me tell the\nMuslims of the world this -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: red;\">Shukracharya was the\nmentor ( guru )of the Asuras of India\u2014&nbsp; also\nthe God of the ancient people of Arabia and Persia . </span>&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>This is why they still say \u201cALLAH KA SHUKRA\nHAI \u201c.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Vedic astrology,\nthere is a dasha or planetary period known as Shukra Dasha which remains active\nin a person's horoscope for 20 years, this is the longest dasha among all\nplanets. This dasha is believed to give more wealth, fortune and luxury to a\nperson's life if they have Shukra positioned well in their horoscope. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before prophet Muhammad created Islam, he was a worshipper of\nShukracharya \u2013as he was a Namboodiri .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Brihaspati was the mentor&nbsp; ( guru ) of the devas of India\u2014 God of the\npeople in Europe also known as Zeus/ Ammon/ Thor..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THOR, ZEUS, MARDUK,\nAMMON, BRIHASPATI AND JUPITER &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Shukracharya and\nBrihaspati were classmates\u2014under a teacher who was the father of Brihaspati.\nThis teacher showed endless partiality to his own son Brihaspati though he was\ninferior in every respect to Shukracharya. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting upset,\nShukracharya offered his services to the bitter enemy of Devas ( who has\nemployed Brihaspati ) the asuras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The asura ( demon ) King\nof my home state King Mahabali employed Shukracharya as his advisor. &nbsp;In his rule the land of Kerala prospered due\nto excellent advise from Shukracharya making the Gods ( devas ) jealous. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then asura King Mahabali of Kerala did\nthe Ashwametha yaga ( a vote of confidence among vassal kings ) and became\nemperor .&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Lord Vishnu came on earth as avatar Vamana (\nthe midget brahmin ) to kill King Mahabali. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why we in\nKerala celebrate Onam\u2014and this includes Christians and Muuslims too . &nbsp;We do NOT celebrate Diwali which celebrates\nthe victory of the Devas over the Asuras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The Mayan civilization\nworshipped another Asura, Maya danava.&nbsp;\nIn ancient days Peru area was PATALA. The asuras took refuge when they\nwere attacked by Devas here.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">MAYA , INCA , AZTEC\nCIVILIZATIONS DECODED &nbsp;VADAKAYIL .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya Danava had his own\nvimana ( flying saucer )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>FLIGHT OF THE VEDIC\nVIMANA VADAKAYIL&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<o:p>&nbsp;</o:p><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our puranas ,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">the Mecca oasis was called </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Makeshwar' , </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">a place were Vedic agnihotra havanams were\nperformed .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kaabaleshwar was the\nname of the Shiva temple ( with the black stone ) \u2013 &nbsp;where a Namboodiri family were hereditary\npriests , and they were Muhammad\u2019s ansectors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Shina temple was\nowned belonged to the king of Calicut\u2014 &nbsp;as\nit also doubled a as a trade post ( spices ) and camel watering place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>VEDIC PRACTICES IN\nMECCA VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Makh in sanskrit means\n'Havan' or 'Yagya'. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were 360 temples\nin Kaaba with the grand Kaabaleshara Shiva temple housing a most powerful shiva\nlingam black stone in the centre. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nwhite historian of Britannica says the truth ( for a change ) &nbsp;when they counted and recorded 360\nidols inside Kaaba.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<i style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; text-align: justify;\"><b>Below: &nbsp;6000 year old Lord Rama and Hanuman carvings in Silemania, &nbsp;Iraq.</b></i><br />\n<i style=\"color: blue; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">ON FRIDAY AND THEY PRAY COMPULSORILY ?</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>FRIDAY IS KNOWN AS\nSHUKRAVARAM &nbsp;IN MALAYALAM &nbsp;AND &nbsp;SANSKRIT\n.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ON FRIDAY SHUKRACHARYA\nWAS BORN.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Has anybody on this planet revealed this so far?&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astrology originated in\nIndia. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala , Venus (sukra) is\nconsidered as a subha graha (benefic / auspicious planet) by nature. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not a single astrologer worth his salt will disagree. &nbsp;If Venus ( shukra ) is strong and favourably placed one may acquire things of\nart and pleasure, co-operates with others reciprocally in an harmonious manner\nand gains, falls in love, gets married, love and affection for spouse\nincreases, begets daughters, rise due to the patronage or favour of some lady\nand well-wishers.</span></i><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; C<span style=\"color: blue;\">HANDRA GUPTA MAURYA THE\nFIRST EMPEROR OF MAURYA EMPIRE CREATED BY CHANAKYA AS SOON AS ALEXANDER CROSSED\nTHE DARDENELLES </span>&nbsp;, &nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta;\">ALEXANDER THE GREAT DEFEATED BY KING PORUS OF\nA SMALL KINGDOM WITH JUST 85 WAR ELEPHANTS</span> , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">TOTAL MENTAL DISINTEGRATION OF GREEK ARMY ON KNOWING\nTHAT MAURYA EMPIRE ARMY HAD 9000 WAR ELEPHANTS AND NANDA EMPIRE ARMY HAD 6000\nWAR ELEPHANTS</span> ,&nbsp; PSYCHOLOGICAL WARFARE BY\nCHANAKYA BY INTRODUCING TIBETAN MASTIFFS WHOSE BOOMING INFRA SOUND BARKS TERRORISED\nTHE GREEK ARMY HORSES </b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
