font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The passages where\nChanakya says in his works \u201c \u2018The ends justify the means\u2019 and the ruler should\nuse any means to attain his goals and his actions required no moral sanctions.\u201d\n&nbsp;is injected by the white invader.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;In politics, Chanakya has NEVER advocated the\nuse of false accusations and killings by a king\u2019s secret agent .&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nor did Chanakya ever\nwrite that the observance of morals and ethics was not necessary for a ruler. &nbsp;All his written works namely, \u2018Arthashastra\u2019\nand \u2018Nitishastra\u2019 advocated &nbsp;a level\nheaded rational&nbsp; approach and an\nunabashed advocacy of real politic, that was all .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chanakya has not advocated&nbsp; ruthlessness and deceit\u2014 unless it is to pro-actively crush a black mamba type enemy from abroad coming to enslave your\nmotherland and rob her blind --like Alexander the Gay..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chanakya used to dress\nup in cotton mundu , the Kerala way, and his appearance was a bit too simple and\nfunny , for a professor or the Prime Minister of a mighty nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Chankaya became\nold he donated his meager wealth to the poor and like Chandra gupta Maurya went\non sanyas to Kashi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chandragupta's son\nBindusara extended the rule of the Mauryan empire towards southern India. He\nalso had a Greek ambassador at his court, named Deimachus Strabo.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader claimed\nthat Chandra Gupta Maurya centralized prosititution and gambling. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c It controlled prices\nand trade, including trade in liquor and prostitution. It obliged drinking\nplaces to have couches, scents, water and other amenities, and drinking places\nand \"public houses\" were not to be near each other-BLAH BLAH \u201c . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a LIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hey did he control\ncondom factories too ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was NO\nprostitution is India like in the west till the white invader created COMFORT\nSTATIONS for the white troops.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deceit most foul was\ninvolved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DEVADASI SYSTEM , THE\nIMMORAL LIE OF TEMPLE DANCER PROSTITUTES CREATED BY THE WHITE INVADER VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Greek generals\nEudemus, and Peithon, ruled as satraps until around 316 BCE, till they were\ndriven away by Chandra Gupta Maurya . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first Seleucid\nking, Seleucus I, a former general under Alexander, attempted to recover lands\ntaken by Chandragupta. But in the year 305 BCE Chandragupta turned back\nSeleucus' drive. Seleucus Nikator was forced to settle with Chandragupta.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Chandragupta\nMaurya defeated&nbsp; Satrap Seleucus Nikator &nbsp;he made a treaty, which gave him Kabul,\nGandhara, and parts of Persia . Chandragupta also married his daughter .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bindusara traded regularly with Greeks, Syrians, and Egyptians. &nbsp;&nbsp;A lot of foreign rulers send their\nambassadors to the Maurya court. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Arthasastra poison\nhas been injected by the white historian , where \u201c aggrandizement is human\nnature, that a power superior in strength to another power should launch a war\nagainst that power, and that war keeps a nation's blood circulation regular\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chanakya has been\nvilified by western scholars, just to justify the defeat of the Greeko\nSatraps... He was compassionate to the poor and kind, harsh to the evil and\ndeceitful.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LIES galore by the\nwestern historian- \u201c People who were considered dangerous to Chanakya , might\ndisappear without a trace. &nbsp;He had food\ntasters in order to avoid being poisoned. And he never slept in the same bed\ntwo nights in succession\u201d &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hey, what about drinking\ndaaru&nbsp; from a new bottle every day, &nbsp;like Saddam Hussian opening a new Black Label\nwhisky bottle every time he wanted a drink. &nbsp;Did Chanakya sleep under the bed too?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c&nbsp; Eliciting confessions by torture remained a\nnormal method in police work. Punishment depended on class: Brahmin's were not\ntortured, but upon conviction of a crime they could be branded, exiled or sent\nto work in the mines. &nbsp;A Greek\nethnographer, Megasthenes (350-290 BC) described a low incidence of thievery in\nChandragupta's India, and this might have been a result of the punishment for\nsuch a crime.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hey, so the mothers of these\nwhite historians did NOT screw around as their father put chastity belts on\ntheir collective crotches &nbsp;? &nbsp;Could they NOT have been virtuous women ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Could citizens of\nChanakya be just contented and happy ? &nbsp;Of\ncourse brown skinned people are supposed to be miserable coolies \u2013nay- beggars\n!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Zcu73fA1Tdc/U-R_Tjby3iI/AAAAAAAAuTQ/zmMy4bZReiA/s1600/14850-asokacopy-13gt54542624-535-640x480.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Zcu73fA1Tdc/U-R_Tjby3iI/AAAAAAAAuTQ/zmMy4bZReiA/s1600/14850-asokacopy-13gt54542624-535-640x480.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Hindu king Ashoka is\nsaid to have been of a wicked nature and bad temper. He submitted his ministers\nto a test of loyalty and had 500 of them killed. &nbsp;He also kept a harem of around 500 women. &nbsp;When a few of these women insulted him, he had\nthe whole lot of them burnt to death. He also built hell on earth, an elaborate\nand horrific torture chamber. Somehow he broke away from his\ncaptors and outran them, collapsing in exhaustion when he reached the safety of\nthe jungle. He slept where he fell, and as he slept, a lion came and licked the\nsweat off his face. He woke to see the beast calmly walking away; he knew then\nthat he was destined for rule.\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u2013a small bird told him that\u2014 she sent a TWEET !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another one spAke\u2014\u201cChanakya\nhad been born with a full set of teeth, a sign that local monks explained as an\nomen of future kingship. But Chanakya's father feared that royal power would\nmean the perdition of his son's soul, so he ground down the teeth with a file \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oh boy, that must have\nbeen painful.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4UVTX1LvOVE/U-SKzgB3WYI/AAAAAAAAuTg/lL8GBclL21I/s1600/imadfges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"292\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4UVTX1LvOVE/U-SKzgB3WYI/AAAAAAAAuTg/lL8GBclL21I/s1600/imadfges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a prime minister Chanakya mentored kings Chandra Gupta Maurya and Bindusara.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was NOT back seat driving.\nRather nurturing his disciples.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once he accomplished his purpose, he just\nretired and went on sanyas for a life of contemplation, as per Sanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kautilya / Chankaya was\na man of DEEDS AND NOT WORDS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had NO time for\nfools.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is criticized for\ndoing what\u2019s necessary.&nbsp; He was the one\nwho had no hesitation to spill the blood of one bad black mamba , to save many\ninnocent lives.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even the modern global\ndiplomacy revolves around the Chanakya\u2019s principle of&nbsp; \u201csaam, daam, dand, bhed\u201d = \u201cpersuade,\npurchase, punish, exploit the weakness\u2019 , to screw his defaulters .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">World history is simple\nincomplete without mentioning his great contributions.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>DIGRESSION KHABARDAAR !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qUJNipheqak/U-SRL6xdQAI/AAAAAAAAuUA/_if-PXfpUuE/s1600/20140618_113721.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above photo has to do\nwith the comment below:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">###############<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dear Captain, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yazidis - the iraqi\ntribe which faces genocide in the hands of ISIS militants are said to be <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">people who believe in\nReIncarnation and a dualistic form of worship. Are they linked to Hindu,\nBuddhist or any Dharmic spirituality ? Please shed some light on this tribe and\nthe current crisis they face.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thanks,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naveen<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">#######################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">August 7, 2014 at 12:20\nPM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">hi n,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yazidi have Indian\nDNA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were the ancient\nVedic Hindu caretakers ( of great culture ) of the Hindu shrines in Gobekli\nTepe, in Kurdish Turkey. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yazidi were ancient\nfollowers of Shukracharya. Their calendar says that they have been away from\nGobleki Tepe for 4800 years. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They still do sunrise\nand sunset ( surya vandhanam ) prayers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They beat the dholak,\nblow the shank , take holy river baths and revere the peacock ( Malek Tavous )\n\u2014 a bird NOT found in that neck of the woods. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yazidis do not circumcise\n, as is done by everybody else in those areas. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have strict Gotra\nrules. See how much a social custom can reveal. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as Islam was\nfounded by Mohhamad they Muslims started killing the Yezidis . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ISIS has declared the\nYazidi are SHAITAN ( pagan ) worshippers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">25 million Yezidis have\nbeen killed by Muslims over the past 800 years\u2014nobody cares, as they are NOT\nJews ! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today their dwindling\npopulation all over the planet is less than 9 lakhs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">what a shame !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"border-bottom: double windowtext 6.75pt; border: none; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-element: para-border-div; padding: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">###################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Above: The Hindu brahmin head with Sikha / Kudumi , unearthed at the stonehenge of Gobekli Tepi ( Turkey ) -- this stone head of the priest is a YAZIDI head .</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: x-large;\">THERE WAS NOT ONE SINGLE INDIAN BUDDHIST WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BUDDHA HIMSELF STARTED EATING PIG THOUGH HE GAVE BIG TALK ABOUT PEACE AND NON-VIOLENCE...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BUDDHAs LAST MEAL WAS PIG GIBLET ( SOMETHING LIKE PORK SORPOTEL )..HE DIED DUE TO THIS MEAL..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT THAT TIME , NO RELIGION ALLOWED EATING PIG.. THEN CHRISTIANITY CAME ALONG IN 325 AD WHICH ALLOWED EATING PIG..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PIG HAS SAME DNA AS HUMANS ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/of-pork-and-pigs-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BUDDHIST NATIONS ARE THE ONLY ONES WHO EAT DOG , SNAKE AND OTHER CREATURES.. THIS IS WHY BUDDHISM HAS FAILED ALL OVER THE WORLD.. I HAVE SEEN HIS PLANET, I KNOW !</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">BUDDHA REJECTED THE SOUL.. THE METERS ARE SACRED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE SOUND OF THE VEDIC VERSES MATTERS , NOT THE MEANING OF THE VERSE , WHICH BASICALLY INDUCE A FEELING OF GRATITUDE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE WHITE MAN THOUGHT HE COULD INJECT POISON INTO OUR VEDAS-- THEY NEVER KNOW ONCE POISON IS INJECTED THE VERSE IS MATHEMATICALLY INCONGRUENT --IT IS LIKE CURDLING MILK<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">..</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8702649353056027309\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1550048011022#c8702649353056027309\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 13, 2019 at 2:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME ABOUT \"ARYAVARTA \"..<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE EXPLAINED IT BELOW..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL EXPLAIN IT AGAIN..<br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA IS SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM MEANS \"ABODE OF THE ARYANS\"<br />\n<br />\nNOW<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WHO IS AN ARYAN ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIS HE A WHITE SKINNED , BLONDE, BLUE EYED MAN --AS ROTHSCHILD AND HIS AGENT CHITPAVAN JEW LOKMANYA BAL GANGHADAHARA TILAK TOLD ?<br />\n<br />\nNOT AT ALL.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">ARYAN MEANS -- A HIGHLY EVOLVED AND NOBLE MAN..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nARYABHATTA ( 2700 BC ) WAS AN ARYAN .. HIS REAL NAME IS ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD FROM MY HOMETOWN OF CALICUT -- A VISITING PROFESSOR FROM KODUUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( MUZIRIS ) OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ..<br />\n<br />\nBHATTATHIRIPADS ARE HE CREAMY LAYER OF NAMBOODIRIS WELL VERSED IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY..<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS ARE HE CREAMY LAYER OF THIYYAS OF KERALA WELL VERSED IN SANSKRIT AND VEDA SMRITI ORAL ROUTE..<br />\n<br />\nARYAN NAMBOODIRIS WERE VISITING PROFESSORS AT TAXILA/ NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR / UNIVERSITY OF ALEXANDRIA ETC<br />\n<br />\nCHANAKYA WAS AN ARYAN NAMBOODIRI PROFESSOR AT TAXILA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAN ARYAN WAS RECOGNIZED BY HIS SPECIAL HAIRDO ( KUDUMI TO THE SIDE OF THE HEAD ) ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/sikha-kudumi-choti-open-flag-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA , BRAHMAVARTA AND BRAHMARISHIDESHA ARE ALL THE SAME...<br />\n<br />\nBRAHMAVARTA WAS THE VAST HOLY FOREST UNIVERSITY LAND WHERE THE BRAHMANAS ( PART 2 ) AND ARNYAKAS ( PART 3 ) OF VEDAS --TECHNICAL SECTIONS-- WERE PENNED.. THIS IS MODERN MALABAR OR NORTH KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nThese two parts written in Sanskrit and Grantha lipi ( techinical volumes ) have been stolen by the white invader..<br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA ARYA VAIDYASALA IS A AYURVEDA HOSPITAL RUN BY ARYANS.. EVEN TODAY A NAMBOODIRI LODGE IN A TEMPLE TOWN IS CALLED ARYA BHAVAN.<br />\n<br />\nMANU SAID BHARAT IS THE LAND BETWEEN THE HOLY RIVER OF SARASWATI ( NORTH ) AND THE HOLY LAND OF BRAHMARISHIDESA ( SOUTH ) GIRDLED BY THE SEAS ON EITHER SIDE....<br />\n<br />\nLET ME QUOTE BHAGAWAD GITA CHAPTER 2 VERSE 2 , PENNED 6000 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\n\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u092d\u0917\u0935\u093e\u0928\u0941\u0935\u093e\u091a |<br />\n\u0915\u0941\u0924\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e \u0915\u0936\u094d\u092e\u0932\u092e\u093f\u0926\u0902 \u0935\u093f\u0937\u092e\u0947 \u0938\u092e\u0941\u092a\u0938\u094d\u0925\u093f\u0924\u092e\u094d |<br />\n\u0905\u0928\u093e\u0930\u094d\u092f\u091c\u0941\u0937\u094d\u091f\u092e\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0917\u094d\u092f\u092e\u0915\u0940\u0930\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0915\u0930\u092e\u0930\u094d\u091c\u0941\u0928 || 2||<br />\n<br />\n\u015bhr\u012b bhagav\u0101n uv\u0101cha<br />\nkutastv\u0101 ka\u015bhmalamida\u1e41 vi\u1e63hame samupasthitam<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">an\u0101rya</span>-ju\u1e63h\u1e6damaswargyam ak\u012brti-karam arjuna<br />\n<br />\n\u015bhr\u012b-bhagav\u0101n uv\u0101cha\u2014the Supreme Lord said; kuta\u1e25\u2014wherefrom; tv\u0101\u2014to you; ka\u015bhmalam\u2014delusion; idam\u2014this; vi\u1e63hame\u2014in this hour of peril; samupasthitam\u2014overcome; an\u0101rya\u2014<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">CUNT OF THE FIRST ORDER</span>&nbsp;; ju\u1e63h\u1e6dam\u2014practiced; aswargyam\u2014which does not lead to the higher abodes; ak\u012brti-karam\u2014leading to disgrace; arjuna\u2014Arjun<br />\n<br />\nTranslation<br />\nBG 2.2: The Supreme Lord said: My dear Arjun, how has this delusion overcome you in this hour of peril? It is not befitting an&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">NOBLE HIGHLY EVOLVED MAN</span>. It leads not to the higher abodes, but to disgrace.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS 100% PROOF !<br />\n<br />\nManu wrote 10,300 years ago --\u201c All the people on earth should learn their respective practices from a ARYAN born in that land of Brahmarisihidesa \u201d..<br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA ( PUNT/ SHEBA / OPHIR/ MALABAR/ ARYAVARTA / LAND OF GODS / BRAHMARISHIDESA ) WAS PART OF THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION-WHICH PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILISATION BY SEVERAL MILLINIUMS..<br />\n<br />\nEVEN TODAY KERALA IS KNOWN AS GODs OWN COUNTRY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nARYAVARTA IS THE CRADLE OF THIS PLANETs KNOWLEDGE ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c8702649353056027309-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c8702649353056027309-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2594440602899249531\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. XIV, 110.47).<br />\n<br />\nThe Law Code of Manu mentions the Rig Veda many times, but the Rig Veda did not mention the Law Code of Manu even once.<br />\n<br />\nMANU WAS A SAGE FROM ARYAVARTA..<br />\n<br />\nThis is because Rig Veda went of oral route for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries ago.. Manu made his laws 10,300 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nThe Law Code of Manu does not just mention the Rig Veda only in passing, but as the cornerstone of its civilization's philosophical and spiritual thought.<br />\n<br />\nHAMMURABI LIFTED HIS LAWS WHOLE SALE FROM THE LAWS OF MANU ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2594440602899249531\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div>\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4184446395271055880\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_78M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IT IS ORGANIC ( NOT INORGANIC LKE SIDDHA MEDICINES )\u2014VANASPATI/ VANSPATYA/ AUSHADI/ VIRUDHA..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nDravyaguna (pharmacology) deals comprehensively about rasa , guna , virya, vipaka and prabhava (pharmacokinetics and pharmcodynamics) of herbs\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThere are five concepts of the substance, namely:--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nrasa (taste),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ngu\u1e47a (properties),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nv\u012brya (potency),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nvip\u0101ka (rasa after digestion and metabolism)</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nand prabh\u0101va (specific pharmacological effect),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014which determine and explain the pharmacological behavior of a substance.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_25.html?showComment=1527320304009#c4422559943530061338\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 26, 2018 at 1:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_29MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHITLER DID PROPAGANDA THAT HE IS ARYAN AND NAZIS ARE ARYANS WITH HINDU SYMBOL OF SWASTIKA , THE KALA CHAKRA .. THIS WAS ROTHSCHILDs PROPAGANDA AS JEW HITLER WAS ROTHSCHILDs AGENT..<br />\n<br />\nJEWS OF EUROPE ( BASED FROM GEORGIA ) WERE MOSTLY LEFT HANDED HOMOSEXUALS , AND THEY ADOPTED THE SYMBOL OF SHIVA / SHAKTI MERGE , THE SIX POINTED STAR..<br />\n<br />\nARYANS ARE NOT BLUE EYED BLONDE EUROPEANS... ARYANS WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WHO KNEW SANSKRIT AND VEDAS ON ORAL ROUTE... THEY EXCELLED IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY AND WERE VISITING PROFESSORS FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( OWNED BY CALICUT KING ) TO TAXILA/NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR AND FOREIGN UNIVERSITIES LIKE ALEXANDRIA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE MATH KNOWINGCREAM OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( NAMBOODIRIPADS ) WERE BHATTATHIRIPADS .. ARYABHATTAs REAL NAME IS ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD ... ARYAN WAS A TITLE ( MAN OF KNOWLEDGE )..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS WERE SANSKRIT KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS OF KERALA...WHO WERE RULING CLASS. THIYYAS ARE DANAVAS... DANU IS THE MOTHER OF DANAVAS ..<br />\n<br />\nMaya Danava was a descendant of Danu, one of Kashyapa's 13 wives and a daughter of Dakhsa Prajapati. Danu, the Hindu primordial goddess, is mentioned in the Rigveda ( penned down 7000 years ago ) , as mother of the Danavas. Kashmir is named after Kashyapa..<br />\n<br />\nMAYA DANAVA is the creator of the MAYAN calendar.. He made the Indraprastha palace ..in which Duryodhana fell down in a pool of water in the hall of illusions ..<br />\n<br />\nKala [Time] created yonder heaven, and Kala made these realms of earth,<br />\nBy Kala, stirred to motion, both what is and what shall be, expand, (...).Kala created living things and first of all Prajapati,From Kala self-made KASHYAPA, from Kala Holy Fire was born.--\u2014\u2009<b>Atharvaveda, Book XIX, Hymns L51-53 ( 5000 BC )</b><br />\n<br />\nADITI is mentioned 81 times in Rig Veda..The Vedas went on oral rute for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries ago..Aditi is the mother of DEVAS ( example Indra ) and was also a wife of Kashyapa..<br />\n<br />\nSons of Danu ( DANAVAS ) and sons of Aditi ( DEVAS ) were opposite forces .. In Samudra Manthan the DANAVAS held the head of Vasuki the snake and DEVAS held the tail to churn the comic ocean..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/secrets-of-shankh-or-conch-product-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJERUSALEM AND BATUMI ( GEORGIA/ KHAZARIA ) WERE SEA PORTS FROM WHERE THE JEWS ( MIDDLE MEN OF SPICES ) TOOK CALICUT KINGs SPICES AFTER OVERLAND ROUTE JOURNEY --LOADED IT ON SHIPS AND TOOK IT TO EUROPE FOR SALE.<br />\n<br />\nFROM SALALAH ( DHOFAR SEA PORT ) THE SPICES WENT VIA MECCA OASIS TO PALESTINE..<br />\n<br />\nFROM GWADAR ( DHOFAR SEA PORT ) THE SPICES WENT TO BATUMI GEORGIA AND CONSTANTINOPLE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE JEWS OF CONSTANTINOPLE WERE CRYPTO. THEY STILL ARE .. THE FIRST REAL DEEP STATE WAS IN TURKEY WITH CRYPTO JEWS CONTROLLING AND MUSLIMS RULING..<br />\n<br />\nYOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS COULD NOT MARRY OR OWN LAND..WHILE THE ELDEST BROTHER COULD HAVE 4 WIVES AND OWN ALL FERTILE LAND..<br />\n<br />\nMOHAMMADs FATHER WAS THE YOUNGER BROTHER OF A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WHO WAS PUJARI OF SHIVA TEMPLE ( KAABA )..WHEN MOHAMMAD MADE HIS NEW RELIGION THE FIRST THING HE DID WAS ALLOWING ALL YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS TO HAVE 4 WIVES...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE ORIGINAL JEWS OF PALESTINE ARE ALL IN KERALA , OR DEAD OR CONVERTED..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE NO ORIGINAL JEWS IN KHAZARIA .. THESE ARE ALL A GANG OF CRIMINALS / HOMOSEXUALS ( WHITES ) WHO WERE WARNED TO ADOPT A RELIGION OR PERISH ..&nbsp; &nbsp;THESE ARE THE \"<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SEMITES</span></b>\". THEIR DESCENDANTS ARE THE CURRENT JEWS OF ISRAEL-WHO HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH PALESTINE..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. The monument was situated on the\noutskirts of the town of Amaravati near the ancient ruined city of Dharanikota.\nIt was founded in the 3rd-2nd centuries BC during Ashoka Maurya' reign UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE STUPA NEVER EXISTED\nAT THE SPOT IN AMARAVATI \u2013IT WAS JUST A FIGMENT OF ROTHSCHILDs SLIMY\nIMAGINATION.. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE SEEN THE\nAMARAVATI BUDDHIST RELICS IN THE BRITISH MUSEUM\u2014 THEY ARE ALL FAKE\u2014JUST LIKE\nTHE ASHOKA ROCK EDICTS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have seen the Colin\nMackenzie album of maps, plans and drawings of sculpture from the stupa at\nAmaravati at the British Library\u2014all FAKE...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; NONSENSE LIKE MONEY, SUCCESS , MAINTENANCE, BHAKTI ( REPLACING SHRADDHA ) , SUPPRESSION , PRODUCTION,SWEETNESS, DEFENCE , PENANCE, SERVICE ETC<br /><br />THE 24 SPOKES HAS 24 FEMALE DIETIES ( WOMENs 8<br />2nd Line: Bha, go, De, va, ya, dhee, ma, hi - 8<br />3rd Line: Dhi, yo, yo, nah, ra, cho, da, ya - 8<br />__<br />TOTAL-- 24<br /><br />GAYATRI MANTRA ADDRESSES QUASAR ( SAVITUR ) \u2013 THE Exactly like what they did for BR Ambedkar ..<br />\n<br />\nIyothee Thass founded the Punchmar Mahajana Sabha in 1891 along with Rettaimalai Srinivasan. Punchamas are the one who does not come under Varna system. They are called as Avarnas.<br />\n<br />\nThass baby was made out to be a gret Sanskrit pandit though he did NOT know a word of Sanskrit. He was converted into a Pali expert, though he did not know word of Pali. Pali is a Burmese language , it has nothing to do with India..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild got his agent JEW Robert Caesar Childers to convert Pali into an Indian language.. Sorry, Indians are NOT stupid to create a ridiculous language like Pali.</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nChilders baby created the first Pali -English dictionary..He was an expert in Hebrew. He went to Sri Lanka to spread Pali among Buddhists there, giving financial incentives.<br />\n<br />\nChilders baby wrote that The Pali Canon (Tripitaka) means the \"Three Baskets.\" The Three Baskets were first written during the reign of King Ashoka around 250 BCE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">But HEY Ashoka never existed.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nChilders BASTARD lied that canons of Buddhist literature are based upon first century CE Sanskrit translations of the Pali canon, which are called the \"Tripitaka\" in Sanskrit.<br />\n<br />\nSo now Sanskrit is a LANGOT of Pali \u2013TEE HEEEEE .<br />\n<br />\nGerman JEW Max Muller used JEW Michael Viggo Fausb\u00f6ll a Professor of Sanskrit in Copehnagen to give BULL about Pali . Max Muller would translate Fausboll babys version of the Dhammapada into English. (M\u00fcller in Vol. 10 of the Sacred Books of the East)..<br />\n<br />\nThe Dhammapada ( way of DHARMA ) is a collection of sayings of the Buddha in verse form, most of it injected with perfume to make Buddhism a great religion. Dhammapada was gleaned out of Khuddaka Nikaya . This nikaya consists of fifteen (Thailand), seventeen (Sri Lanka), or eighteen books (Burma) in different editions on various topics attributed to the Buddha\u2014all injected with perfume.<br />\n<br />\nMax Muller used JEW Thomas Rhys Davids , a Rothschild employee in Sri Lanka, to found the Pali text society. Rhys Davids wrote that Britons had a natural, \"racial\" affinity with Buddhist doctrine. TEE HEEE !<br />\n<br />\nRothschild opened out a PALI LANGUAGE DEPT at the University College, London\u2014with Robert Caesar Childers as the first professor. This dept churned out FAKE HISTORY about Emperor Ashoka who never existed. Today the Dept of Pali in JNU sustains this bullshit, with Amartya Sens help..<br />\n<br />\nBR AMBEDKAR MASS CONVERTED LAKHS OF MAHAR DALITS INTO BUDDHISM..<br />\n<br />\nBUT LATER WHEN THESE CONVERT BUDDHISTS FOUND OUT THAT BRAHMIN HATER BR AMBEDKAR MARRIED A CHITPAVAN BRAHMIN WOMAN, THEY PROMPTLY DISCARDED BUDDHISM.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_60B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2048155941715703019\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_60M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/09005308486599436569\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Shivoham</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_11.html?showComment=1536760377343#c2048155941715703019\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 12, 2018 at 7:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_60MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px;\">\nThanks for the reply sir,<br />\nCan you provide any insight on why the buddhists left out sattva part and incoroporate only tamas/raja(yin/yang)in buddhism? , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is what the Troika\nof Rothschild wrote about our priceless Vedas. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The\nVedas are a worthless set of books. &nbsp;There is no reason either to call them sacred\nor infallible. &nbsp;Nobody has had the\ncourage to ask why these worthless books which contain nothing but invocation\nto tribal gods to destroy the enemies, loot their property and give it to their\nfollowers, have been made sacred and infallible.</span><o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>BR Ambedkar </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7RVIl3tYw4M/U9EgjXj9TiI/AAAAAAAAt2A/WcfNcfC1Xrw/s1600/dobtnywnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"112\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7RVIl3tYw4M/U9EgjXj9TiI/AAAAAAAAt2A/WcfNcfC1Xrw/s1600/dobtnywnload.jpg\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The\nVedas are idle fantasies and absurd legends, which have NO sancity .&nbsp; If there is only one God, who created the\nwhole mankind, why did he write the Vedas only in Sanskrit language despite his\nanxiety for the welfare of the whole mankind? &nbsp;What about the welfare of those who do not\nunderstand this language? &nbsp;&nbsp;Vedas are a form of false consciousness .</span><o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Mahatma Jyotirao Phule </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-w0MxfuYTUCE/U9EgoqyW9wI/AAAAAAAAt2I/K6baFAd_UOs/s1600/downlddoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-w0MxfuYTUCE/U9EgoqyW9wI/AAAAAAAAt2I/K6baFAd_UOs/s1600/downlddoad.jpg\" width=\"146\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The\nVedas must be burnt.&nbsp; A careful study of\nthe Vedas, etc., proves beyond doubt that they were written by the Aryans with\na view to disgrace, enslave and exploit the Dravidians.</span><o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>EVR Periyar</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oe3vlL8tA28/U9EgySr_FkI/AAAAAAAAt2Q/FFl2GSMHDuI/s1600/downloooad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oe3vlL8tA28/U9EgySr_FkI/AAAAAAAAt2Q/FFl2GSMHDuI/s1600/downloooad.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">A citation awarded by R\ncontrolled UNESCO described EVR Periyar as \u201cthe prophet of the new age, the\nSocrates of South East Asia, f ather of social reform movement and arch enemy of\nignorance, superstitions, meaningless customs and base manners\u201d.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-huAFy1dLSMk/U9IfuQiuyVI/AAAAAAAAt5s/vyhYU2k1aw8/s1600/imaHJKges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WUnjkY0__Oo/U9E3arBBrhI/AAAAAAAAt34/jdNFMqjnygU/s1600/1-plavgncksmostd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"432\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WUnjkY0__Oo/U9E3arBBrhI/AAAAAAAAt34/jdNFMqjnygU/s1600/1-plavgncksmostd.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nasadiya sutra\nverses have been acknowledged as THE earliest account of skeptical inquiry .\nAstronomer Carl Sagan quoted it in discussing India's \"tradition of\nskeptical questioning and unselfconscious humility before the great cosmic\nmysteries.</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qdUfjQDLyxA/U9EhAIG7KBI/AAAAAAAAt2Y/8ObMkefDE6M/s1600/saganuniverse.jpgEA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qdUfjQDLyxA/U9EhAIG7KBI/AAAAAAAAt2Y/8ObMkefDE6M/s1600/saganuniverse.jpgEA.jpg\" width=\"397\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE : <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">This idea of a\nperiodically expanding and contracting universe, which involves a scale of time\nand space of vast proportions, has arisen not only in modern cosmology, but\nalso in ancient Indian mythology. Experiencing the universe as an organic and\nrhythmically moving cosmos, the Hindus were able to develop evolutionary\ncosmologies which come very close to our modern scientific models</span></i> : UNQUOTE --&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Capra, The Tao of Physics<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christian historians have\nbeen trying to date Rig Veda to 1500 BC ( instead of 5000 BC ) because as per &nbsp;Bible the big bang happened in 4004 BC at 9 AM\non 23<sup>rd</sup> October. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And how can the servant race be better than the\nwhite master race ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The white master race\nhad NOT invented or discovered anything till they came to India, other than what\nthey grabbed from the Arabs to whom we sold our knowledge in gold.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">As soon the immoral white\ninvader came to India they learnt Sanskrit, stole our intellectual rights\npatented it in their names and destroyed the originals &nbsp;( or kept it back after injecting POISON into\nthe originals ).<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1FozL00zc-Q/U9NU2RwfYSI/AAAAAAAAt90/_xt9QeuYgLU/s1600/townes-science-culNVDture.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1FozL00zc-Q/U9NU2RwfYSI/AAAAAAAAt90/_xt9QeuYgLU/s1600/townes-science-culNVDture.jpg\" width=\"317\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Dashavataras\n( ten principal avatars of Lord Vishnu ) are a true sequential depiction of the\ngreat unfolding of evolution. &nbsp;Like the\nevolutionary process itself the first true manifestation of the god is a fish\nthe </span><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Matsya</b></span><span style=\"color: blue;\">, then comes the aquatic reptile turtle, the </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Kurma</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">, &nbsp;then an animal the boar </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Varaha</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">, then </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Narashimha</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">,\na humanoid being, </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Vamana</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">, the pigmy man then the rest five are humans</span>. </i>UNQUOTE\n<b>-&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>JBS Haldane \u2013 British evolutionary biologist &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 10 avatars of Lord\nVishnu are-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Matsya (the fish) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Koorma (the\ntortoise)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Varaha (the boar)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Narasimha (the\nhuman-lion)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Vamana (the dwarf)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Parasurama (the\nangry man, Rama with an axe)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Lord Rama (the\nperfect man, king of Ayodha)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. Lord Krishna (the\ndivine statesman) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. Lord Ayyappa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10. Kalki (the mighty\nwarrior)--the FINAL avatar<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have put up some\nposts about the first five avatars of Lord Vishnu .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">VISHNU FIRST MATSYA\nAVATAR&nbsp;&nbsp;VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"They were very\nadvanced Hindu astronomers in 6000 BCE. Vedas contain an account of the\ndimension of Earth, Sun, Moon, Planets and Galaxies.</span></i>\" (<b>Calendars and\nConstellatio'&nbsp; - Emmelin Plunret&nbsp; </b>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 30000 years by\noral route, the Vedas were penned down in 5000 BC&nbsp; \u2014 the Maharishis predicted that the human DNA\nwill &nbsp;getting degraded , pineal glands would\nget atrophied , memories and mental acuity would &nbsp;deteriorate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I was in school we\nhad in our school science text, ( prepared by Lord Macaulay ), the Indian\nconcept of the planet.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was the back of a\ntortoise , and the white man ridiculed that Indians were dead scared of people\nfalling off the edge of the world. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then they gave\nvarious other models of Greek, English , etc where the white man got it right,\nunlike the stupid Indian.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;as a 8 year old child--and breaking into a sweat. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
