, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Seven colours in the\nsun \u2013 Atharva Veda 7. 107. 1. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Electromagnetic field,\nconversion of mass and energy \u2013 Rg 10. 72. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The gravitational\neffect of solar system makes the earth stable (R.V.1-103-2, 1-115-4 and\n5-81-2).<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The axle of the earth\ndoes not get rusted ,the earth continues to revolve on its axle (R.V.\n1-164-29)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The Sun never sets or\nrises and it is the earth, which rotates (Sama-Ved 121).<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The science of Time and\nits subtle nature is described in (R.V.1-92-12 and 1-95-8)</span></i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wfloptXMu7s/U9HpPTrHZFI/AAAAAAAAt4g/oxGlhQ9NgeM/s1600/downhhhload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"236\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wfloptXMu7s/U9HpPTrHZFI/AAAAAAAAt4g/oxGlhQ9NgeM/s1600/downhhhload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Planets Uranus, Neptune\nand Pluto were named Shweta, Shyama and Teevra in our Vedas &nbsp;( Vyasa Muni).&nbsp;. The names of the rest of the planets have been used in astrology in\nthe rashis. &nbsp;Uranus , Neptune and Pluto\nare NOT used in horoscopes as they stay in a single rashi for too long and are\ntoo far away to effect the human DNA.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-H8xEhZuq4mY/U9HqI46TjoI/AAAAAAAAt4w/Z_iS8bRYZJI/s1600/imgyyages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"228\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-H8xEhZuq4mY/U9HqI46TjoI/AAAAAAAAt4w/Z_iS8bRYZJI/s1600/imgyyages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ptolemy came to India\nin 155 AD, and he stole from the astronomical data from Surya Siddhanta\n(12.85-90) , the most significant being the diameters of Mercury, Venus, Mars,\nJupiter and Saturn . You must understand that these diameters were calculated\naccurately more than 7 millenniums ago when even the atmospheric refraction of\nearth was different.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Greeks Pythagoras and\nPlato studied in India. Orpheus was an Indian sage.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"From the Vedas we\nlearn a practical art of surgery, medicine, music, house building under which mechanized art is included. They\nare encyclopedia of every aspect of life, culture, religion, science, ethics,\nlaw, cosmology and meteorology.\"</span></i> &nbsp;--\n<b>William James, American Author<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-P2G3xuE7vyo/U9HoZe8nOhI/AAAAAAAAt4Y/fABV718K_0E/s1600/imahhjges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"188\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-P2G3xuE7vyo/U9HoZe8nOhI/AAAAAAAAt4Y/fABV718K_0E/s1600/imahhjges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Whenever I have read\nany part of the Vedas, I have felt that some unearthly and unknown light\nilluminated me. &nbsp;In the great teaching of\nthe Vedas, there is no touch of sectarianism. &nbsp;It is of all ages, climbs, and nationalities\nand is the royal road for the attainment of the Great Knowledge. When I read\nit, I feel that I am under the spangled heavens of a summer night.</span></i> \u201c&nbsp; <b>Henry\nDavid Thoreau, American Thinker&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XnOBvSyY-j4/U9Hrw2u9T0I/AAAAAAAAt48/RrRnTKW5vBo/s1600/downleeefoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XnOBvSyY-j4/U9Hrw2u9T0I/AAAAAAAAt48/RrRnTKW5vBo/s1600/downleeefoad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>\"India - The land\nof Vedas, the remarkable works contain not only religious ideas for a perfect\nlife, but also facts which science has proved true. Electricity, radium,\nelectronics, airship, all were known to the seers who founded the Vedas.\"</i> </span>&nbsp;&nbsp;--<b>Wheeler Wilcox</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0esDK-vworY/U9IgGswipqI/AAAAAAAAt58/NSnRjJV4C-U/s1600/infiBBnite1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0esDK-vworY/U9IgGswipqI/AAAAAAAAt58/NSnRjJV4C-U/s1600/infiBBnite1.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I shall provide a\ntranslation of the seven verses . &nbsp;It\nrequires Indian DNA to translate it. &nbsp;&nbsp;The\nwhite man cannot do justice as his perception cannot match up.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">A SANSKRIT SCHOLAR IS A MERE LANGUAGE EXPERT , MOSTLY WITHOUT PERCEPTION</b></span> .</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The beauty of the 7\nverses is in its powerful content\u2014you get to see the working of ancient&nbsp;seers minds packing tiny Sanskrit verses in\nrich analysis on cosmological thought constructs--written 7000 years ago..&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These 7 verses ask </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">the most fundamental question about the\nbeginning of the universe and our existence.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A perceptive man will\nnote that these verses are the most sublime expressions of Cosmic Creation in\nall of human legacy, and is the most sophisticated poetic reflections on how\nthis magnificent cosmos emerged.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas is NOT about\nmetered poetry alone . They go deep into the cause of the events taking place\nin the cosmos and unveils the facts.. &nbsp;Seven\nverses, which start from \u2018no time, no space\u2019 mode, gradually reaches the center\nof deep darkness, surrounded by smooth, unending ether.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lo and behold ! Out\nof shapeless nothing, matter with shape emerges. &nbsp;The whole description is amazingly picturesque.\nPoetry is said to be a window with a frame of words and through this window, you\nget to see beyond space time .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These hymns take us to\nthe loftiest heights of philosophy at a time when the rest of the world were\ndoing GRUNT GRUNT for language . &nbsp;It is\ndoubtful whether the human mind will ever &nbsp;surpass these heights.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>VERSE NO 1</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Potential energy/\nkinetic energy<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Attraction/ repulsion<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Excitation/ inhibition<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Organic / inorganic<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Freezing/ melting<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The negative and the\npositive must exist in a balance to ensure that creation and life can exist. &nbsp;When one wanes the other must seamlessly wax \u2013the\nharmonious teamwork of Brahma-Vishnu- Shiva ( creator- mediator- destroyer ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sa\u1e43khya Vedanta\nphilosophy holds that there are only two primary principles ( force fields) ,\nPuru\u1e63a and Prak\u1e5bti , and creation is only a manifestation or evolution of the\nconstituents of Prak\u1e5bti &nbsp;( trinity \u2013 dancer\n) due to the action of Puru\u1e63a's ( brahmAn- witness ) Consciousness.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">iyam visrushtiryata\nababhuva | yadi va dadhe yadi va na |<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">yo asyadhyakshah parame\nvyomann | so amga veda yadi va na veda || 7 ||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">He from whom this\ncreation arose, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">He may hold the reins ,\nor he may not ( for no one else can !)<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">He who surveys it all\nfrom his highest heaven, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">He verily knows it, or\nperhaps even he does not ? (What say you ?)</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Thmoos5iiEM/U9Jw68WxUWI/AAAAAAAAt7E/OIkaRow12jw/s1600/Conscious+EvolutioDFBSn+-+02.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"160\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Thmoos5iiEM/U9Jw68WxUWI/AAAAAAAAt7E/OIkaRow12jw/s1600/Conscious+EvolutioDFBSn+-+02.png\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: red;\">Note : This \u201cwhat say you\u201d is\nfor ignoramuses who are in search for the causative forces alone.</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The Hindu is not asked\nto blindly follow a practice or a belief. He is expected to rely on his\nconscience in the absence of single holy books, middlemen with a hot line to\nGod and single messiahs.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without the ending&nbsp; punchline about the paradox of creation ,\nNasadiya Sukta verse 7 ( Rig Veda 10:129) would lose a lot of its charm.&nbsp; That was the style of a Maharishi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the end... the maharishi\nrishi leaves the choice of knowing god... to the enquirer. It is the greatness\nof the Vedas and ancient Hindu philosophy that it does not force any conclusion\non its followers or ram down religion from&nbsp;\na single holy book , down unwilling throats ..</span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\" </span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In its noble\nsimplicity, in the loftiness of its philosophic vision it is possibly the most\nadmirable bit of philosophy of olden times. .. .. .. No translation can ever do\njustice to the beauty of the original</i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.\" - P</span><b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">aul Deussen (Ref. 5, pp 119\n&amp; 126)</b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In ancient Indian\ntradition , the purpose of debate was to seek agreement by evoking conscience \u2014\nNEVER EVER for victory , by putting down others .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Maharishis\nwere masters of&nbsp; mind sciences --\nMetaphysics, Dielectics and Epistemology. They were philosophers whose theories\ndeal with puzzles about the source, nature, foundation, scope, validity and\nlimits of human knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The maharishi ponders of\na pre-creation stage with nothing in the universe. This is a remarkable vision\nof the pre-big-bang phase. &nbsp;That\nunimaginable phase is described as an eerie nothing where there was no air or ether.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The poet dwells about who might have encapsulated such an awesome void, and\nwhere in the world it could have been when there was no where at all in the\nworld. The seer ponders about how life have emerged when its very substratum\nwas not there to begin with.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the entire universe\nto emerge from cosmic waters , there must have been unbounded energy. Modern\ncosmology speaks of no original energy whence it all came. &nbsp;The Vedic poet postulates that the universe\nmust have come about from an innate spiritual energy. &nbsp;He refers to it as tapas ( intent ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the final verses the\nmaharishi ponders ( he does NOT ram anything down your throats like single holy\nbook religions &nbsp;)sixth verse-- who will\nknow and who can declare when and where from it all started-- &nbsp;since the seekers were not there and also the\ncausative forces were not present..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The philosophy\ncontained within these few verses are mind blowing ! font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">None of the quantum\nscientists have categorized Vedanta as a religious work. They have perused and\nfound that it is a subtle mathematical or scientific analysis.&nbsp; . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta and Quantum\nMechanics describe the same subject\u2014ultimate reality\u2014from opposite points of\nview and perspective. &nbsp;Vedanta examines\nevidence, asserts hypotheses, quotes established authorities both pro and con\nits thesis, and closely reasons its way to a well-substantiated conclusion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The space between the\nelectrons , which gave free energy to the perpetual motion of the electrons ,\nwhich prevent them from falling into the nucleus, is called Akasha as per\nVedanta . The electrons, protons and neutrons are only a small part of the\natom. &nbsp;It is the space between them that\nis, the \u201csubstance.\u201d &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta has told 7000\nyears ago that matter is not condensed substance but a diffused form of\nenergy\u2014and this is what Einstein who was proficient in Vedanta too seconded..</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta\nis the ultimate philosophy of all philosophical speculations. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Vedanta is\navailable in the \u201csoap is civilization\u201d Christian West primarily through\nreligious interpreters in pagan saffron robes has prejudiced their evaluation\nof its relevance to scientific concerns.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bible says that the\nuniverse is only thousands of years old. While Vedanta and the modern quantum theory\nagrees that it is around 14 billion years.&nbsp;\nIt is amazing that the timeless Vedic tradition remains relevant and\neasily expressible in terms of contemporary scientific concepts.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Om\nIsha vasyam idam sarvam, yat kincha jagatyam jagat'<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"All this- whatever\nexists in this changing universe, is pervaded by consciousness\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-Isa\nUpanishad- 5000 BC</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kKGtVY80btA/U9Ng5m6gwQI/AAAAAAAAt-Y/UrTxgUNugEo/s1600/tf2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Om purnamadah\npurnamidam purnaat purnamudachyate,</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>&nbsp; purnasya purnamadaya\npurnamevaavashishyate\"</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"That&nbsp; (consciousness) is full (perfect) ; this (the\nmanifest universe of matter; of names and forms being maya) is full. &nbsp;This fullness has been projected from that\nfullness. &nbsp;When this fullness merges in\nthat fullness,&nbsp; all that remains is\nfullness.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; It is not dead, empty or inert\nbut radiant and shimmering with energetic potential.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; one starting from the inner realm, the other from the\nouter world.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Concerning\nmatter, Einstein once remarked, \"We have been all wrong. What we have\ncalled matter is energy, whose vibration has been so lowered as to be\nperceptible to the senses. There is no matter.\"&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He has just quoted from Vedanta which clearly\nstated Maya, the illusion often mistaken for reality.</span> <o:p></o:p><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In their state of\nhigher consciousness they realized that the ultimate constituents of the\nuniverse - energy and mass, particle and wave, - were but different aspects of\nthe same basic process, but the same Oneness which pervaded the entire universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science, in its most\nadvanced stage, is closer to Vedanta than ever before. The intuition of Indian\nmystics led them to understand the multidimensional reality and of space-time\ncontinuum which is the basis of the modern theory of relativity.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5a029HcfUDU/U9NlZceA-GI/AAAAAAAAt_A/uJ2nG7KQB_g/s1600/imwqfages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5a029HcfUDU/U9NlZceA-GI/AAAAAAAAt_A/uJ2nG7KQB_g/s1600/imwqfages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Akasha \u2013the\nmorphogenetic consciousness field , as per Vedanta is the source of everything\nthat exists, and in which the memory of the cosmos is encoded.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Gita says \"The\nUniverse produced phenomenally in me, is pervaded by me. . . From me the world\nis born, in me it exists, in me it dissolves.\"&nbsp; It can only be understood if we understand\nconsciousness. This is why the Western readers who has NO idea of consciousness\n, thought that the glorious Vedas are bumpkin shepherds verses .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only consciousness can\nexplain consciousness.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brahmAn (morphogenetic field) is the\nreason why a partially formed biological structure (the 'morphogentic germ\u2019)\ngets attached to the morphogentic field of a species, which then guides the\ngrowth of the rest of the form.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Below: After you watch this video ( in HD ) you will realise that BrahmAn resides within you&nbsp;</b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/HdovR3aJ92U/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/HdovR3aJ92U&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/HdovR3aJ92U&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every structure carries\nits own morphogentic field.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fabric of the universe, the\nprimal Field, was created by consciousness and is held in existence by\nconsciousness. The entire universe is the consciousness of the Creator. &nbsp;Consciousness creates energy, it creates\nmatter, and it creates the perspectives of space and time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DNA is a\ntransceiver for the BrahmAn or the morphogenetic consciousness field. &nbsp;&nbsp;The brain and DNA is governed by the laws of\nquantum physics rather than the laws of biology or neurophysiology. &nbsp;&nbsp;Scalar waves ( made famous by Nikola Tesla )\nis the point of fundamental intersection where matter and consciousness\ninfluence each other .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u2018Yato va imani bhutani jayante; yena jatani\njivanti; yatprayantyabhisamvishantiti; tadvijijnasasva; tadbrahmeti\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Know That from which\nall beings originate, emerge; That in which all beings rest; and That into\nwhich all beings finally merge - That is Brahman.&nbsp;</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">- </span><b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taittiriya Upanishad &nbsp;(3.1.1) 5000 BC</b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stupid Isaac Newton\u2019s\nclassical objective&nbsp; science is devoted\nonly to that which is observed by the 5 senses. I wish Newton was around to see\nthe latest Android mobile phone..&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soon\npsychology came along, to the process of observation.&nbsp; But western science like Vedanta&nbsp; never devoted itself to who's observing, and\na science that does not take into account the observer, who is so fundamental\nto the observation, because without the observer there would be no observation\n- is an incomplete and mindless science.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot call it a science; unless we include consciousness.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads are not philosophy but are\ndarshanas, \u201csomething seen\u201d and therefore to be realized. The Vedas are\nconsidered to be eternal, without beginning and end as they represent the divine\ntruth itself as perceived through the elevated consciousness of great seers.\nThe ancient Vedic rishis in all their wisdom wrote down as 5000 BC , that our\nuniverse is not woven from matter but consciousness.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">may\u0101 tatam ida\u1e41 sarva\u1e41,\njagad avyakta-m\u016brtin\u0101<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">mat-sth\u0101ni\nsarva-bh\u016bt\u0101ni, na c\u0101ha\u1e41 te\u1e63v avasthita\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cBy Me, in My\nunmanifested form, this entire universe is pervaded.</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">All beings are in Me, &nbsp;but I am not in them.</span></i>\u201d <b>Bhagawat Gita (9.4) 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient seers said,\nthat the universal laws are clear, your attitude about your life will shape it,\nthat &nbsp;matter, energy and consciousness\nare interchangeable.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7000\nyears before the hologram was invented Vedanta has written about the\nholographic universe and the holographic function of the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swami Vivekananda met super\ngenius Nikola Tesla , in Chicago in 1893, and introduced him to the ZPF, or\nakasha ( ether )-the all pervasive sky of quantum energy of the universe.</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vivekananda&nbsp; told Tesla that classical science must factor\nhuman consciousness in, or be stuck in the mud for ever.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He introduced him to\nthe wisdom of ancient Vedas , which considers the universe and consciousness as\nfractal Sri Yantra geometry. &nbsp;Much later\nTesla used to see brilliant blinding flashes of this TOE geometry .</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We see incredible order\nand harmony and pattern which no accident can produce. The image of the human\nbeing is contained within the microscopic DNA strands of the fertilised egg in\nthe womb.</span> &nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the subatomic\nlevel\u2014mind is over matter.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our billions of cells\nand DNA have memories that influence our behaviour and traits. If we stare back\ndown this \u2018great chain of being\u2019, we see a continuous process of spiritual\nevolution. This is something idiot Darwin will never understand , as he did not\nhave the intelligence .</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The classical physics\nof idiot Newton takes a material perspective in which the Universe is composed\nof discrete building blocks, solid and unchangeable. &nbsp;Quantum physics takes a spiritual perspective\nin which there are no separate parts, in which everything is fluid and always\nchanging.</span> <o:p></o:p><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stupid Newton pushed\nconsciousness into the realm of religion and mysticism. &nbsp;Scientists who wanted to factor consciousness\nin were chucked out of the scientific community and the peer reviewed magazines\ncontrolled by free masons made them pariahs. &nbsp;With the advent of quantum science we now know\nwhat great injustice was done. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This universe is NOT a\nclockwork as contended by Newton. Newtons classical physics holds good only for\nwhat that can be sensed by the 5 human senses, ( like the rotten apple falling\non his head ).,&nbsp; NOT the sub-atomic\nworld. &nbsp;There is a deep connection\nbetween consciousness and matter. &nbsp;The\nquantum double slit experiment has shown that a measured electron can appear\neither as a particle or a wave, but NOT both at the same time.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our solar system and\nthe milky way galaxy is just one of several billion in the universe. The speed\nof light is 186000 miles per second. This means light travels 6 trillion miles\nin one year. Our own galaxy is 60000 light years from edge to edge, and several\nlight years thick.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Light\nfrom the nearest star Alpha Centauri takes 4.27 light years to&nbsp; reach the earth.</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nBible says that the universe is only thousands of years old. While Vedanta and\nthe modern quantum theory agrees that it is around 15 billion years. </span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As seen by the double\nslit experiment, we create reality by conscious observation. </span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum rules does not care for\nNewton\u2019s third law, which states that every action has an equal and opposite\nreaction.&nbsp; &nbsp;Quantum rules dictate that every action has a\nmultitude of reaction possibilities.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In nature there is nothing like a\ncircle, it can only be a vortex spiral with ever changing evolution\u2014nothing can\nremain same for ever and till ad-infinitum.</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6NLbCsZpqCY/U9PrTQw3xvI/AAAAAAAAt_4/Kqv727_eQSg/s1600/imagrjes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6NLbCsZpqCY/U9PrTQw3xvI/AAAAAAAAt_4/Kqv727_eQSg/s1600/imagrjes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nT<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">he space between\nthe electrons , which gave free energy to the perpetual motion of the electrons\n, which prevent them from falling into the nucleus, is called Akasha or Ether\nor Zero point field.&nbsp; The ancient Vedic\nsages on the banks of the river Saraswati &nbsp;did NOT need to do Mathematical calculations\non paper--they could do it 1000 times faster in their great fractal minds</span>\n.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Since quantum\nstuff reacts to consciousness, the universe is constructed by consciousness. By\nadding the dimension of time to 3D space, our consciousness is given the\nability to evolve. Without change there is NO evolution, hence the vortex\nspiral.</span> &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedic Maharishis\nwere clairvoyants. Clairvoyance is the ability of one person to \"tune\nin\" to another person's field of consciousness and pick up their thoughts\n\u2013 both the conscious and unconscious ones. &nbsp;And, because the field of consciousness exists\nin a timeless and spaceless dimension, the clairvoyant can \"see\" both\nforward and backward in time</span> .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas contain the\nmeaning of consciousness. A visible attribute of consciousness is an energetic\nfield that governs the shaping of organisms. Morphogenesis is a scientific term\nto explain this very shaping of tissues, organs, and entire organisms.\nConsciousness is the creative force of the entire universe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire universe\nis in fact a single living conscious organism with complete awareness of\nitself. Not only is consciousness responsible for the physical universe and its\nelements-- it is the universe. The field of consciousness contains information\nabout everything that has happened since the dawn of time.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0nt4zOPy20Q/U9PlQaSa11I/AAAAAAAAt_Y/sZBCNOg3rfM/s1600/imagesCAJBNJ2O.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0nt4zOPy20Q/U9PlQaSa11I/AAAAAAAAt_Y/sZBCNOg3rfM/s1600/imagesCAJBNJ2O.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fields of conscousness are called M\nfields \u2013morphogenetic.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just like\nelectromagnetic and gravitational fields.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All life forms are connected by \"morphic fields\" or strong\nintertwined energetic connections. Our separation from each other is an optical\nillusion of consciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our bodies are piezo-electric bio-crystals, resonant\ntransducers of living light and life force. We have unlimited access to the\nradiant field of consciousness which is infinite active universal intelligence.\nWe all have direct and immediate access to the scalar field of consciousness</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">he\nancient&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas tell us that the basis of all creation is the all pervading&nbsp; morphogenetic consciousness field. The Vedas\nsaid that all energy is a spiral and that empty space is not empty at all. It\nis a plenum, containing zero point energy..&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness becomes\nenergy and then transforms to matter. Forces of attraction cause the particles\nto come together to form nuclei with electrons orbiting around them giving the\nillusion of matter. These atoms are attracted together to form molecules.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8YbbsTObUpA/U9Pm6k3DEAI/AAAAAAAAt_k/j4mrG4GnMkQ/s1600/imallges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8YbbsTObUpA/U9Pm6k3DEAI/AAAAAAAAt_k/j4mrG4GnMkQ/s1600/imallges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Molecules are brought together by organizing forces inherent in the particular\nmorphogenetic field of that being or material, causing the creation of DNA,\ncells, tissue, organs, systems, organisms, societies and on a larger scale,\nplanets, solar systems, galaxies and universes. All of this from the one and\nonly quantum field of consciousness .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is DNA everywhere\naround you. Exploding stars are\nthe only way that carbon enters the universe, and our bodies are composed of\ncarbon .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Rig Veda\nthe knowledge of the \"soul,\" or the Self of all beings is the\nprerequisite to the understanding of anything else. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads say:\n\"Know that, by which everything is known\u201d. Once we have a glimpse of the\nomnipresent nature of our consciousness, once we have a glimpse of a field of\nexistence that is indeed the omnipresent source of all that exists, we\nnaturally start to be aware of the interconnectedness of all levels of\ncreation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once we have seen the\nwhole, we start to recognize the parts as expressions of the whole. Since the\nwhole is holistic in its nature, its expressions are holistic representations\nof the whole. Vedas say that Brahman is the consciousness, the Self of all\nbeings.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus the ancient Vedic\nScience corroborates what modern science has discovered,&nbsp; ( rather vice \u2013versa )&nbsp; that this omnipresent field of pure Creative\nIntelligence, which is transcendental in its nature, beyond the level of the\nPlanck scale of 10-33cm, is the ultimate cause, the unmoved mover of everything\nin creation.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One indivisible\nwholeness of consciousness is the source of all multiplicity of Creation, and that\nthis one unbounded ocean of consciousness is our own consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"<i>Purushyo'yam loka sannidah</i>\" &nbsp; &nbsp;\"Man is a miniature universe\" --(Charaka Samhita IV).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<i>Sarvam khalvidam\nBrahma</i>\" &nbsp; &nbsp; \"All this is nothing but Brahman\" ---(Chh.Upanishad.\n3.14.1).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness ( BrahmAn\n) is the only element in creation that knows itself. &nbsp;&nbsp;By being in constant interaction with itself,\nconsciousness knows everything about itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cPrajn\u0101nam brahma\u201d-- &nbsp;\"&nbsp;Brahman\nknows everything \".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That says it all!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Empty space is not\nempty at all!&nbsp;&nbsp; The vacuum is actually a\nplenum. It contains an abundant amount of energy, the zero point energy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can\ntap into the Zero Point Energy field.&nbsp;\nPositrons emanate from \"the quantum vacuum\"&nbsp; and get annihilated. These are energy\noscillations at zero degrees Kelvin, where all activity in an atom ceases. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is called vacuum\nenergy because it is descriptive of the energy in a perfect vacuum, where no\nlight or matter is present. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GpA82XAe8tI/U9QTq1ML_kI/AAAAAAAAuCE/F07TjE2RUwc/s1600/dowggjnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this\nstate, random electromagnetic oscillations can still be observed, meaning that\nthere is still some energy present.&nbsp; Such\nresidual energy is enormous and a cup of it could boil off the planet\u2019s oceans\nin a few seconds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For a diatomic (two\natoms) molecule, for example, the zero-point energy per mole, E0, can be given\nby the equation:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">E0 = y N h c f<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">where N is the Avogadro\nconstant number of 6.0221367 \u00d7 1023&nbsp;\n,&nbsp;&nbsp; h is Planck\u2019s constant of\n6.626 \u00d7 10-34 joule-seconds, c is the velocity of light in vacuum of\n299,792,458 m/sec , and f is the frequency of vibration depending on the mass\nof the molecule, (which is different&nbsp; for\ndifferent isotopes of the same element.).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the zero point\neffect resulting from a very complex scalar-wave interaction between\nelectromagnetic &nbsp;fields and matter. &nbsp;Like I said before , a scalar wave is far\ndifferent from a regular wave in that a scalar wave goes in all directions into\nthe surroundings. A vector quantity has magnitude and direction while a scalar\nquantity has only magnitude.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-D1aDg0nh9uE/U9QTa73-3xI/AAAAAAAAuB8/bI6aUTQ4cb8/s1600/downlgrweoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-D1aDg0nh9uE/U9QTa73-3xI/AAAAAAAAuB8/bI6aUTQ4cb8/s1600/downlgrweoad.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The energy in between the atoms is\nchaotic,&nbsp; unpatterned, zero-point energy.\nThe quantity of the energy is limitless. Tapping the zero-point energy means\nmaking one or more energy patterns reverberate, which will cause extra energy\nto follow suit, just like acoustic amplification in a wind instrument or Bose\nwave-radio.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; gravity is weaker\nhigher up.&nbsp; The atomic clock installed at\nUS NIST in 1999 , which measures light emitted by supercooled Caesium atoms as\nthey fall though a microwave cavity, can run for 20 million years without\nlosing or gaining a second .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where\ngravity, and hence a curvature of space, was greatest time moved more slowly;\nwhere it was not, more quickly.&nbsp; The\npassage of time as we record and experience it here was actually slower than in\nspace.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">and thus the\nrevolutions of the world go round.</span></i>\u201d -- <b>Bhagawat\nGita 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rlDD8KIO8MA/U9ScTjDH8_I/AAAAAAAAuDk/hq60I77DYiY/s1600/downloddead.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
