font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RECAPITULATION :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT IS THE PURPOSE OF\nWRITING THIS POST ON SOUNDARYA LAHIRI.&nbsp; &nbsp;TO SHOW HOW LITTLE HINDUSIM HAS BEEN\nUNDERSTOOD , EVEN BY THE GREATEST OF STALWARTS LIKE SWAMI VIVEKANANDA .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANSKRIT PUNDITS ARE JUST LANGUAGE EXPERTS . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY THE GERMAN QUANTUM PHYSICISTS ( QUANTUM DOUBLE\nSLIT EXPERIMENT ) REALLY UNDERSTOOD AMAZING HINDUISM AFTER ADI SHANKARACHARYA EXPOUNDED\nIT BY VERSES .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS ALSO TO SHOW THAT\nSAUNDARYA LAHARI IS POISON INJECTED.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">100 VERSES SHORN OFF\nITS WISDOM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT VERSE NO 1 HAS BEEN\nAPPARENTLY LEFT ALONE AS IT IS \u2014 BECAUSE THE WHITE INVADER THOUGHT THAT IT\nLOWERS THE LEVEL OF OUR HINDU GODS \u2014 BY ELEVATING THE FEMALE GENDER . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSHIVA CANNOT EVEN MOVE\nWITHOUT THE HELP OF SHAKTI\u201d . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These pea-brained\nposion injectors did NOT have the perception to discern the meaning of\npolarity. 54 triple intersections of Sri Yantra in shiva/ shakto format becomes\ndouble\u2014108.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">108 is the numerical\nequivalent of OM and the number of beads in a rudraksha mala. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOR PURUSHA THE WITNESS , PRAGATI THE DANCER\nHAS TO PERFORM\u2014 OR EVOLUTION GOES PHUTT !.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THIS POST ALSO PROVES\nTHAT ADI SHANKARACHARYA SHOULD NOT ONLY BE CREDITED WITH ADVAITA VEDANTA, BUT\nALSO DVAITA VEDANTA AND SAMKHYA VEDANTA.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>ALL THREE FORMS OF SANATANA DHARMA ARE INHERENT IN SOUNDARYA LAHARI.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HwOq0UqpMio/U8sai_yiVzI/AAAAAAAAtzs/JVg6VPjNstg/s1600/images.jpghhe2qcq.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HwOq0UqpMio/U8sai_yiVzI/AAAAAAAAtzs/JVg6VPjNstg/s1600/images.jpghhe2qcq.jpg\" height=\"150\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADVAITA\nVEDANTA</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> \u2013 WHERE BRAHMAN ( UNSEEN GOD LIFTED BY ISLAM) IS\nTHE MORPHOGENTIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD.&nbsp;\nTHE EMPTY SPACE WITHIN THE TINY ATOM , TO THE ETHER OF THE VAST COSMOS .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-q-FH8D1bXmw/U8sY3Qb3BZI/AAAAAAAAtzE/LE2MQc-R2yo/s1600/downlggoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-q-FH8D1bXmw/U8sY3Qb3BZI/AAAAAAAAtzE/LE2MQc-R2yo/s1600/downlggoad.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">DVAITA\nVEDANTA</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> \u2013 WHERE THERE IS A DANCE OF OPPOSITES , CONTROLLED\nBY A MEDIATOR ( BARHMA/ VISHNU / SHIVA ) . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHERE AEROBIC BACTERIA\nSEAMLESSLY CHANGES OVER TO ANAEROBIC BACTERIA , WHEN OXYGEN ATMOSPHERE CHANGES\nTO METHANE ATMOSPHERE . &nbsp;&nbsp;OR CONDENSATION\nTURNS TO EVAPORATION.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE OPPOSITES ARE CONNECTED BY CONSCIOUSNESS\n. ( It is about the quantum possibility wave vibration between two poles.\nTogether they express the great void at absolute peace with itself.&nbsp;&nbsp; They keep each other in check, yet provide\nfuel to feed off each other-- &nbsp;). <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wefp7OtCZfI/U8sYlI8dr8I/AAAAAAAAty8/V-7gX6W7I34/s1600/imaJJges+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wefp7OtCZfI/U8sYlI8dr8I/AAAAAAAAty8/V-7gX6W7I34/s1600/imaJJges+(1).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is NO need for a Vaishnavite\nsaint like Ramanuja to antagonize Shiva followers .&nbsp; &nbsp;Both\nShiva ( destroyer ) and Vishnu ( mediator ) are force fields , who work as a\nteam with Brahma in perfect harmony . &nbsp;How must attack Hinduism has survived , all\nfor DIVIDE AND RULE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAMKHYA\nVEDANTA</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> \u2013 WHERE ADVAITA AND DVAITA FORMS ARE SUPER-IMPOSED.\n&nbsp;ONLY THE PERCEPTIVE CAN UNDERSTAND THIS\n. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankhya is a theory of\nevolution and understanding the universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This declared to you is\nthe Yoga of the wisdom of Sankhya.&nbsp; Hear,\nnow, of the integrated wisdom with which, Partha, you will cast off the bonds\nof karma.\u2014<b>Bhagavad Gita 2.39-&nbsp; 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here when the\ninsentient Prakriti ( female \u2013Dvaita ) comes in contact with the sentient\nPurusha (male \u2013Advaita ) , the universe evolves.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a dancer,&nbsp;\nafter having performed for the observer , stops dancing, so does Prakriti\ncease to perform for an individual Puru\u1e63ha when her task is accomplished.&nbsp; Female Prakriti&nbsp; has danced for male Puru\u1e63ha, and as he is no\nlonger interested in her (\u201cI have seen her\u201d), she stops forever (\u201cI have\nalready been seen\u201d).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purusha, or supreme\nconsciousness ( BrahmAn ) , is the impassive observer of all phenomena.\nPrakriti,&nbsp; excited&nbsp; in response to Purusa\u2019s attention , has her\ngunas ( Yin-Yang or Tamas \u2013Rajas ) thrown out of equilibrium.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She moves from transcendence to immanence and\nundergoes a series of transformations through which the multiform world comes\ninto being.&nbsp; Purusha, was never really in\nbondage, or enmeshed with Prakriti. Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because\nof its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its\neffects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The root cause\n(Brahman) is to be apprehended by Sankhya-yoga</span></i> - <b>Svetasvatara Upanisad (6.13) -5000 BC.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sankhya, direct\nperception is the most important and fundamental source of all knowledge. When\nsenses cannot directly perceive due to their limitations, inference is needed\nsuch as in philosophical disputations. The very existence of Purusa ( BrahmAn \u2013\nmorphogenetic consciousness ) is possible only through inference. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankhya cites out two types of perceptions-\nIndeterminate (nirvikalpa) perceptions and determinate&nbsp; (savikalpa) perceptions.&nbsp; The Sankhya philosopher accepts three kinds of\nevidences, namely direct perception, hypothesis and traditional authority.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The order is important, for we use inference\nonly when perception is impossible, and only if both are silent do we accept\ntradition. He identifies three kinds of procedures--namely, parimanat\n(transformation), samanvayat (adjustment) and saktitah (performance of\nenergies)--as the causes of the cosmic manifestation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HL_FQInCzmc/U8sZXPn4vVI/AAAAAAAAtzM/8KFf4iiP4_M/s1600/phyyoto.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HL_FQInCzmc/U8sZXPn4vVI/AAAAAAAAtzM/8KFf4iiP4_M/s1600/phyyoto.jpg\" height=\"307\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ADI SHANKARACHARYA HAS\nJUST EXPOUNDED HINDUSIM .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">VEDAS AND UPANISHADS WERE ON ORAL SRUTI ROUTE FOR\n30000 YEARS TILL IT WAS PENNED DOWN IN 5000 BC, &nbsp;AS HUMAN DNA AND PINEAL GLANDS STARTED GETTING\nATROPHIED.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS GREAT SAGE WHO\nMASTERED THE VEDAS AT THE AGE OF 6 , WAS KICKED BACK IN TIME FROM 2000 BC TO\n820 AD , BY THE WHITE INVADER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Vedas</span></b> were ridiculed as\nshepherds verses.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas and the Upanishads are to India what\nthe Crown and Scepter are to an anointed king. &nbsp;&nbsp;They are India's proudest and most ancient\npossessions. It hardly matters if you are a Christian or a Muslim or even a\nPakistani-as long as you have Indian DNA.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;For Vedas are NOT about religion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 4000 BC to 2000 BC, Kerala Namboodiris took care of the original texts . The\n4 Vedas along with the 108 Upanishads are the most sacred books of this planet.\nThese texts are proof of the UNSURPASSED greatness of Indian DNA. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A brilliant man like Schopenhauer found the\nUpanishads to be the \"solace\" of his life and death. Idiots will\nNEVER EVER understand\u2014and it is better that such morons are left alone.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These\nancient texts won the admiration of eminent human beings of the caliber of Carl\nJung, Emerson, Thoreau, Walt Whitman, Victor Hugo, Romain Rolland, Hermann\nHesse, Henrich Zimmer, Tolstoy, Sir Edwin Arnold, Yeats, Toynbee and hundreds\nof others.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are not shepherds\u2019 verses as ridiculed by jealous\nVatican-&nbsp; but an amazing encyclopedia of\nthe most mind boggling philosophy of thought. It must be remembered that 7000\nyears ago, the whole world outside India were eating raw meat, living in caves\nand going grunt grunt for language.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Vedic texts include hymns, liturgical\ninstructions, and philosophical courses\u2014and are mostly coded \u2013only for the\nperceptive. This literature is not rustic or primitive but highly developed in\nits literary form, in its intellectual insight, and in its questioning\nattitude.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The glory of this vast literature is its imaginative and emotional\nqualities. The Maharishis were experts in Metaphysics to determine the real\nnature of things\u2014to determine the meaning, structure, and principles of\nwhatever is in so far as it is-- with reality as a whole. It is a call to\nrecognize the existence and overwhelming importance of a set of higher\nrealities that ordinary men could not deduce--the science of ultimate reality ,\nas opposed to appearance or the contrast between appearance and reality .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nVedic metaphysician was a sort of super scientist, unlimited in his curiosity\nand gifted with a capacity for putting together other people's findings with a\nskill and imagination that none of them individually commands.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian\nrishis were the first to engage their great minds in dialectics in\nphilosophy\u2014the&nbsp; method of investigating\nthe nature of truth by the criticism of initial concepts and hypotheses\u2014all in\nthe most peaceful natural surroundings&nbsp;\n.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Indian Vedic dialectic is based on a dialogue between two\nor more rishis , master or student - people who may hold differing views, yet\nwish to pursue truth by seeking agreement with one another. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is in contrast to\ndebate, in which two or more people hold differing views and wish to persuade\nor prove one another wrong (and thus a jury or judge is needed to decide the\nmatter), or rhetoric, which is a relatively long monologue oration conducted by\na single stupid person.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas are not puerile babblings of rustic\ntroubadours or minstrels , but sedate out-pourings of exceptionally sharp and\ngraceful minds in quest of truth .&nbsp; Like\nindestructible diamonds of brilliant fire they have come down for thousands of\nyears &nbsp;in spotless perfection, with no\nneed to be revised or abridged, to suit the modern era.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedic seers , propounded six systems of\nphilosophy explaining man, universe, and God, before which Aristotle's and\nPlato's LIFTED theories look like juvenile endeavors. &nbsp;Plato studied in India.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The seers discovered the\nEarth's rotatory and revolutionary motions, and studied the courses of\nconstellations and stars, and founded the twin sciences of astronomy and\nastrology. These seers and channels said,&nbsp;\nthat the universal laws are clear, your attitude about your life will\nshape it , that Matter, energy and consciousness are interchangeable.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness is the&nbsp; intelligent force that started the blueprint\nwhich ultimately manifested itself as a particular form. There is a\nconsciousness in every molecule of matter.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedic revelations are so cosmic\nthat they approach more closely the findings of modern quantum physics and\nastronomy than the pious pronouncements of loud rhetoric preachers and TV\nevangelists of single book , single messiah religions..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now I would like you to\nreflect on how many millions of people were killed by Christianity and Islam --\nreflect on the senseless Inquisitions and Crusades ordered by a middle man\nsitting in Vatican --with burnings on stake --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas&nbsp; are the world's oldest intellectual legacies.\nThey are the only composition in the universe invested with Divine origin, and\nhence divine sanctity. The Vedas are the inspired utterances of a whole galaxy\nof realized souls, of spiritual geniuses, of people not merely well versed\nintellectually but with spiritual enlightenment.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4et8GaBmw7A/U8sZ4jfcW5I/AAAAAAAAtzU/m6WirV6Ahnw/s1600/imaggges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4et8GaBmw7A/U8sZ4jfcW5I/AAAAAAAAtzU/m6WirV6Ahnw/s1600/imaggges.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"394\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the Vedas look outward\nin reverence and awe of the phenomenal world, the <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Upanishads</span></b> look inward,&nbsp; finding the powers of nature only an\nexpression of the more awe-inspiring powers of human consciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nrepresent the essence of the Vedas, the greatest truths ever known to mankind. The\nUpanishads focus on philosophical questions such as the purpose of life, origin\nof the universe, concepts of time, space and matter, as well as concepts of\natman, Brahman, maya, immortality, rebirth, karma, and the world.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nUpanishads are the remarkable compositions, which contain sublime and\nphilosophical speculations concerning the Universal Soul, and cosmic\nconsciousness.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-E1tgoSx0Wws/U8tSx_uF8OI/AAAAAAAAt0E/fDTmv3dKoxA/s1600/ijjimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-E1tgoSx0Wws/U8tSx_uF8OI/AAAAAAAAt0E/fDTmv3dKoxA/s1600/ijjimages.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"315\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It does NOT say in a stupid manner that you are breathing air\nbecause our God made the air for you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads are not philosophy but are\ndarshanas, \u201csomething seen\u201d and therefore to be realized. They give&nbsp; answers to the three&nbsp; questions :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Where is the life\nwe have lost in living\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Where is the wisdom we\nhave lost in knowledge?<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Where is the knowledge\nwe have lost in information?</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rishis had repeatedly\nemphasized that the ultimate reality lies beyond the realms of the senses and\nthe grey matter beneath our skulls. Hark again to the Upanishads:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"There the eye\ngoes not</i></span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Speech goes not, nor\nthe mind.</i></span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>We know not, we\nunderstand not,</i></span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>How would one teach\nit?\"</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads teach\nthat both space and time are endless or infinite. Modern science completely\nagrees. The ancient Maharshis understood the staggering scale of the divine\nplay. Many centuries later the scientific mind still boggles at the scale of\ncreation which makes infinity intelligible.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rishis clearly perceived that\nthe most fundamental characteristic of this incomprehensible creation was that\nit was in a perpetual state of movement, flow and change. Lila is a rhythmic\nplay which goes on in endless cycles, the One becoming the many and the many\nreturning to the One.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science, in its most advanced stage, is closer to Vedanta\nthan ever before. The intuition of Indian mystics led them to understand the\nmultidimensional reality and of space-time continuum which is the basis of the\nmodern theory of relativity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads are summits of thought on mankind\nand the universe, designed to push human ideas to their very limit and beyond.\nThey give us both spiritual vision and philosophical argument, and it is by a\nstrictly personal effort that one can reach the truth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Upanishads we get\na glimpse into the workings of the minds of the great Indian thinkers who were\nunhampered by the tyranny of religious dogma, political authority, pressure of\npublic opinion, seeking truth with single-minded devotion,&nbsp; rare in the history of thought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now I would like you to\nreflect on how many millions of people were killed by Christianity and Islam --\nreflect on the senseless Inquisitions and Crusades ordered by a middle man\nsitting in Vatican --with burnings on stake --. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads have\ngiven us a body of insights that have a universal quality about them and this\nuniversality derives from their impersonality. The sages who discovered them\nhad depersonalized themselves in the search for truth.&nbsp; Unlike modern Western philosophers who lift\nideas and patent it in their names.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rishis wanted to go beyond nature and\nrealize the transcendental nature of man. They dared to take up this challenge\nand the Upanishads are the unique record of the methods they adopted, the\nstruggles they undertook and the victory they achieved in this astonishing\nadventure of human spirit.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And this is conveyed to us in verses of great\nresonance power and poetic charm. In seeking the immortal, the Vedic seers\nconferred the immortality upon the literature that conveyed it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">( <i><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Digression : &nbsp;Today we have ART OF LIVING of Triple Sri\npatenting even breathing. &nbsp;SOO HUMM is\nhyperventilation and over doing it is bad for the brain ( Martini effect /\nNitrogen narcosis )and you will get diaphragmatic hernia </span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Who\ntruly knows, who can honestly say where.</span></span></i><i style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">After\nthe birth of Creation.</span></span></i><i style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">And\nwhoever knows or does not know where Creation came from,</span></span></i><i style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Only\none gazing at its vastness from the very roof of the final Heaven</span></span></i><i style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Only\nsuch a one could possibly know,</span></span></i><i style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">But\ndoes even He know?</span> \"<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
